40027035	Jihui qui tasaxon rontanxon sca jahuen chopa metisahnoxon tsoan bihtihiquin hihxon borasa qui macan bero nanexon chicohah, huetsa macan pari cainaiya huetsan bihnon, huetsa macan pari cainaiya huetsan bihquin.
40027036	Coirani sca sontarobo tsahopaqueti.
40027037	Jaa bochihori ta quirica hueoncannishqui, jaa copi rehteha joibo jano janon. Nea ta Jesus qui, Judiobaan quiquin hapo, hihqui jaa quirica.
40027038	Yometso rabe rihbi sca tasaxon rontancanquin jaa senenbi. Ramiho huetsa, ramiho huetsa.
40027039	Jano huinotaibaan ta hosan hosancannishqui, jaton mapo bose bosehihcanaxon.
40027040	—Papan xobo potojaquetanxon quimisha neten jaa xahnen hahquirihbi xobojanica hihquish, janohax siri sca johue Papan baque hihquish, jaa jihui janinhax botoquihranhue —hahcanquin.
40027041	Sacerdote hapobo betan texe judio hapobaan ta jascajaquin rihbi hosancannishqui.
40027042	—Huetsabo jihuemati hahtipahxon bi ta hahri jihuemati hahtipahyamahiqui. Israelibaan quiquin hapo hihquish, jan coros janinhax botopaquenon. Jaatian tah non nincacointihi.
40027043	Papa Diosen baque hihqui ta shinannishqui. Queenxon, Papan jaa botonxon rohajascanon. Hea tah hen Diosen baque qui jan jaipi hih ca hen ja hisen —hihcani.
40027044	Jascajaquin rihbi ta hahbe hueonahbaan hichaquin hosannishqui.
40027045	Barin manan tsahcahiya sca ta yamecahinnishqui, jatihibi mai janin. Nai pohapaque bari janon caman bahquishihpi.
40027046	Bari nai pohapaquetaiya sca ta coshin bi res Jesus yohuannishqui: —Elí Elí lama sabactani. Papan, Papan, ¿jahua copi min hea jenebahinain? hihcatsihqui.
40027047	Nincacax: —Elías ta quenahiqui —hihcani jano nichibo.
40027048	Huesti bishquihihcanahi caxon, taco quescapa bihxon, xehati cachaqui maosahxon tahua qui queonxon sananhihnixon xehamaquin.
40027049	Caibaan sca: —Jenehue. Jaa botoni Elías jotihiquin non tah non jiscatsihqui —hahcanquin.
40027050	Hahquirihbi coshin bi res quenatax sca Jesus mahuati.
40027051	Jaatianbi ta Papan xoboho hahan chiqueti chopa rontamehtai huaxacahinnishqui, bochiquihax naman caman, rabe teque sca janon. Mai rihbi ta mihuannishqui. Macamahnhuanbo rihbi ta caxquecahinnishqui.
40027052	Cristo hihquipish bi teehihribihi pecaho ta tsahonbo rihbi quehpemehnishqui, neateman hihni Papan baquebo yorayabi teehihribihax huenihihnatax bocani.
40027053	Jaabo ta jaa jema janin nichi bocannishqui, hihti caibaan jisnonbi.
40027054	Jesus mahuataiya jascapa huinotai jisish ta jano coiranai sontaro capitan hihti raquenishqui, jahuen sontarobo rihbi hihti raqueti. —Jaa ta Papan baque coin hihnishqui —hihcani.
40027055	Hochoxon rihbi ta hichaxon haibobaan coiranxon jisnishqui. Jaabaan ta Galilea mai janinhax Jesus betan jahui haibobo janishqui, pitijaxonaibo.
40027056	Huetsa ta María Magdalena janeya janishqui. Huetsa cahen María Jacobon mama, Josepan mama. Huetsa cahen Zebedeon baquebaan mama.
40027057	Bepi sca Arimatea jema janinhax coriquiyahpa patoro jahui, José janeya. Jesusen haxemaha nincacoinni joni.
40027058	Pilato janin caxon sca ¿Jesusen yora hean bihtimahin hahca, Pilatonen Bihhue hahquin.
40027059	Jahuen yora botonxon sca sabana pahtsacah siripan rahcoquin.
40027060	Rahcoxon boxon, tsahomehyanoxon jano jan macan manan xanqueman poquinipi janin mihinquin. Heen tsahonti janinbi tsahonpan hihxon jano Jesus mihinquin. Tsahon xehponoxon sca hihtihosi macan taranbohanxon xehpoquin. Macaman xehpobahini sca caresscai.
40027061	Jaa tsahon patax sca María Magdalena betan huetsa María manati tsahoti.
40027062	Jaton tantiti nete janon jaa nete queyotaiya sca sacerdote hapobo betan fariseobo Pilato janin bocani.
40027063	Nocoxon: —Hapon, hoa paranmis bihyamaparixon tah non yohuanai nincaquipiqui. Jaa tah non rahma shinanai. Quimisha neten hihquipish tah hen teehihribiyaxihqui hih ta jaipishqui.
40027064	Jaa copi yohihue, jahuen quimisha neten caman jahuen tsahon coiranahbo. Jonetax jahuen yora yometsohtax teehihrihbi ta jaipishqui —hih jahuen haxenicabo jamis, jonibo parani. Jascajaquin paranah ta jan jato paranmenopahoni mentan hashoan tiroma jatihiqui —Pilato jacanquin.
40027065	—Hoa cahisen, sontarobo. Jato boxon, man honanai quescajaquin jato coiranmatannahue —jato jaquin.
40027066	Caxon sca, hahan xehpoti macan boyacanquin. Boyaxon honantijaxon coiranahbo sontarobo quenimacanquin.
40028001	Jascahipibo pecaho jaton tantiti nete huino sca jaipi quen xaba paqueti hochoma sca María Magdalena betan huetsa María cahi, tsahon jisi.
40028002	Cahiboyabi naihoh quehax Papan yonoti huesti botopaqueti jahuiya coshin bi res mai mihuani. Botopaquexon hahan xehpoti macamahnhuan taranbohanax jaa cahtsahoscai.
40028003	Jahuen yora cana bacahi quescari xabati. Jahuen chopa cahen joxo bi res joxo.
40028004	Jaa jisish ca hihti raquetax tastahihcanahax sontarobo racareneni mahuataibo quescapahax.
40028005	Haibobo nocotaiya: —Raqueyamanahue. Rehtepibo Jesus benahi man jahui tah hen honani.
40028006	Nenoma ta qui. Jan yohipi quescari ta teehihribihaxqui. Jano racanipibo jahuen tsahon jisi benahue.
40028007	Histon caxon sca jahuen haxenicabo yohitannahue. Hihquipish bi ta hahquiribi teehihquishqui. Mato bebohi ta Galilea main cahiqui. Jano tah man jaa jisi catihi. Mato tah hen yohiscai, jato jascajaquin yohitannahue —Papan yonotinin jato jaquin.
40028008	Histon sca bocani. Tsahon janinhax hishtocanahi cahi, raqueya jenimahax jahuen haxenicabo yohihi bocani.
40028009	Cahitonbi jato behchihi Jesus jahui. —¿Man jascabi jayamahin? —jato jaquin. Jato jascahah bi pontecahini caxon jaa bebon betihihpaquexon taxecocanquin.
40028010	—Raqueyamanahue. Galilea main bohábo heen huetsabo yohitannahue. Jano ta hea jisyaxihcanihqui.
40028011	Jato yohihi haibobo bohiboyabi sca tsahon janinhax sontarobo rihbi bocani. Jeman caxon rahma huinotah jatihibi sacerdote hapobo yohicanquin.
40028012	Judiobaan hapobo betan tsinquixon sca jahueja sca non jatihin hihquish yohinanxon sontarobo hicha coriqui hinancanquin.
40028013	Coriqui hinanxon: —Non yame hoxahiya ta jahuen haxenicabo joxon jahuen yora bichincanaxqui hihnahue.
40028014	Man jascari yohuani jai chanihah noquen gobernador sinataiya tah non jaa rihbi raejatihi, mato jahuejayamanon —sontarobo jacanquin sacerdotebaan.
40028015	Jaa coriqui bichish sca jascari yohuani bocani, sacerdotebaan yohihah quescari. Jascari yohuannihbo copi ta rahma caman jatihibi Judea mai janin jascari yohuanchanicaniqui.
40028016	Galilea main sca ta jahuen haxenicabo bocanishqui, once joni. Jano nocoyaxahnahue Jesusen jato yohipi manan janin nococani.
40028017	Jano Jesus meraxon, hahqui raboxonen tisquihahpaquehcanquin. Jesus tah qui hih caibo janon bi jaa hin Hen tah hen honancoinyamahi hih caibo jaribihi.
40028018	Jato qui joxon sca: —Papan ta hea jatihibi hihbomascaiqui, naiho jai jatihibi, main jaibo jatihibi rihbi.
40028019	Jaa copi jatihibi mai janin caxon jano jaibo haxematannahue. Heen Papan janen, jahuen baquen janen rihbi, jahuen yoshin siripan janen rihbi jato nashimatannahue, heen jihuetahbo.
40028020	Jascajanahue hahquin hen mato yohipahoni joibo jatihibi jato haxemanahue, jascajahabo. Nete queyonon caman hen mato betan jascabihi jayaxihqui honannahue.
41001001	Papan baque Jesucristo joi siri ta nescari pehocohnishqui.
41001002	Papan joi yohinica Isaiasnen pari ta nescajaquin huishanishqui: Jise. Mia bahixonnon hihxon tah hen heen joi yohinica pari raanai.
41001003	Jaa ta cahchiho jano tsoa jihueyamahiton nichish coshin yohuanyaxihquiqui: Bahixonnahue jahan hihbo jonon. Jahuen bahi najisti chaibo hahxonnahue hih ta jaa jayaxihquiqui hihqui Isaiasnen huishani joi.
41001004	Isaiasnen yohini quescajaquin nashimahi ta Juan cahchiho jano tsoa jihueyamahiton canishqui. Cahax coshin yohuani: —Papan maton hohcha sohuanon maton shinan pontenahue hen mato nashimanon —hahquin.
41001005	Jascajahiya ta Judea mai mehabo, Jerusalen jema janinhahbo rihbi Juan qui bocannishqui jatihibi. Jaton hohcha Papa Dios yohihiya cahen Juaman jato nashimaquin Jordan huean janinxon.
41001006	Juaman ta camello rani chopa sahuepahonishqui. Bichi cinturonen chinexehti. Champo pipahoni. Bona jaene rihbi xehapahoni.
41001007	—Hehchon ta hea mentan hashoan shinanya noque joyaxihquiqui. Jaa hihti siri copi tah hen chiquerehue tsahopaquexon jahuen sapato risbi pecaxonti betan hea senenyamahi.
41001008	Hean hen mato jenen nashimahi bi ta jahuen jonibo man jai honanahbo hihxon Papan mato jahuen Yoshin hinanyaxihquiqui, nashimaquin hahcajaquin hicha hinanquin —Juaman jato jaquin.
41001009	Jascascaiya Galilea mai meha Nazaret jema janinhax Jesus jahui. Jahuiya ta Juaman jaa nashimanishqui Jordan huean janinxon.
41001010	Nashimaha cahen jene janinhax mapexon nai huiso quehpemehtai Jesusen jisquin. Dios Yoshin nobex quescapah hahqui botopaquetai jisquin.
41001011	Jaatian: —Mia tah min hen hihti queenai heen baque qui. Mihon ta hen jenimahi —hihqui naihoh quehax yohuanai joi.
41001012	Jaa pecaho ta Dios Yoshiman Jesus cahchiho camanishqui.
41001013	Cuarenta neten cahchiho Jesus nichi yohinahbo tocan. Jano nichiton ta Satanasnen hohchamacatsihquin tananishqui. Papan yonotibaan sca ta Jesus pimanishqui.
41001014	Jaatian sca Juan sipojahipibo pecaho sca Jesus caribihi Galilea main. Papan joi siri yohibonahi cahi.
41001015	—Papan mato hahxonti nete ta nocoscaiqui. Papan jihuemahi joti ta nea pishca sca jaonahiqui. Maton shinan pontenahue. Papan joi siri bihcoinnahue —jato jaquin.
41001016	Galilea hian quexa sca quetanbonahi cahi. Caquin bi Simon jahuen huetsa Andres betan jisbonaquin. Tarrafa potahiton jato jisbonaquin, yapa bihnica rabe.
41001017	—Hehbe bonahue, joni hionica sca hen mato hihmanon —jato jaquin.
41001018	Jascaha jaton tarrafa potabahini sca hahbe bocani.
41001019	Jaatian caribiquin bi Zebedeon baque Jacobo jisbonaquin. Jahuen huetsa Juan betan nontinxon jaton tarrafa honahiton jisbonaquin.
41001020	Jisxon jato quenaquin. Quenaha jahuen jonibo betan jaton papa nontinbi banenon Jesus betan sca bocani.
41001021	Capernaum jema janin sca nococani. Tantiti neten sca haho tsinquiti xoboho hihcoxon Jesusen jato haxemaquin.
41001022	Haxemaha rahtecani. Huishani honanbaan haxemahi quescajaquinma bi hapon hahcai quescajaquin jato haxemaha ta rahtecannishqui.
41001023	Jaa xoboho rihbi cahen tiroma yoshinyahpa joni huesti jai. Jaan cahen joi coshin yocaquin:
41001024	—¿Min noque jahuejatihin, Nazaret janinha Jesusen? ¿Min noque queyohi jahuin? Min tsoa quin hen ta hen honanai. Diosen raanai tah min qui —hahquin yoshiman.
41001025	Jesusen sca jaa yohiquin: —Netetax jahuen yora janinhax picohue —hahquin.
41001026	Jan jascaha jaa joni tastahihmahax sai saihihquish tiroma yoshin picoti.
41001027	Jatihibi sca rahtetax yocacahanani: —¿Teeee, jahua joni hin? Honanmati joi behna tah qui. Hapon hahcai quescajaquin ta haxemahiqui. Yoshin tiromabo ta yohihiqui. Jaan catanhue hahca ta bocanihqui —hihcani.
41001028	Janohax cahen histon bi res Jesus qui yohuanscacani Galilea mai jatihibi janinhahbo.
41001029	Jaatian sca haho tsinquiti xobohoh quehax cainax Andres betan Simoman xoboho hihcocani Jesus, Jacobo, Juan.
41001030	Simoman haita cahen yonatax racati. Jesus yohiscacanquin, Jaa ta hisinihqui, hahquin.
41001031	Yohihahbo metsontanxon hueniquin. Huenihah rohacahinxon jato pimascaquin.
41001032	Jaa bepi bari hihquiscaiya sca ta hisinyahpabo, tiroma yoshinyahpabo rihbi jato jatihibi Jesus qui hiocannishqui.
41001033	Jaa jema janinhahbo jatihibi Jesus janin xehqui patax tsamajaqueti.
41001034	Jano cahen mesco hisinyahpabo Jesusen rohajaquin hihti caibo. Hicha tiroma yoshinbo rihbi netemaxon picoquin. Jaa honanaibo copi jato netemaquin.
41001035	Mohiyahtax hihari sca xaba paqueri jaima huenitax Jesus cahi jano tsoabi yamahiton. Janoxon sca jahuen Papa yocaquin.
41001036	Jaatian sca Simon, jaabo, Jesus benahi cahi.
41001037	Meraxon yohicanquin: —Jatihixonbi ta mia benacaniqui —hahcanquin.
41001038	—Huetsa jemabo janin sca canon bonahue, jano rihbi Papan joi yohinon. Jaa copi tah hen jahuequi —jato jaquin.
41001039	Jato jascahax Galilea janin sca Jesus nihnichi jatihibinco. Haho tsinquiti xobohoxon Papan joi yohibonahi cahi. Tiroma yoshinbo rihbi picoquin.
41001040	Jaatian cahen huesti sipiyahpa joni Jesus qui joxon hihti yocaquin. Raboxonen tisquihahpaquexon yocaquin: —Queenxon ta mian hea rohajatihi —hahquin.
41001041	Jahan hihti shinanxon mehancahinxon mehexon Jesusen sca yohiquin: —Queen tah hen jai. Rohascahue —hahquin.
41001042	Jan jascahah hisinyamascai, rohascai.
41001043	Jaatianbi jaa catannon sca Jesusen hihti yohiquin:
41001044	—Tsoabi yohihaxma sacerdote qui catanhue, min rohascai jismahi. Min rohahi copi Moisesnin yohini hinanti hinantanhue min rohascai honanahbo —hahquin.
41001045	Jesusen jascahah bi cahi. Jan rohascai yohibonahi cahi. Yohibonahiya cahen jema janin jahuibo hichahiya jeman cati Jesusen hahtipahyamascaquin, jaa yocacatsihquibo hichahiya. Hueneman res cahi. Jatihibi janinhax sca Jesus qui bocani.
41002001	Huetsa neten sca cahen Capernaum janin hahquirihbi Jesus nocoti cahi. Jahuen xobon jaa nocoscai cahen nincacanquin janohahbaan.
41002002	Hicha joni tsamajaquetaiya cahen xobo senenyamascai, xehqui pataxbi jahuenbi nihcahuantimahi. Jaan ca Papan joi jato yohiquin.
41002003	Jahuen yora honanyamajaquetai joni sca hihuehi becani, chosco joni.
41002004	Joni tsamajaquetaiboya Jesus pataxti hahtipahyamaxon Jesus mahchi xobo pemacanya tsecaquin. Quinijaxon jahuen cacajatiyabi jaa joni botonpaquecanquin. Yora honanyamajaquetai joni hahan racatai bi botonpaquecanquin.
41002005	Rohajatihi shinancoinaibo jisxon yora honanyamajaquetai joni sca Jesusen yohiquin: —Miin hohcha ta sohuá scah qui, baquen —hahquin.
41002006	Jano rihbi cahen jaton jointinin shinani tsahocani huishani joi honanbo.
41002007	—¿Jahua jenquetsahin nea jonin jascajaquin yohihiquin? Tiromahi ta yohuanihqui. Papa huestichin ta hohcha sohuati hahtipahiqui —hihcani jaton jointinin.
41002008	Jaton jointinin jascajaquin shinanaiboya jahuen shinaman honanscaxon Jesusen jato yohiquin: —¿Jahua jenquetsahin man jascajaquin shinanain maton jointinin?
41002009	¿Jahue meha joi nea yora honanyamajaquetai joni yohiti hashoan teema quin? ¿Miin hohcha ta sohuá scah qui hihqui nan? ¿Hueníhue, miin cacajati bichish caresscatanhue hihqui nan? ¿Jahue meha hashoan yohiti teema quin nan?
41002010	Nai nequebihoxon hohcha sohuati hihbo hea jai man honannon hihxon tah hen nea sca yohihi —jato jaxon yora honanyamajaquetai joni sca yohiquin:
41002011	—Mia ta hen yohihi. Huenihue. Miin cacajati bichish miin xobon caresscatanhue —hahquin.
41002012	Yohihah huenixon jahuen cacajati bichish res sca jaton jisnonbi caini. Jatihixonbi jisish rahtetax siripi Papa qui yohuancani: —Jahuentianbi tah non jascajahi jisyamaniqui —hihcani.
41002013	Hian quexa sca cahen Jesus caribihi. Jatihibi jonibo hahqui tsamajaqueti, jaan jato haxemanon.
41002014	Jano huinoquin bi Leví sca meraquin Alfeonen baque. Janoxon coriqui cobranti janin hapobaana cobranxoni tsahotai meraquin. Meraxon: —Hehbe cahue —hahquin. Jan jascahah huenicahuanax hahbetan cahi.
41002015	Pihi benahue hahca Levin xoboho sca jahuen haxenicaboyabi Jesus cahi. Jesus betan hicha joni bocani. Nocotax pihi tsahoti hicha cobranxonaiboya hicha hohchayahpabo rihbi jano tsahoti.
41002016	Hohchayahpaboya cobranxonaibo betan Jesusen pihi jisxon huishani joi honan fariseobaan jahuen haxenicabo yocacanquin: —¿Jahuejanoxon cobranxonaiboya hohchayahpabo betan pihiquin? —hahcanquin.
41002017	Jascajaquin yocacaibo nincaxon Jesusen jato yohiquin: —Hisinjomabo pishinaima bi ta hisinyahpabo rahonica pishinihqui. Hohchajoma jonibo quenahima bi tah hen hohchayahpabo quenahi joniqui —jato jaquin.
41002018	Jaatian sca cahen Juaman haxematibaan piti tenenish. Fariseobaan rihbi piti tenequin. Jesus qui caxon fariseobaan Jesus yocaquin: —¿Jahua jenquetsahin Juaman haxenicabaan piti tenenon fariseobaan haxenicabaan rihbi tenehi bi minabaan piti teneyamahihquin? —hahcanquin.
41002019	Jesusen jato yohiquin: —¿Jato betan huanohi joni hihparihiya huanoquin quenamahibaan piti tenetihiquin? Jato betan huanohi joni hihparihiya ta piti tenetimahihqui.
41002020	Huetsatian ta jatoma qui huanohi joni hionyaxihcanihqui. Jaatian pari ta piti teneyaxihcanihqui quenamahibaan.
41002021	Tsoanbi ta hotsinica chopan chopa payo honayamahihqui. Jascajaquin honahah ta hona teresihqui hashoan huaxascai.
41002022	Tsoan rihbi ta hompa rahma nehsehihqui bichi borasa xeni qui mahneyamahihqui. Jascahah ta hompa pohtoshihmatihiqui, xehati yohyocohnon borasa rihbi masascanon. Hompa rahma nehsehihqui ta borasa behna qui mahneti qui —hahquin Jesusen.
41002023	Huesti tantiti neten sca cahen trigo huai nabebacahini cahi. Hahbetan caquin jahuen haxenicabaan trigo bimi tesabonaquin.
41002024	Fariseobaan sca Jesus yohiquin: —Jise. ¿Jahua jenquetsahin jaabaan jascajahiquin, tantiti neten jascajatima joi jai bi? —hahcanquin.
41002025	Jascahahbo jato yohiquin: —¿Jahua pitimahiya hahbe cahibo rihbi pihan hihquiya jaa rihbi pihan hihxon Davidinin hahni man jisyamaniquin huishani joi janin?
41002026	Abiatar sacerdotebaan hapo hihqui tian ta Papan xoboho David hihconishqui. Jaa paan sacerdotebaan res piti que bi jaan piquin. Jahuen jonibo rihbi piquihinquin —jato jaquin.
41002027	Jato jascajaxon yohirihbiquin: —Tantiti nete copi joni jaima bi ta joni copi tantiti nete jaiqui.
41002028	Jaa copi ta hea noque baque tantiti nete hihbo qui —jato jaquin.
41003001	Jaton haho tsinquiti xoboho cahen Jesus hihcorihbihi. Meyosmahi noque jano rihbi jai.
41003002	Jesus jisquin sirijascacanquin. —Rohaja ra ta jatihiqui tantiti neten hihqui bi —hihxon jiscanquin jaya yohuanti janoxon cahecatsihquin.
41003003	Jesusen sca meyosmahi yohiquin: —Noque tocanbi johue —hahquin.
41003004	Jascajaxon tsahotaibo yocaquin: —¿Tantiti neten sirijati joi jaiquin? ¿Masajati joi jaiquin? ¿Teehihmati joi jaiquin? ¿Rehteti joi jaiquin? —jan jascahah bi jahua hihyamacani.
41003005	Benaya bi sinaxon sca Jesusen jato bejispaquequin. Jointi chahomayabo copi benati. Meyosmahi sca yohiquin: —Miin mequen sanahihnihue —hahquin. Sanahihnihax rohascai.
41003006	Jaa rohajahi jisish cainax herodianobo betan sca fariseobo hahqui yohuancani: —¿Jenquetsahaxon non Jesus mahuamatihin? —hihcani yohuani.
41003007	Hian janin sca jahuen haxenicabo betan Jesus caresscai. Hahchon bocani hicha jonibo tsama bi res. Galilea mai mehax, Judea mai mehax.
41003008	Jerusalen janinhax, Idumea janinhax, Jordan hoque quexa quehax, Tiro janinbohax, Sidon janinbohax. Tsama bi res hahqui cahax tsamajaqueti. Jatihibi jan hahcaibo nincacax tsamajaqueti hashoan nincacatsihqui.
41003009	Main tsamajaquetaibo hahqui tsehquesihquiboya jahuen haxenicabo sca yohiquin: —Nonti jistannahue non hahan canon —hahquin.
41003010	Jan hicha rohajahipi copi hisinyahpabaan jatihixonbi Jesus mehecatsihquish hahqui tsamajaquetax tsehquesihqui.
41003011	Yoshin tiromabaan rihbi Jesus jisish hahqui betihipaquetax joi coshin yohuani: —Mia tah min Diosen baque qui —hihcani.
41003012	Jonibaan yoshin jascari yohuanai nincayamanon hihxon, jato hihti yohiquin: —Yohuanyamanahue —hahquin.
41003013	Mananahbo sca cahi. Caxon jan caisaibo quenaquin. Quenahah hahqui bocani.
41003014	Doce joni cahen caisquin, hahbetan nihnon. Papan joi yohinicabo raannoxon jato caisquin.
41003015	Tiroma yoshin potati hihbobo hihnon jato caisquin.
41003016	Huetsa cahen Simon. Jaa cahen Pedro janequin.
41003017	Huetsa cahen Jacobo, Zebedeon baque. Huetsa cahen Juan Jacobonen huetsa. Jabo rabe Jesusen Boanerges janequin. Boanerges cahen terenhihca baquebo hihcatsihqui.
41003018	Huetsa cahen Andres, huetsa cahen Felipe, huetsa cahen Bartolomé, huetsa cahen Mateo, huetsa cahen Tomas, huetsa cahen Alfeon baque Jacobo, huetsa cahen Tadeo, huetsa cahen Simon Celador,
41003019	huetsa cahen Judas Iscariote, Jesus bihmanica. Jaa rahsi caisquin, doce joni.
41003020	Xobon sca Jesus cahi. Hahquirihbi tsamajaquetaiboya piti hahtipahyamascaquin.
41003021	Jascascai nincacax jaa bichi sca jahuen jenabo cahi. —Tehquehih sca ta jaiqui —hihxon jaa bichi bocani.
41003022	Jerusalen janinhax jahuex huishani joi honanbo rihbi yohuani: —Tiroma yoshin hapon yanapana ta tiroma yoshin picohihqui. Beelcebunen ta jaa hihbojascaiqui —hihcani.
41003023	Jascahiton: —Benahue —jato jaquin. Jahuiboya sca jaa patax queha joibo sca jato yohiquin: —¿Jenquetsahaxon Satanasnen Satanas picotihiquin?
41003024	Huesti mai mehax jaabo rahsibi rehtenananax ta queyoscatihiqui.
41003025	Huesti xobo mehabo jaabo rahsibi rehtenananax ta jaabo queyoscatihiqui.
41003026	Satanas hahbe Satanas betan rehtehahax cahen jaabo queyoscaan, hahri queyocani.
41003027	Coshi jonin xoboho ta tsoabi yometsohti hihcoti hahtipahyamahiqui, hihbo nexayamahax. Hihbo nexaxon pari ta jahuen jahuaborabo bichintihiqui, jatihibi queyobahinnoxon.
41003028	Yohicoin ta hen mato jai: jatihibi hohcha ta jonibo sohuatihiqui. Papa qui tiromahi yohuanaibo rahsi rihbi ta sohuatihiqui.
41003029	Jascapahbo sohuaxon bi ta Dios Yoshin qui tiromahi yohuanaibo Papan jahuentianbi sohuatimahiqui. Jascapa hohcha ta jascabihi sca banetihiqui —jato jaquin.
41003030	Jaa ta tiroma yoshinyahpa qui jaabo jai copi cahen jato jascajaquin.
41003031	Jahuen mama betan jahuen huetsabo sca nocoti. Jemanhihti janin nihxon Jesus quenamacanquin.
41003032	Tsamajaquetax tsahotaibaan sca yohixonquin: —Miin mamaya miin huetsabo ta jeman qui. Mia ta quenamacaniqui —hahcanquin.
41003033	Jaan sca joi bichinquin: —¿Tsoa heen mama quin? ¿Tsoa heen huetsabo quin? —hahquin.
41003034	Tsahohahtancahuanaibo bejispaquexon sca: —Neabo ta heen mama heen huetsabo qui.
41003035	Papa queenai quescajanicahbo ta heen huetsa, heen choca, heen mama qui —jato jaquin.
41004001	Jaatian sca cahen hian quexaxon Jesusen jato haxemaribiquin. Hicha joni hahqui tsamajaquetaiya nontin nanetax tsahoti tsamajaquetaibo hian quexa banenon.
41004002	Janoxon sca hicha jaa patax queha joi jato haxemaquin.
41004003	—Nincanahue. Mihsahahnicahton cahen jahuen bimi bero mihsahahbonahi cahan.
41004004	Jan mihsahahca can caibo bero bahinbi paqueti. Jano paquetaibo topibonahi sca hihsabo cahi queyobonahi.
41004005	Mai chahoma janin caibo rihbi paqueti. Hihquiyamahax histon joconi.
41004006	Joconai bi barin hahca hashoan xanahax jahuen tapon chicho cayamahax pehuahax res sca xanahi.
41004007	Moxa tocan rihbi caibo bero paqueti. Moxa pari hanixon rishquihah bimi yamahi.
41004008	Mai siri janin rihbi caibo paqueti. Hanihax bimihi siripi. Jaa bero hanihax bimihi caibo quiha treinta bero, caibo quiha sesenta bero, caibo quiha cien bero sca jai.
41004009	Hahan nincati pabinquiyahpaxon nincanahue —jato jaquin.
41004010	Tsamajaquetai jonibo boresscaiya Jesus qui banejaquetax jahuen doce jaabo yocacahcani. Jan yohiha jaa patax queha joibo honancoincatsihqui yocacahcani.
41004011	Yocaca jato yohiquin: —Papan jihuemahi jone joi mato honanmaxon tah hen jaa patax queha joi rahsi jaabo nincamahi nincayosmabo quen.
41004012	Jis jisxon bi jisyamahabo, ninca nincaxon bi nincayamahahbo, jaton shinan pontehax jaton hohcha yamamis hihxon nincayamahibo copi tah hen jaa patax queha joi rahsi jato nincamahi —jato jaquin.
41004013	Jato jascajaxon Jesusen yocaquin: —¿Hen rahma yohiha jaa patax queha joi man honanyamahin? ¿Jenquetsahaxon sca man jatihibi jaa patax queha joi honantihin?
41004014	Bero mihsahahquin hahcajaquin ta mihsahahnicahton joi yohibonahihqui.
41004015	Bahinxon nincacaibo ta nescapah qui. Yohibonahi joi nincacaibaan bi ta Satanas joresscaxon jaa joi jato bichinihqui.
41004016	Jascajaquin rihbi ta mai chahoma janinxon joi nincamaha jenimarenenscacaniqui. Nincacoinax, jenimacani.
41004017	Jenimahax bi jaton tapon chicho cayamahax quescaxon basimaxon jenescacanquin. Jaa joi jaiton caibaan jato hosan hosana jenescacanquin. Nincacaibo copi caibaan tiromajacatsihquin chibana jenescacanquin.
41004018	Caibo rihbi ta yohibonahi joi moxa tocanxon nincacaibo qui.
41004019	Jahuen teebo jan shinanai ta moxa quesca qui. Coriquiyahpati shinanax paramehti, jahuaborabo jan hashoan queenyorahi rihbi ta moxa quesca qui. Jaan rishquihah bimiyamascai.
41004020	Mai siri janin joi nincamaha ta nincacoinnicabo qui. Bimihi siripi. Huesti bero joconax caichi, caibo quiha treinta, caibo quiha sesenta, caibo quiha cien bero —jato jaquin.
41004021	Jaatian sca jato yocaquin: —¿Jahuejahi non johueyahpa chiqueho jotihin? ¿Quenti behonbohana naman tsahonih nan? ¿Jano hoxati tapo naman tsahonih nan? ¿Jano johue tsahonti janin tsahoni non jaaya joyamahin?
41004022	Yohiyamayaxihqui jone joi ta yama qui. Joneha jismayamayaxihquibo yamarihbihi.
41004023	Hahan nincati pabinquiyahpaxon nincanahue.
41004024	Man nincacai nincaquin sirijanahue. Man hinannoxon toponaitihi ta jatíhi rihbi mato hinantihiqui. Hashoan rihbi sca ta mato hinantihiqui.
41004025	Jaibo bi ta hashoan jaan hinantihiqui. Yamahibo bi ta jaabo jai pishca jato bichintihiqui —jato jaquin.
41004026	Jascajaxon jato yohirihbiquin: —Papan jihuemahi ta nescapah qui. Huesti jonin cahen bimi bero main mihsahahbonahan.
41004027	Hoxashinahax mohiyahtax, jasca jan hicha neten jaiya, jan mihsahahbonahipi bero joconscaax hanihi. Jenquetsahax hanihiquin jaan honanyamaquin.
41004028	Main joconaibo ta hahmebi bimihihqui. Pehi pari caini, bimihax res sca bero caniscai.
41004029	Canihiton ta tsinquiscanoxon xatebonacaniqui —jato jaquin.
41004030	Jascajaxon jato yohirihbiquin: —¿Papan jihuemahi ta nescapah qui hihxon non jahua yohuan jatihin? ¿Jahua jaa patax queha joi non jatihin, Papan jihuemahi joi nincamanoxon?
41004031	Papan jihuemahi ta moxo bero quescapah qui. Main banahah bi ta jatihibi jihui bero mentan moxo bero hashoan hexti romishin qui.
41004032	Jascapah cahen banahipi joconi. Hanihi. Jatihibi banabo mentan hashoan hanihi. Hihtihosi mebihi, hotahi joxon hihsabaan sca jano nahajanon —jato jaquin.
41004033	Jascajaquin hicha jaa patax queha joi yohixon Papan joi jato nincamaquin jaabaan nincati hahtipahi tihi.
41004034	Jaa patax queha joi rahsi jato yohiquin. Huetsa jonibo jato betan hihyamascaiya cahen jahuen haxenicabo rahsi jatihibi yohiquin sirijascaquin.
41004035	Jaa neten bari hihquiscaiya cahen jahuen haxenicabo yohiquin: —Hoque quexa pohquejaqueti bonahue —hahquin.
41004036	Tsamajaquetaibo jenebahinax res sca hahan jan tsahotai nontin Jesusyabi pohquejaquecani. Huetsa nontibo rihbi hahchon pohquejaqueti.
41004037	Nihuehnhuan sca jahui. Behchoman nonti tsahcaquin. Nonti qui nachicohti jene bochonon.
41004038	Jascarai bi Jesus nonti chishqui quiri hoxahi. Nonti tsahotinin racatax tepitinin tepihax hoxahi. Mohinxon sca yocacanquin: —Maestron, ¿non mahuataiya mia jahua hihtimahin? —hahcanquin.
41004039	Mohinah nihueyahpa hian yohiquin: —Tantiscahue. Behchonyamascahue —jan jascahah nihue tantihi, behchon yamascai.
41004040	—¿Jahua jenquetsi man raquetain? ¿Man shinancoinyamahin? —jato jaquin.
41004041	Jan jascahah rahtetax yohinanancani: —¿Jahua hihxon yohihah nihuen bocabi nincaquihquin? ¿Hiaman bocabi nincaquihquin? —hihcani.
41005001	Hian hoque quexa Gadara mai qui sca nococani.
41005002	Nonti janinhax mapetaiton yoshin tiromayahpa joni Jesus behchihi jahui. Tsahonnihbo janin cahuan cahuani jihuetax joxon behchiquin.
41005003	Tsahonnihbo janin jaa cahuan cahuani nihrasihi. Tsoanbi nexati hahtipahyamahi joni, cadenanen bocabi nexatimahi.
41005004	Hicha coti cadenanen tanexxon menexahbaan bi jaan cadenabo tehcaquin, hahan tanexahbo tehcapaquequin. Jaa xecoti tsoabi coshi yamahi.
41005005	Jascabi tsahon tocan nichish mahchi rihbi manichish sai saihihshinahax sai saihihbahinahax hahmebi macaman tsehuérahsihi.
41005006	Jaan cahen hochoxon Jesus jisish hishtoquihrani jahuex hahqui betihihpaqueti.
41005007	Picohue Jesusen jaá bi betihihpaquexon coshin bi res yohiquin: —¿Hea min jahuejatihin, Jesusen, queya queha Diosen baquen? Diosen noque jisnon tah hen mia hihti yocacai: hea tiromajayamahue —hahquin.
41005008	—Jahuen yora mehax picohue, yoshin tiroman —Jesusen jaá jascajaquin.
41005009	Jesusen sca yocaquin: —¿Mia min jahua jane quin? —hahquin. —Heen jane ta Legion qui, noque non hichahi copi —hahquin.
41005010	Jascajaxon yoshiman hihti yocaquin, huetsa main jato camayamanon.
41005011	Jano rihbi ta hicha repinica cochi janishqui mananan pibonahibo.
41005012	—Cochi qui sca noque camahue, jato qui non hihquinon —hahquin yoshiman hihti yocaquin.
41005013	Jascajaha Jesus jeenhihqui. Yoshin tiromabo picotax res sca cochi qui sca hihquihi. Hihquihiboya jaa repinica dos mil rocohihcanahax quempe janinhax cayahax jenenencanya hihquihax hahsatax mahuati.
41005014	Cochi coirannicahbo sca jabaxon yohibonaquin jema janinxon, huenemanxon rihbi. Jaabaan yohihah cahen jahuahi jacanaxquin hihquish honani sca bocani jano jihuetaibo.
41005015	Jesus qui nocoxon yoshinyahpa hihrasihi joni jiscanquin. Yoshiman hichaxon hihbojani bi jano siripi tsahotai jiscanquin. Chopayahpahax res sca tsahotai jahuen shinan siriscai jiscanquin. Jisish raquecani.
41005016	Jan cochi qui yoshin mahnebohanxon yoshinyahpa joni rohajahi jisibaan ja to yohihah hihti raquecani.
41005017	Nincacax raquexon sca Jesus hihti yocascacanquin. Noquen mai mehax catanhue hahcanquin.
41005018	Nontin Jesus nanetaiton cahen yoshinyahpa hihrasihiton hihti yocascaquin, hahbetan cacatsihquin.
41005019	Jan jascahah bi Jesus jeenhihyamahi. —Miin caibo yohihi miin xoboho catanhue. Mihon shinanxon miin hihbaan mia hahxonai jatihibi yohitanhue —hahquin.
41005020	Jan jascahah yohihi caxon yohibonaquin. Decápolis jemabo janinhahbo yohiquin. Jatihibi Jesusen jaa hahxonai yohibonaquin. Jan yohibonaha jatihibi rahtecani.
41005021	Jaatian sca Jesus hoque quexa nontin pohquerihbihiya hicha joni hahqui tsamajaqueti. Hian quexa sca cahen jaa nichi.
41005022	Hapo sca nocoti. Jairo janeya, haho tsinquiti xobo hapo. Jesus jisish jahuen tahe qui betihipaquexon hihti yocaquin:
41005023	—Heen baque haibo pishca ta mahuacatsihquiqui, hapon. Miin mequeman mehexoni cahue. Rohahax jihuenon —hahquin.
41005024	Hahbetan sca Jesus cahi. Cahiya hichaxon Jesus chibancanquin. Tsehquesihcanahi bocani.
41005025	Jato betan rihbi huesti haibo cahi, doce bari sca jimihi hisinish.
41005026	Hicha rahonnicabaan rahonah bi rohayamahi, hohmis hohmisi, jahuen coriqui queyoquin. Rahonahbaan bi jascabi hisini, nanocohcanaribihi.
41005027	Jesusen hahcai nincacax tsamajaquetaibo tocan nichish hahchon cahi. Hahchon caquin sca jahuen chopa mehequin.
41005028	Jahuen yora meheyamaxon bi jahuen chopa pishca mehehax tah hen rohascatihi, hihxon mehequin.
41005029	Mehehax jimi tantiscai. Jahuen hisin rohascai jahuen jointinin honanquin.
41005030	Jesusen sca jahuen yora janinhax coshi cahi jahuen jointinin honanxon tsamajaquetaibo tocan rabejaquecahuanxon jano nichibo yocaquin: —¿Tsoan heen chopa mehehaxquin? —jato jaquin.
41005031	Jahuen haxenicabaan sca yohiquin: —¿Nea tsamajaquetaibo mihqui tsehquesihqui jisi bi min Tsoan hea mehehaxquin hihqui yocacahtain? —hahcanquin.
41005032	Jascajahibaan bi Jesusen jisjaquehtanquin, honannoxon.
41005033	Jan hahxonah honanax raquetax tastahihcanahi jahuex Jesus qui betihihpaquexon hihcoinjaquin sca haibaan jatihibi yohiquin.
41005034	Jaa cahen Jesusen yohiquin: —Baquen, min shinancoinai copi tah min rohascai. Shinanquin sirijahax caresscatanhue, miin hisin rohascaax caresscatanhue —hahquin.
41005035	Jan yohuanai betanbi hapon xobo janinhax jahuibo nocoti. Nocoxon tsinquiti xobo hapo yohicanquin: —Moa ta miin baque mahuascaaxqui. ¿Jahuejanoxon sca min maestro jatsanjahin? —hahcanquin.
41005036	Jascajahibo nincaxon Jesusen jaa hapo yohiquin: —Raquexonma shinancoinhue —hahquin.
41005037	Caquin sca tsoabi hahbetan camayamaquin. Pedro, Jacobo, Jacobonen huetsa Juan, jaabo rahsi Jesusen boquin.
41005038	Cahi, hapon xoboho nococani, haho tsinquiti xobo coiranicahton xoboho. Nocoxon corotaibo jisbonaquin, huaohihquiboya hihti huinihibo.
41005039	Hihcoxon Jesusen jato yocaquin: —¿Jahua jenquetsahin man huaohihqui coro corotain? Mahuatihma bi ta xontaco hoxahihqui —jato jaquin.
41005040	Jascajahiton hosancanquin. Hosan hosana Jesusen jato jatihibi jeman cainmaquin. Jahuen papa, jahuen mama, hahbe jahuibo, jaabo rahsi cainmayamaquin. Jano xontaco racataiton sca jato betan Jesus hihcohi.
41005041	Xontaco metsonxon: —Talita, cumi —hahquin. Haibo pishcan, mia tah hen yohihi huenihue, hihcatsihqui.
41005042	Jan jascahah huenitax nichi. Doce bari jai xontaco. Jisish rahte rahtecani.
41005043	Jan xontaco hahxonai tsoabi yohiyamahahbo cahen Jesusen jato hihti yohiquin. Jascajaxon: —Xontaco piti hinannahue —jato jaquin.
41006001	Janohax res sca cahen jahuen mai janin sca Jesus caribihi. Jahuen haxenicabo rihbi hahbetan bocani.
41006002	Tantiti neten sca haho tsinquiti xobohoxon jato haxemaquin. Nincacax hicha jonibo rahte rahteti. —¿Jahuerahnohax nescapa yohuan haxenishquin? ¿Jenquetsahpa shinan bihnishquin? ¿Jahua coshin jahuen mequeman hahquiquin?
41006003	¿Hoa carpinteroma hin? ¿Marian baquema hin? ¿Jacobo, José, Judas, Simon jahuen jochicaboma hin? ¿Jahuen chocabo neno noque tocan jihueyamahiquin? —hihcani hahqui sinati.
41006004	—Huetsancohabo Papan joi yohinicahon queenaibaan bi ta jahuen mai janinhahbo res jahan queenyamahihqui. Jahuen jenabo, jahuen xobo janinhahbo rihbi jahan queenyamacani —Jesusen jato jaquin.
41006005	Jaa jema janinxon ta jahuen coshin jato hahxonti hahtipahyamanishqui, huestibo res hisinaibo mehexon rohajaquin.
41006006	Hihcoinai jaabaan shinanyamahi copi Jesus rahteti. Jemabo janin sca haxemabonahi cahi.
41006007	Jahuen doce quenaxon yoshin tiromabo picoti jato hihbomaxon rabe rabebo jato raanquin.
41006008	Raannoxon jato hihti yohiquin, mequen botanahbo, huesti hahqui paxati mepitiya res bohabo. Piti boyamanon, borasa, jaya cati coriqui rihbi boyamanon.
41006009	Sapato sahuequin bi rabe coton sahueyamanon.
41006010	—Xoboho hihcohax janobi banenahue, jaa jema janinhax canoxon caman.
41006011	Mato Johue hahyamaxon mato nincacatsihyamahiboya janohax caquin maton sapato qui hueotai mai poto jato qui tahabahini botannahue yohitimabohi honanahbo —jato jaquin.
41006012	Jaan jascajaha boresscacani, shinan pontenahue jato jabonahi bocani.
41006013	Hicha yoshin rihbi picocanquin. Hicha hisinyahpabo rihbi xeniyaxon bemanxon rohajacanquin.
41006014	Jascajahiboya cahen Jesusen joi jatihixonbi nincacanquin. Herodes janeya quiquin hapon rihbi nincaquin. Jesus yohihi cahen caibo nescari yohuannish: —Nashimanica Juan ta mahuatipish bi teehihribihiqui. Jaa copi ta jascajaquin coshin hahquiqui —hihcani.
41006015	—Elías yamanica tah qui —hihqui caibo rihbi. —Papan joi yohinica tah qui. Neateman Papan joi yohipahoni quescapah tah qui —hihqui caibo sca.
41006016	Jesusen hahcai nincacax Herodes sca jascarihbihi: —Juan ta jihuerihbihihqui. Hean rehtequin textebahinhoh bi ta teehihribihiqui —hihqui.
41006017	Jascari yohuanyahnoxon ta Herodias copi Juan bihmaxon Herodesnen Juan sipojanishqui. Herodias Felipenin haibo que bi ta Herodesnen bichinnishqui. Jahuen huetsan haibo bichinquin.
41006018	Bichinaiton cahen Juaman Herodes yohiquin: —Miin huetsan haibo bichintima joi ta jaiqui, noquen nincati joi —hahquin.
41006019	Jan jascahah Herodesnen haibo Herodias Juan qui rainyamahi jihuexon rehtecatsihquin bi hahtipahyamaquin, jahuen benen pantehah.
41006020	Juan ponte jihueti hohchajomahi honanax Juan qui raquequin Herodesnen coiranquin, caibaan rehtemis hihxon. Juan nincaxon jahua shinanti honanyamaquin bi nincaquin, coin coinxon.
41006021	Jahuen bari nocotai neten sca cahen Herodesnen fiestajaquin. Pihi jahuebo jahuen tinintibo quenamaquin, jahuen sontaro hapobo quenamaxon Galilea mai meha patorobo rihbi quenamaquin. Fiestajahiboya jahuen haibaan Juan copicatsihquin shinanquin: Rahma caya tah hen Juan rehteti hahtipahscai hihqui.
41006022	Fiestajahibo qui hihcohax Herodiasnen baque xontaco jato bairahxonaiya hahan Herodes hihti jenimahi, jan quenamahabo rihbi. Jenimaxon Herodesnen yohiquin: —Min queenaibo hea yocareshue, hen mia hinannon.
41006023	Jascajaxon Papa Dios quenaxon sca xontaco yohirihbiquin: —Min hea yocacaibo tah hen mia hinantihi, heen yonotibo jatíhi hena hihnon jatíhi rihbi mina hihnon caman —hahquin.
41006024	Yohiha jahuen mama yocaqui sca caresscai. —¿Jahua yocapan? —hahquin. —Nashimanica Juaman mapo rahan —hahquin jahuen maman.
41006025	Hapo qui histon caribixon sca yohiquin: —Nashimanica Juaman mapo tah hen queenai rahmabi. Quencha qui nanexon min hea hinanti tah hen queenai —hahquin.
41006026	Yocacah sca hapon masa shinanquin. Hihtijaquin masa shinanxon bi Dios quenaxon yohixon copi jahuen joi huetsajati hahtipahyamaquin. Jan quenamahibaan nincacah copi rihbi jeenhahscaquin.
41006027	Jeenhihxon, rehtexonnica sontarobo sca raanquin, jahuen mapo bihtanahbo. Raanah caxon carcel janinxonbi Juan textecanquin.
41006028	Quencha qui jahuen mapo nanehax jaya joxon xontaco hinancanquin. Xontaconen sca jahuen mama hinanrihbiquin.
41006029	Jascajahibo nincacax ta Juaman haxenicabo jahuen yora bichi canishqui. Jahuen yora bihxon tsahoncanquin.
41006030	Jesusen jato raanah catanipish Jesus qui jahuen raantibo joribihi. Joxon jaabaan hahtanipi yohixon jaabaan haxematanipi yohirihbiquin jatihibi.
41006031	Yohihiboya Jesusen jato yohiquin: —Mato rahsibi tantihi bonahue jano tsoabi yamahiton —jato jaquin. Cahi jahuibo hichahiya ta pinoxon bocabi tantiti hahtipahyamacannishqui.
41006032	Jano tsoabi yamahiton sca nontin bocani jaabo rahsibi.
41006033	Jaabo cahi cahen hichaxon jiscanquin. Jato honancanquin. Jatihibi jema janinhax quetanpaquebahini cahax jaabo pari nocoti, jano nontin cahi janin.
41006034	Nocoxon hicha tsamascaibo Jesusen jisbonaquin. Coiranyamaha carnerobo behnocanahi quescapahbo jato jisquin. Jatohon shinanxon hicha jato haxemarihbiquin.
41006035	Bepiscaiya sca hahqui joxon jahuen haxenicabaan yohiquin: —Neno ta jahua yamahihqui. Bepi rihbi sca ta jaiqui.
41006036	Jano huaiyahpabo jaiton jato raanscahue, hochoma jemabo janinxon rihbi jaton piti marohi cahabo —hahcanquin.
41006037	Jascahahbo: —Piti hinannahue, matonbi —jato jaquin. —¿Non doscientos denario copi paan marohi catihin, jato pimanoxon? —hahcanquin.
41006038	—¿Jahuentihi paan man jain? Jistannahue —jato jaquin. Jistani jahuex sca: —Pichca rahan. Rabe yapa rihbi —hihcani.
41006039	Jato jatihibi sca Jesusen yohiquin, cincuenta cincuentaboya cien joni rahsi jano huasi mipaxbihtaiton tsahonon.
41006040	Jascari tsinquitax tsahocani cincuenta cincuentabo, cien cienbo.
41006041	Jaton pichca paan bihxon jaton rabe yapa rihbi bihxon nai bejisihnixon Papa yocaxon paan tehcapaquexon jahuen haxenicabo hinanscaquin, tsamajaquetaibo hinanpaquehahbo. Yapa rabe rihbi jatihibi hinanpaquemaquin.
41006042	Hinanah jatihixonbi pihi yanicahini.
41006043	Paan tequeboya yapa tequebo tsinquirihbixon sca doce tasa bohasjacanquin.
41006044	Paan pihibo cahen cinco mil bebobo. Hichaxon bi jatihi tasa bocho texejacanquin.
41006045	Jaatian sca chini canoxon jahuen haxenicabo yohiquin, nontin nanetax Betsaida jema janin pohquejaquenon. Jaabo cahiya cahen tsamajaquetaibo Jesusen yohiquin xobon caresscatannon.
41006046	Jato yohihax manan manixon Papa yocaqui cahi.
41006047	Yamescaiya cahen nonti caresscai bi Jesus huesti main baneti.
41006048	Nihuen tsahcahah huinacasquimahibo bi jaan jato jisquin. Xaba paqueri jaima sca jato qui cahi, jene benicanahi. Jato huinobahincatsihqui bi jaabaan meraquin.
41006049	Jene benicahinquihranai jisish, Yoshin tah qui, hihquish sai saihihcani.
41006050	Jatihixonbi jisish hihti raquecani. —Jointi coshijanahue. Hea tah hen qui. Raqueyamanahue —jato jaquin.
41006051	Jato qui nontin nanetaiya cahen nihue tantiscai. Nihue tanticahinaiya hihti rahtescacani.
41006052	Paan tehcapaquexon jahuen coshi jan jato jismahipi bi honanyamacanquin, jaton shinan chahomahiya.
41006053	Pohquejaquetax Genesaret main taxnati. Taxnaxon nonti nexacanquin.
41006054	Nonti mehax bototaiton janohahbaan Jesus honancanquin.
41006055	Honanax jatihibinco hishtocahini caxon hisinyahpabo jaton cacajatinin racatai hihuecanquin. Jano Jesus jai nincaxon jano becanquin.
41006056	Jatihibinco jan cahi, hanitahma jemabo janin, hani jemabo janin, huenenaiton rihbi, hisinyahpabo bexon jano maronicabo tsinquitai hueneman jato racancanquin. Racanahbo Jesus yocacanquin jahuen chopa quechon bocabi mehenoxon. Jaa mehehibo jatihibi ta rohanishqui.
41007001	Jaatian sca huishani honanbo betan fariseobo Jesus qui tsinquicani, Jerusalen janinhax jahui honanbo. Tsinquixon jahuen haxenicabaan pihi jiscanquin.
41007002	Mechoquihxonma jaton mequen rishtayaxon texe jahuen haxenicabaan pihibo jiscanquin.
41007003	Mechoquihyamaxon ta fariseobaan piyamahiqui, jatihibi judiobaan rihbi jascajarihbiquin. Jaton xenibaan hahpahoni quescajaquin ta jacanihqui.
41007004	Jano piti maroti janinhax joxon ta nashiyamaxon piyamacaniqui. Hicha jascapahbo japahoni ta jacanihqui. Pinoxon ta posillobo, poobo, yami quentibo qui jene jasijacanihqui.
41007005	Fariseobo betan huishani joi honanbaan sca Jesus yocaquin: —¿Jahua jenquetsahin miin haxenicabaan noquen xenibaan hahpahoni quescajayamahiquin? Mechoquihxonma ta picanihqui. Jaton mequen qui hueotai hohchayabi ta picanihqui —hahcanquin.
41007006	Jascahahbo jato yohiquin: —Ponte bi res ta mato qui yohuanquin Isaiasnen huishanishqui: Nea jonibo jaton janan siripi hehqui yohuanai bi ta jaton shinan hocho bi res qui, hehon queenyamacani.
41007007	Papan joi haxemahicamaxon bi ta jonibaan joi honanmacanihqui. Yanca bi res ta hehqui betihipaquecanihqui hah ta Isaiasnen janishqui.
41007008	Jonibaan hahpahoni quescajaquin hahnoxon tah man Papan yohini joi jenehi.
41007009	Jato jascajaxon jato yohirihbiquin: —Sirija ra tah man jai, maton xenibaan hahpahoni quescascanoxon Papan joi jenequin.
41007010	Moisesnin ta yohinishqui: Miin papahon queenhue, miin mamahon queenhue. Huetsa jan yohini ta nea qui: Tiromahi jahuen papa qui yohuanai joni tah man rehteti jai, jahuen mama qui tiromahi yohuanai rehtequin cahneyamaquin.
41007011	Jaan jascajani que bi tah man matonbi yohihi: Maton papa, maton mama yohinahue Jaa hen mia hinanpanan ta Corban qui, hahquin. Corban ta Papa qui hinanah hihcatsihquiqui.
41007012	Jascari yohuanmaxon tah man jaton mama hahxontima haxemahi, jaton papa hahxontima haxemahi.
41007013	Jascajaxon tah man Papan joi pantehi, maton xenibaan hahpahoni quescajaquin tah man maton rihbi maton baquebo haxemahi. Jascapajahi tah man jai hicha —jato jaquin.
41007014	Jonibo quenarihbixon sca jato yohiquin: —Hea nincanahue, jatihixonbi honannahue.
41007015	Jahuabi ta noque chicho quehama noque qui nanexon noque rishtajatimahiqui. Noquen jointinin non shinanaiton ta noque rishtajahiqui.
41007016	Hahan nincati pabinquiyahpaxon nincahue —jato jaquin.
41007017	Jato potabahinax xobohoh hihcohiton jan jato yohiha jahuen haxenicabaan yocaquin, min yohiha jahua hihcatsihquiquin, hahquin.
41007018	Yocaca jato yohiquin: —¿Mato rihbi man honanti pishinain? Noque chicho quehamabo ta noque qui nanexon noque rishtajati hahtipahyamahiqui. ¿Man honanyamahin? —jato jaquin, jatihibi pitibo hahan jointi rishtajatima sca janon.
41007019	Jaatian sca: —Noquen jointi qui hihquihima bi ta poco janin res nanetihqui. Poco janin nanetax jaroma caini —jato jaquin.
41007020	Jato yohirihbiquin: —Noquen jointinin non shinanaiton ta noque rishtajahiqui.
41007021	Noquen jointinin tah non shinanai: tiroma shinanbo, benejomabo betan hihti, queejomabo betan hihti, yometsohti, joni rehteti, benoyahpabo betan hihti, queeyahpbo betan hihti
41007022	caibaan jahuequibo bichinti, tiromajati, paranti, tsiniti, notsi notsiti, joni qui tiromahi yohuanti, yohitimabohi, honanmabohi.
41007023	Jascapa tiromabo rahsi tah non noquen jointinin shinanxon hahcai rishtascanoxon —jato jaquin.
41007024	Jato jascahax janohax Tiro jema janinbo sca caresscai. Nocotax bi jan jano hihqui honanyamahahbo xoboho hihcocani. Hihcohax bi jenquetsahax jonetimahi.
41007025	Jesus nocotai joi nincacax huesti haibo jahui, jahuen haibo baque pishca yoshiman hihbojahi. Jahuex Jesusen tahe qui betihihpaqueti.
41007026	Jaa haibo ta judiobaan nahua hihpahonishqui, sirofeniciabaan jena. Jahuen baque janinhah yoshir picoxonti jaan hihti yocaquin.
41007027	—Baquebo pari pimanon. Baquebaan paan pihi bichinxon tah non hochitinin pinon potantimahi —hahquin Jesusen.
41007028	—Jascari rahan, Hihbon. Jaabi ta baquebaan paquehi paan tomes misa namanxon hochitinin pihiqui —hahquin haibaan.
41007029	—Jascarax tah min caresscatihi. Yoshin ta miin baque janinhax picoscaiqui —haibo jaquin.
41007030	Jan jascahah xoboho caxon jahuen baque bachiho racatai meraquin, siri scah.
41007031	Jaatian sca Tiro janinbohax cahi Sidon jema nabebacahini, Galilea hian janin carihbihi, Decapolis maibo nabebacahini cahi.
41007032	Cahiton bi pabe joni Jesus qui hiocanquin. Pabehax bi joyorihbi. Jesusen mehenon sca yocaxoncanquin.
41007033	Tsamajaquetaiboma qui pabe nihcahuancahuanquihnxon jahuen pabinqui janin jahuen metoti niaquin. Toshbanhahxon jahuen jana mehequin.
41007034	Nai bejisihnixon jointi xecahihnixon: —Efata —hahquin. Quehpemehhue hihcatsihqui.
41007035	Jascahiya jahuen pabinqui quehpemehscai, jahuen jana janpequehtax yohuani siriscai.
41007036	Jaa rohascaiya cahen Jesusen jato hihti yohiquin tsoabi yohiyamanon. Jan hihti yohihah bi hashoan hicha sca yohicanquin.
41007037	Hihti rahtetax yohuancani. —Jatihibijaquin ta sirijahiqui. Pabehibo nincamaquin. Joyobo yohuanmaquin —hihcani.
41008001	Jascasca jaiya hicha joni tsamajaquetaiya jahua pitimahiya jahuen haxenicabo quenaxon jato yohiquin:
41008002	—Nea tsamajaquetaibahon tah hen shinanai. Quimisha neten sca hehbetan hihxon bi ta jahuabi piyamacanihqui.
41008003	Pihaxma jaton xobon cahabo raanah ta bahin mehax jaton yora yosmajaquexihcanihqui, caibo rihbi hocho quehabo —jato jaquin.
41008004	Jascaha jahuen haxenicabaan: —¿Jenquetsahaxon non nea jonibo pimatihin, neno tsoabi jihueyamahiton? —hahcanquin.
41008005	—¿Jahuentihi paan man jain? —jato yocaquin. —Siete rahan —hihcani.
41008006	Tsamajaquetaibo sca jaan yohiquin, main tsahonon. Jaton siete paan bihxon Papa yocaxon tehcapaquexon jahuen haxenicabo hinanquin, jonibo sca hinannon hihxon. Bihxon sca jato hinanpaquecanquin.
41008007	Yapa romishin huestibo rihbi cahen jaabo jai. Jaa bihxon Papa yocaxon jato hinanmarihbiquin.
41008008	Hinanah pihi yanicahincani. Texehi tequebo tsinquirihbixon siete tasa bohasjacanquin.
41008009	Cuatro mil jonibo jano hihqui bi jato pimaxon cahabo jato camascaquin.
41008010	Jaatian sca jahuen haxenicaboyabi nontin nanetax Dalmanuta main sca cahi.
41008011	Fariseobo sca ta Jesus qui jonishqui. Joxon Jesus yohuanquihnquin, joi bichinnanancatsihquin. Papan hinanah hahan honanti jan jato jismanon hihxon yocacanquin.
41008012	Jascahiboya jointi hihti xecahihnixon jato yohiquin: —¿Jahua jenquetsahin nea rahma jihuetai jonibaan hahan honanti jiscatsihquiquin? Yohicoin tah hen mato jai: jahuabi hahan honantibi ta mato jismatimahihqui —jato jaquin.
41008013	Jato banescaax nontin nanerihbihax ramiho quexa sca cahi cahi.
41008014	Caquin bi piti boti shinanbehnocanquin. Huesti paan res nonti janin jai.
41008015	Coirametahbo jato yohiquin: —Jisnahue. Fariseobaan hahan paan soohihmati qui raquenahue. Herodesnen hahan paan soohihmati qui raquenahue —jato jaquin.
41008016	Jaa jan yohihi jaabo rahsibi sca yocacahcani: —Non paan yamahiya cahra noque yohihihquin —hihcani.
41008017	Jascajaquin shinanaibo honanxon Jesusen sca jato yocaquin: —¿Jahua jenquetsahin man paan yamahi yocacahnananain? ¿Man jiscoinyamaparihin? ¿Man honancoinyamaparihin? ¿Maton shinan chahoma sca quin?
41008018	¿Beroyahpaxon bi man jisyamahin? ¿Pabinquiyahpaxon bi man nincayamahin? ¿Cinco mil jonibo pimanoxon pichca paan hen tehcapaquehiya texehi teque tsinquirihbixon jahuentihi tasa man bohasjahoquin? ¿Man shinanyamahin? —jato jaquin.
41008019	—Doce rahan —hihcani.
41008020	—¿Siete paan cahran, hahan hen cuatro mil pimahiya texehi teque tsinquixon jahuentihi tasa man bohasjahipiquin? —jato jaquin. —Siete rahan —hihcani.
41008021	—¿Man honancoinyamaparihin? —jato jaquin.
41008022	Betsaida jema janin sca nococani. Nocotaiboya benche joni Jesus qui caibaan hiocanquin. Hioxon hihti yocacanquin, mehexonhue hahquin.
41008023	Yocacah benche metsonxon hiobonahi jemama qui cahi. Benchen bero qui toshbanhahxon mequeman mehexon sca yocaquin: —¿Min jisyamabiresain? —hahquin.
41008024	Jari jisxon: —Jihui nihcahuanai quescapahbo ta hen joni jisi —hahquin.
41008025	Jaatian sca jahuen bero meherihbihah coshicahinxon jisribiquin. Siriscaxon jatihibi sca jisquin sirijaquin.
41008026	Jahuen xobon sca jan catannon: —Jema janin hihquihaxma catanhue —Jesusen jaquin.
41008027	Jaatian sca jahuen haxenicaboyabi Jesus cahi, Cesarea de Filipo mai meha jemabo janin sca. Caquin jato yocaquin: —¿Hea tsoa hihqui shinancaniquin? —jato jaquin.
41008028	—Nashimanica Juan yamanica tah qui hih ta caibo jaiqui. Elías yamanica tah qui hih ta caibo rihbi jaiqui. Papan joi yohipahoni yamanica tah qui hih ta huetsabo rihbi jaiqui —hihcani jahuen haxenicabo.
41008029	Jaan sca jato yocarihbiquin: —¿Maton cahran? ¿Hea tsoa hihqui shinan man jain? —jato jaquin. —Mia tah min Cristo qui —hahquin Pedronen.
41008030	—Tsoabi jascajaquin yohiyamanahue —jato jaquin Jesusen.
41008031	Jaatian sca jato sirijaquin yohiquin: —Hea noque baque ta tiromajayaxihcanihqui. Hehon ta queenyamayaxihcanihqui hanibo, sacerdote hapobo, huishani honanbo. Hea ta rehteyaxihcanihqui. Rehtehipibo bi tah hen quimisha netenax hahquirihbi hueniyaxihqui —jato jaquin.
41008032	Jahuabi joi jonexonma jato jascajaquin. Jesus quenabohanxon sca Pedronen yohiquin: —Jascari yohuanyamahue —hahquin.
41008033	Rabejaquexon jahuen haxenicabo jisxon Pedro yohiquin: —Jascayamahue. Hea janinhax catanhue, Satanas. Papan shinanai quescajaquinma bi jonin shinanai quescajaquin tah min shinanai —hahquin.
41008034	Jahuen haxenicaboya tsamajaquetai jonibo nincaqui jonon sca jato quenaquin. Jato quenaxon: —Hehchon jocatsihxon tah man matobi man queenaima sca man hahtihi. Hea rehtehibaan bi tah hen heen Hihbo jenetimahi hihnahue, nete tihibi jascanahue. Jaatian tah man heen jihuetahbo jatihi.
41008035	Non mahuamis hihquibo ta mahuatihiqui. Hehqui hinamehxon heen joi siri nincacoinaibo ta rehtehah bi jihuetihiqui.
41008036	¿Mai jatihobi hihbojahax bi mahuatax jahuaya sca man banetihin?
41008037	¿Hahquirihbi teehihnoxon non copijaquin jahua hinantihin?
41008038	Rahma jaibo ta tsini tsinihibo qui, hohchapan baquebo. Hehqui hihtimahpai joni qui tah hen hea rihbi hihtimahyaxihqui. Heen joi qui hihtimahpai joni qui rihbi tah hen hea noquebaque hihtimahyaxihqui Papan yonotibo betan Papan shinanya jahuex jato qui hihtimahpi —jato jaquin.
41009001	Jascajaxon: —Mato ta hen yohicoinai: jahuen coshin Papan jihuemahi joresscai jisyanoxon caman ta texe neno nichibo mahuayamayaxihquiqui.
41009002	Jato jascahax seis neten sca hihxon Pedro, Jacobo, Juan jaabo rahsi Jesusen boquin. Hani mahchi jato maniquihnquin jaabo rahsibi. Jatoyabi maniscaax jaton jisnonbi huetsapahcahini.
41009003	Jahuen chopa xabareneni joxoshamani. Jascapa joxojahti ta tsoanbi main jihuetai pahtsanicaton hahtipahyamahiqui.
41009004	Elías yamanica betan Moises yamanica sca jato qui cainax Jesus betan yohuan yohuani.
41009005	Yohuanaibaan bi Pedronen sca Jesus yohiquin: —Maestron, noque neno hihqui ta siri qui. Quimisha tapasnonhue. Mina huesti, Moisesnina huesti rihbi, Eliasnena huesti rihbi —hahquin.
41009006	Jahua yohiti honanyamahax jascari yohuani. Hihti rahtecani.
41009007	Jato bochiqui cahen nai cohin maracahti. Nai cohin chicho quehax sca yohuani jai: —Nea ta hen hihti queenai heen baque qui. Jaa nincanahue —hihqui.
41009008	Nincaxon jisbohanrenenxon bi tsoabi jisyamacanquin. Jesus huesti jano jai meracanquin.
41009009	Jaa pecaho sca mahchi mehax botopaquexon Jesusen jato hihti yohiquin: —Man rahma jisí tsoabi yohiyamanahue. Hea noquebaque hihquipish bi hahquirihbi hueninon caman yohiyamanahue —jato jaquin.
41009010	Jan jascahah tsoabi yohiyamacanquin. Hihquipish bi hahquirihbi huenitihi jan hihqui bi jahua hihcatsihquiquin hihquish jaabo rahsibi yocacahanancani.
41009011	Jesus sca yocacanquin: —¿Jahua copi Elías pari ta jotihiqui huishani honanbaan jaiquin? —hahcanquin.
41009012	Jaan sca: —Hihcoini. Elías pari joti jai. Jatihibi rohajahi jahui. Hean sca hen mato yocanon: ¿Jahua yohihi nea huishani joi jaiquin? Noquebaque ta hihti tiromajayaxihcanihqui, hosan hosan rihbi ta jayaxihcanihqui.
41009013	Mato ta hen yohihi. Elías ta moa joresscanishqui. Jahuiton bi ta jaabo queenai quescajaquin jaabaan janishqui jayaxihquibo Papan huishani quescajaquin —jato jaquin.
41009014	Jahuen haxenicabo qui nocoxon sca jato qui hicha tsamajaquetaibo meracanquin. Huishani honanbo jato betan joi bichinanaiton jiscanquin.
41009015	Jesus jahui jisish rahtetax jatihibi tsamajaquetai jonibo sca hahqui bishquihihcahinxon hicotancanquin.
41009016	Jaatian sca jaan jato yocaquin: —¿Jahua yohuan man jato betan jain?
41009017	Yocacah sca tsamajaquetaibo meha huestichin yohiquin: —Heen baque ta hen mihqui hihuehahqui, Maestron, joyo yoshiman hihbojani quen.
41009018	Jan janoxon shinanaiton bi ta hueran paquehihqui. Bacox jancharahicahini. Jahuen xeta yeres yeres hahquin. Jahuen yora jestancahini. Picoxonhue hah hen miin haxenicabo jaah bi ta hahtipahyamacanaxqui —hahquin.
41009019	—Nincayosmabon, jascapahbo tah man qui. ¿Jahuentiho basi hen mato betan jatihin? ¿Jahuentiho basi hen mato tenetihin? Neno hehqui hihuenahue —jato jaquin.
41009020	Hahqui hihuescacanquin. Jesus meraxon cahen tiroma yoshiman beronan tastahihmaquin. Tastahihquish maihi taramehcanahi, bacox jancharahiquish.
41009021	Jahuen papa Jesusen yocaquin: —¿Jahuentiho basi nescari jihuescaiquin? —hahquin. —Baque pishcabihaxbi rahan.
41009022	Hicha coti ta chihi janin hueranrahsihiqui, jenenencanya rihbi hueranquin rehtecatsihquin. Hahtipahxon noque yanapanhue noquehon shinanxon —hahquin jahuen papan.
41009023	—¿Hahtipahxon nan? Shinancoinai jonin jisi ta jatihibi jati hahtipahti qui —hahquin Jesusen.
41009024	Yoshinyahpaton papa sca coshin yohuani: —Hen ta hen shinancoinai. Hen hashoan sca nincacoinnon hea yanapanhue —hahquin.
41009025	Hicha bishquihihcahinquiranax jahuex tsamajaquetaibo jisxon tiroma yoshin Jesusen yohiquin: —Joyo yoshiman, pabe yoshiman. Mia ta hen yohihi. Jahuen yora mehax picohue, jahuentianbi hahqui joyamascanoxon —hahquin Jesusen.
41009026	Sai saihihquish coshin tastahihmahax picoti. Beronan mahuati quescapi racati. Jatihibi sca yohuanquehancani: —Mahua sca ta jaiqui —hihcani.
41009027	Jesusen sca metsonxon huenihihnihah hueniscai.
41009028	Xoboho Jesus mapescaiya sca jahuen haxenicabaan jaabo rahsichin yocaquin: —¿Jenquetsahpahin non picoti hahtipahyamahaquin? —hahcanquin.
41009029	—Jascapa tah man Papa yocaxon res picotihi. Huetsajaxon tah man jenquetsahaxon bi picotimahi.
41009030	Janohax Galilea mai nabebacahini bocani. Jaabo jano cahi tsamajaquetaibaan honanti Jesus queenyamahi.
41009031	Jahuen haxenicabo res haxemabonanoxon jaabo rahsi nihquihinquin. Jato nihquihinquin yohiquin: —Jaton jonibaan hea bihnon ta hea hinanyaxihcanihqui. Bihxon sca tah hea rehteyaxihcanihqui. Rehtehahbo sca tah hen quimisha neten hihquish hahquirihbi hueniyaxihqui —jato jaquin.
41009032	Jan jascahah bi honancoinyamacanquin. Yocacahcatsihqui bi raquecani.
41009033	Capernaum jeman sca nococani. Xobohoxon sca Jesusen jato yocaquin: —¿Jahua yohuan man jaonahin? —hahquin.
41009034	Yocacah bi jahua hihyamacani. Tsoa non hashoan coshi quin yocacahnananhonahax bi rahma jahua hihyamascai.
41009035	Tsahoxon jahuen doce joni quenaxon sca jato yohiquin: —Bebocatsihqui joni ta chiniti jaiqui, jatihixon bi yononica —hahquin.
41009036	Huesti baque pishca bihxon naponbi nichinxon hicobehnanxon jato yohiquin:
41009037	—Nescapa baque pishca heen janen johue hahcai jonin ta hea rihbi johue hahquiqui. Hea johue hahcai jonin ta hea que ma bi hea raanni johue hahquiqui —jato jaquin.
41009038	Juaman sca yohiquin: —Huesti joni tah non merahipiqui, Hihbon. Miin jane yohixon tiroma yoshinbo picohi. Noque betan ta nihyamahiqui. Noque chibanyamahiya ta non jascajayamahue hahquipiqui —hihscai Juan.
41009039	Jesusen yohiquin: —Jascajaquin yohiyamanahue. Heen jane yohixon coshin hahcai joni ta hahcax res sca hehqui tiromahi yohuantimahihqui.
41009040	Noque panteyamahibaan ta noque yanapanihqui.
41009041	Yohicoin tah hen mato jai: mia Criston joni copi hahxoncatsihquin mia jene pishca xehamahi joni ta copijacoinyaxihquiqui.
41009042	Nescapa hea nincacoinai baque pishca hohchamahibo ta Papan hihti tiromajayaxihquiqui. Jascapahbo macanya tenexxon jenenencanya potahah sirijaquin shinantimahi bi ta Papan casticana hihti tiromajaquin shinanyaxihquiqui.
41009043	Miin mequeman tiromajanicahax mextehihhue. Mento jihuenish bi queyoyamanox manatah tiroma que ma bi ta rabe mequenyabi nocayosma chihi janin potahah hihti tiroma bi res qui.
41009044	Jano ta jaton xena jahuentianbi mahuayamahiqui. Jaa chihi rihbi ta jahuentianbi nocayamahiqui.
41009045	Miin tahen tiromajanicahax taxtehihhue. Tanto jihuenish bi queyoyamanox manatah tiroma que ma bi ta rabe taheya chihi janin potahah mia hihti tiromascatihi.
41009046	Jano ta jaton xena jahuentianbi mahuayamahiqui. Chihi rihbi jahuentianbi nocayamahi.
41009047	Miin beron tiromajanicaxon miin bero tsecahue. Huesti beroya jihuenish queyoyamanox manatah tiroma que ma bi ta rabe beroya chihi janin potahah mia hihti tiromascatihi.
41009048	Jano ta jaton xena jahuentianbi mahuayamahiqui, chihi rihbi jahuentianbi nocayamahi.
41009049	Tashi nepocah quesca ta jatihibi jonibo chihin jatiqui.
41009050	Tashi ta siri qui. ¿Tashi jahuíyamascaiton jahuínon hihxon jenquetsahaxon man hahquirihbi jahuíjatihin? Tashiyahpa jihuenahue. Joni huetsa betan siripi jihuenahue.
41010001	Janohax caresscai Judea mai janin, Jordan hoque quexa rihbi. Jano rihbi hahqui tsamajaquecani. Jan hahrasihi quescajaquin sca jato haxemarihbiquin.
41010002	Hahqui joxon sca tanacatsihquin fariseobaan yocaquin: —¿Bebaan jahuen haibo potati joi yama quin? —hahcanquin.
41010003	—¿Jahua Moisesnin huishanishquin, man jascajanon? —jato jaquin.
41010004	—Jascajati queenaibo ta Moisesnin yohinishqui: Bebaan ta jahan jahuen haibo potati quirica huishaxon jahuen haibo potatihiqui —hihcani.
41010005	Jesusen sca: —Man jointi chahomahi copi ta jascajaquin huishanishqui.
41010006	Nete jamenohi tian ta bebo betan haibo Papan jato jonijanishqui.
41010007	Jaa copi ta jahuen papaya jahuen mama jenebahinax jahuen haibo betan sca bebo jihueti canicah qui.
41010008	Jaabo rabehax bi huesti yora sca jihueti. Rabe hihyamascai, huesti yora sca jai.
41010009	Jaa copi jaabo rabe Papan huestijaha tsoanbi potamayamaxahtahi man —jato jaquin.
41010010	Xoboho sca jahuen haxenicabo jaa joi hahquirihbi yocacahti.
41010011	Jaan sca jato yohiquin: —Jahuen haibo potaxon huetsa haibo bichi joni ta jahuen haibo qui hohchati jihuetihqui, tsinihi.
41010012	Jahuen bene potaxon huetsa bebo bichi haibo rihbi ta jahuen bene qui hohchati jihuetihqui, tsinihi —jato jaquin.
41010013	Jaatian sca Jesus qui baquebo hihuecanquin jato mehexonnon. Hihuehiton jahuen haxenicabaan yohiquin: —Jascapahya joyamanahue —hahcanquin.
41010014	Jascajahibo jisish sinaxon jato yohiquin: —Panteyamanahue, hehqui baquebo behabo. Jascapah ta Papan jihuemati qui.
41010015	Nincanahue hen mato yohinon: baque pishcaten Papa Dios hihbojamahi quescajayamahax tah man Papan jihue janin jahuentianbi catimahi.
41010016	Jato jascajaxon baquebo hicotanxon mehexon Papa yocaxonquin.
41010017	Carihbihi bi huesti joni bishquihihcahinxon hahqui raboxonen tisquihahpaquexon yocaquin: —¿Jenquetsahax hen queyoyamanox manatihin, maestro siripan? —hahquin.
41010018	Jesusen sca yohiquin: —¿Jahua copi min hea siripan hahcain? Tsoabi ta sirima qui. Papa huesti ta siri qui.
41010019	Papan joi tah min honanai. Rehteyamahue. Tsiniyamahue. Yometsohyamahue. Caibo qui quesahi yohuanyamahue. Paranxon bichinyamahue. Miin papa, miin mama nincacoinhue —hahquin.
41010020	—Beronan pishcahax bi ta hen jascari jihuescai —hihqui yocanica.
41010021	Sirijaquin bejisxon sca jahan queenxon Jesusen yohiquin: —Huesti tah min pishinparihi. Jatihibi miin jahuequibo maromaxon jahuabijomabo coriqui hinantanhue naihoh quehax bi sca min hicha bi res jayaxahnon. Jascajatanax joribihue hehbe canoxon —hahquin.
41010022	Jan jascajaha jahuen jahuequibo hichahi copi metsamarenenax masa shinanbahini caresscai.
41010023	Jato jispaquexon sca jahuen haxenicabo Jesusen yohiquin: —Jahuequi hichayahpa joni jano Papan jihuemahi janin hihquiti ta tee bi res qui —jato jaquin Jesusen.
41010024	Jan jascajaha jahuen haxenicabo rahtecani. Rahtetaiton Jesusen jato yohirihbiquin: —Jano Papan jihuemahi janin hihquiti ta tee bi res qui, heen baquebaan.
41010025	Hahua xohmox bero chirehuinti tee que bi ta jahuequi hichayahpa joni jano Papan jihuemahi janin hihquiti hashoan tee qui —jato jaquin.
41010026	Jan jascajaha hihti rahtetax yohuancani: —¿Jascahiya tsoa non queyoyamanox manatihin? —hihcani.
41010027	Jato jisxon Jesusen yohiquin: —Jonibaan hahtipahyamahi bi ta Papan hahtipahiqui. Papan ta jatihibijati hahtipahiqui —jato jaquin.
41010028	—Jise. Jatihibi jenebahinax tah non mihbetan sca cahi —hihscai Pedro.
41010029	—Hen mato yohinon nincanahue. Jahuen xobo, jahuen huetsabo, jahuen chocabo, jahuen mama, jahuen papa, jahuen baquebo, jahuen huaibo, jaa rahsi hea copi, heen joi siri copi rihbi jenebahinai jonin ta jan potabahinai quescahpabo rihbi bihyaxihquiqui.
41010030	Bih ta jatihiqui xobobo, huetsabo, chocabo, mamabo, baquebo, huaibo. Huesti jenebahinnixon ta cien sca bihribiyaxihquiqui. Rahma tahni ta jascapahbo bihyaxihquiqui, caibaan sca jato tiromajacatsihquin jatsanjanon. Papan jihuemahitian rihbi ta queyoyamanox manatihiqui.
41010031	Hicha bebocanahibo ta chinijaqueyaxihquiqui. Chinitaibo ta beboyaxihquiqui —jato jaquin.
41010032	Jaatian sca bahin cahax, Jerusalen janin bocani. Jesus bebohi. Jano cahiya ta jan honanmahibo rahtecannishqui. Chibanaibo rihbi raquecani. Hahquirihbi jahuen doce joni quenabohanxon jaa huinoyaxihquibo jato yohiquin.
41010033	—Jisnahue. Jerusalen janin tah non cahi. Jano ta sacerdote hapobo, huishani honanbo rihbi hea hinanyaxihcanihqui. Hinanahbo ta Rehteti ta jaiqui hihxon nahuabo jaabaan sca hinanyaxihquiqui.
41010034	Hea hosanxon ta hehqui toshbanhahxon rishquixon rehteyaxihcanihqui. Rehtehipi bi tah hen quimisha neten hihquish hahquirihbi hueniyaxihqui —jato jaquin.
41010035	Jaatian sca Zebedeon baque rabe Jacobo betan Juan Jesus betanbi pecantaba cahi, yohuancanahi: —Non mia yocacai noque hahxonhue, Maestron —hahcanquin.
41010036	Jaan sca: —¿Jahueja mato jaxonti man queenain? —jato jaquin.
41010037	—Min jihuemahi tian noque tsahomaxahnhue, huetsa mia mecayaho, huetsa mia memiho —hahcanquin.
41010038	Jesusen jato yohiquin: —Man yocacai tah man honanyamahi. ¿Hean xehahi mocani man maton rihbi xehati hahtipahin? ¿Hahan hea nashimahiton mato rihbi nashimaha man teneti hahtipahin? —jato jaquin.
41010039	—Tenequin rahan —hihcani. —Hean xehahi mocani tah man maton rihbi xehatihi. Hahan hea nashimahiton ta mato rihbi nashimayaxihcanihqui.
41010040	Hea mecayaho tsahomati hihboma tah hen qui, hea memiho rihbi. Jano tsahonica rahsi ta jano tsahotihqui —jato jaquin.
41010041	Jacobo betan Juan jascaraiya nincaxon jahuen diez jonibo jato qui rainyamacani.
41010042	Jato quenaxon Jesusen yohiquin: —Nahua hapobaan ta jaton jonibo jihuematihi bi yono yonohihqui man tah man honanai. Jaton patorobaan rihbi jato coshin yonohi ta man honanrihbihi.
41010043	Mato tah man jascahpabo jatimahi. Maton hapocatsihqui ta maton yonoti jatihiqui.
41010044	Maton cacannicacatsihqui ta jatihibichin teexonnica jatihiqui.
41010045	Jascarihbihi tah hen hahxoni joníqui, yonohima. Hicha jihuetahbo tah hen mahuati joníqui, jaton ribin copijaxoni quescari.
41010046	Jericó jema janin sca nococani. Jahuen haxenicaboyabi cahax hicha joniboya rihbi janohax cahiya, bahimahhuan hihquicahuanax Timeon baque Bartimeo tsahoti. Bartimeo cahen benche joni, coriqui yocanica joni.
41010047	Jesus jano huinotai yohihahbo coshin quenaquin: —Hehon shinanhue, Jesus, Davidinin baquen —hahquin.
41010048	Jascaraiton: —Jascayamahue. Netehue —hahcanquin hichaxon. Jascahahbo hashoan coshin sca yohuani: —Hehon shinanhue, Davidinin baquen —hahquin.
41010049	Nihrenenxon Jesusen yohiquin: —Jaa quenanahue —jato jaquin. Benche joni sca quenacanquin: —Jenimahax huenihue. Mia ta quenamahiqui —hahcanquin.
41010050	Jahuen rahcoti potabahinax histon huenicahuanax Jesus qui cahi.
41010051	Nocotaiton Jesusen yocaquin: —¿Mia jahuejaxonti min queenain? —hahquin. —Heen bero hea rohajahue, Hihbon —hahquin benche jonin.
41010052	—Caresscatanhue. Hihcoinjaquin shinanax tah min rohascai —hahscaquin Jesusen. Rohascaxon Jesus chibanbonascaquin.
41011001	Jerusalen hochoma sca Betfagé jema patax Betania jema patax rihbi Olivos mahchi janin nocoxon Jesusen jahuen haxenica rabe raanquin.
41011002	—Man jano nichi hoque jema janin catannahue. Nocoxon tah man cabacho baque nexa meraxihqui, hahan tsoabi cahtsahoyamaparihi. Pecahax jaya jonoxahnahue.
41011003	Jahuejanoxon man jascajahin jaiboya, Noquen Hihbo ta nea pishinihqui. Rahmabi ta mihqui raanrihbinoxihquiqui, hahnahue —jato jaquin.
41011004	Caxon cabacho baque xehqui patax nexa meracanquin. Janibi bahin nichi meracanquin. Meraxon pecacanquin.
41011005	Pecahiton jano nichibaan jato yocaquin: —¿Jahua man jain? ¿Jahuejanoxon man cabacho baque pecahin? —hahcanquin.
41011006	Hihbaan yohiha quescajaquin sca jato yohicanquin. Yohiha jeenhihscacani, jaabo jaya catannon.
41011007	Cabacho baque sca Jesus qui hihuecanquin. Cabacho jaton chopabo cajanxon sca Jesus cahtsahoncanquin.
41011008	Caibaan rihbi jaton chopa bahinbi cacajaquin. Caibaan rihbi nahue chian pehi bihtanxon bahinbi cacajaquin.
41011009	Bebohibo betan chini cahibo coshin yohuanbonacani: —Hahxonhue, Papan. Nete Hihbaan raanah ta jahuiqui. Miin shinan siri jaa hinanhue, Papan.
41011010	Noquen xohta Davidinin jahuen jihuetahbo jihuemapahoni quescajaribiquin ta janoxihquiqui, jahuen shinan Papan hinanah. Jaa hahxonhue, Naihoh quehan.
41011011	Jerusalen jema janin hihquihax sca Papan xoboho Jesus hihcohi. Jatihibi jispaquehax moa bepiscaiya Betania jema janin caribihi jahuen doce joniyabi.
41011012	Hoxashinahax mohiyahtax sca Betania janinhax cahax pihan hihqui.
41011013	Hochoxon bimi jihui pehiyahpa jisxon bimijoma hin hihquish jisi cahi. Jihui qui nocoxon jahuabi merayamaquin pehi rahsi, jahuen bimiti tian nocorihyamahiya.
41011014	—Jahuentianbi sca miin bimi tsoanbi piyamanoxihnon —hahscaquin. Jihui yohiquin jan jascajahi jahuen haxenicabaan nincaquin.
41011015	Jerusalen janin nocorihbihax Papan xoboho hihcohi. Hihcoxon janoxon marohibo cainmaquin. Maromahibo picomaquin. Coriqui mahnenanaibaan misabo behonjanaquin. Nobex maromahibaan tsahotibo rihbi behonjanaquin.
41011016	Jaa xobon tsoabi jaton jahuabora papihibo huinomayamaquin.
41011017	Honanmaquin sca jato yohiquin: —Jatihibi mai mehabaan janoxon yocati xobo ta heen xobo jayaxihquiqui. ¿Jascapa huisha yama quin? Jai bi tah man jano yometsohtaibo joneti xobo man heen xobo jai —jato jaquin.
41011018	Jan jascajahi sacerdote hapobo betan huishani honanbaan nincaquin. Jatihibi tsamajaquetai jonibo jahuen honanmati joi qui rahtetaiya hahqui raquexon jenquetsahaxon non jaa rehtetihin hihxon shinancanquin.
41011019	Bepiscaiya jema janinhax bocani.
41011020	Yamequirihbi huinonbahinxon tapon caman bimi jihui xanascai meracanquin.
41011021	Jan yohuanipi shinanrihbixon sca Pedronen yohiquin: —Jise, Hihbon. Hoa bimi jihui min hahqui yohuanipi ta pehua sca jaiqui —hahquin.
41011022	Jesusen jato yohiquin: —Papahon shinancoinnahue.
41011023	Hen mato yohinon nincanahue: jahuen jointinin shinancoinyamaxonma bi shinancoinai jonin nea mahchi nescajaquin yohihiya, Huenitax, hian janin hueramehhue, jan yohihi quescabijaquin ta Papan hahxontihiqui. Jan yohihi Papan jascascajatihi shinancoinaiya ta Papan hahxontihiqui.
41011024	Jaa copi tah hen mato yohihi. Papa yocaxon man yocacaibobi man bihtihi shinancoinnahue. Jascajaquin yocaxon ta man bihtihi.
41011025	Nihxon Papa yocaxon mato qui hohchataibo shinanyamascanahue. Maton Papan rihbi naihohxon man hohchataibo shinanyamascanon.
41011026	Jascapa man shinanyamascatihi bi man shinanparihiya ta maton Papan rihbi naihohxon man hohchataibo shinanbehnotimahihqui —jato jaquin.
41011027	Jerusalen janin sca boribicani. Papan xoboho Jesus nichiya hahqui bocani sacerdote hapobo, huishani honanbo, judiobaan hanibo.
41011028	Hahqui caxon yocacanquin: —¿Jahuaxon min jascajahin? ¿Tsoan jascajahue hahca min jascajahin? —hahcanquin.
41011029	—Mato rihbi ta hen yocacai. Man hea yohihiya tah hen jahuaxon hen nescajahi hean rihbi mato yohitihi.
41011030	¿Tsoan raana Juaman nashimapahonishquin? ¿Papan nan? ¿Jonibaan nan? Hea yohinahue —jato jaquin.
41011031	Jaabo rahsi sca yocacahnanancani: —Papan rahan, hih non jaiya ta jaan sca noque yocatihiqui, Papan raana Juaman nashimahiya jahua jenquetsahin sca man jaa nincacoinyamanihquin?
41011032	¿Jonibaan rahan, hih cahra non jatihin? —hihcani tsamajaquetai jonibo qui raquetax. Papan joi yohinica Juan jai jatihixonbi shinanai copi jato qui raquecani.
41011033	Yocacahnananxon Jesus yohicanquin: —Non tah non honanyamahi —hihcani. —Hean rihbi ta hen mato yohiyamahi, jahuaxon hen nescajahi —jato jaquin Jesusen.
41012001	Jaa patax queha joi sca Jesusen jato yohiquin: —Huesti jonin cahen huai banahan. Banaxon chiquequin. Chiquexon macan quenchajaquin, bimibo jentsinnoxon. Janoxon huai coirannoxon sca tapojascaquin. Banaquin queyoxon sca caibo jahuen huai hinantahquin. Huai hihbo sca huetsa main cahi.
41012002	Bimi tian jan hinantaho hihbobo qui jahuen joni raanquin, bimi texe hinanahbo.
41012003	Nocotaiton rishquixon jahuabi bimijoma raanscacanquin.
41012004	Mequen bi res nocotaiya huetsa jahuen joni sca raanrihbiquin. Nocotaiton mapo qui tsehuejaxon tiromajacanquin.
41012005	Huetsa jahuen joni rihbi hapon raanrihbiquin. Jaa rehtecanquin. Huetsa rihbi jascajacanquin, caibo rishquixon caibo rehtequin.
41012006	Huesti sca jai, hahan jan shinanai jahuen baque huesti sca. Chini sca jaa jato qui raanquin, heen baque ta nincatihcaniqui, hihxon.
41012007	Nocotaiya hinantaho hihbobo yohinani: Nea ta jahuen papan huai hihboyaxihquiqui. Jaa rehtehi canon bonahue jahuen huai noquenah sca janon, hihcani.
41012008	Jaa bihxon rehtexon huai behro potacanquin.
41012009	¿Jahueja jascapahbo huai hihbaan jatihiquin? Joxon ta hinantaho hihbobo rehteyaxihquiqui, huetsabo sca huai hinantahnoxon.
41012010	¿Nescajaquin huishani joi man jisyamaniquin? Tiroma ta jaiqui hihxon xobojahibaan potabohannihbo jihui ta hahqui xobojati jihui qui.
41012011	Papan ta jascajahiqui. Jan jascajahi jisish tah non rahtetai —jato jaquin.
41012012	Jahuen huai joi jan yohihi jatoya jan joihi honanxon jaa xecotancatsihquibo bi tsamajaquetaibo qui raquetax jaa janinhax boresscacani.
41012013	Yohuanquihnahbo jaamahi yohuanaiton bihnon fariseoboya herodianobo sca raancanquin.
41012014	Raanahbo hahqui caxon yohicanquin: —Mian ta min ponte yohihi, Maestron. Non tah non honanai. Rabinxonma tah min honanmahi. Tsohqui raquexonma tah min jatihibi jonibo min yohihi. Jahuabi joi huetsajaxonma tah min ponte res noque yohihi. Papan joi ta min honanmacoinai. Cesaronen noque cobranah noquen copijati joi jaiquin? ¿Yamahihquin? ¿Non copijatihin? ¿Non copijatimahin? —hahcanquin.
41012015	Jaabo hihcoinicamahi yohuanai honanxon jato yohiquin: —¿Jahuejanoxon man hea tanahin? Huesti coriquiya benahue hen jisnon —jato jaquin.
41012016	Huesti bohiboya jato yocaquin: —¿Tsoana hin, nea mapo? ¿Nea huisha cahran? —jato jaquin. —Cesarona rahan —hihcani.
41012017	—Cesaronabo Cesaro hinanrihbinahue. Papanahbo Papa hinannahue —jato jaquin Jesusen. Jan jascaraiya hahqui raquecani.
41012018	Saduceobo sca Jesus qui bocani. Tsoabi ta hahquirihbi huenitimahiqui hihquibo. Nocotax yocacahcani:
41012019	—Moisesnin ta noque huishaxonnishqui, Maestron. Jahuen huetsa baquejahaxma mahuataiya ta jahuen yononma jahuen chinipan bihtihiqui, jahuen bochan baque janon hahqui baquejanoxon hahquin huishaquin.
41012020	Siete huetsabo ta janishqui. Beboquihahnen ta haibo bihnishqui. Bichish bi mahuati, baquejahaxma.
41012021	Jahuen chinipan sca ta jahuen yononma bihnishqui. Bichish bi mahuati, baquejahaxma. Jahuen jochica jascarihbihi.
41012022	Siete rahsi jascari mahuati, baquejahaxma. Chini sca haibo rihbi mahuati.
41012023	¿Papan noque hahquirihbi huenihi tian jahuemehatona jaa haibo hihyaxihquiquin, siete jatihixonbi haibojani? —hahcanquin.
41012024	Jesusen jato yohiquin: —Papan huishamani joi honanyamahax tah man jascarai, jahuen coshi rihbi honanyamahax tah man ponte yohuanyamahi.
41012025	Mahuataibo hahquirihbi huenihi tian ta Papan yonotibo naihoh queha jai quescapahbo bebobo jayaxihquiqui huanohahmabo. Haibobo rihbi ta beneyahpatimahiqui.
41012026	¿Mahuanihbo hahquirihbi huenitimahiquin? ¿Papan Moises yohini man jisyamaniquin, Moisesnin huishani janin hoa jihui namantiha pishca joibo jaiton? Papan ta Moises yohinishqui: Abrahanen Papa Dios tah hen qui, Isaaquen Papa Dios, Jacobon Papa Dios hahquin.
41012027	Mahuataibaanama bi jihuetaibaan Papa Dios ta jaa qui. Jaamajaquin tah man shinanai —hahquin jato.
41012028	Jaatian sca huishani honan huesti jato pataxi jahui. Jaabo yohinanai nincaquin. Jesusen jato yohiquin sirijahi jisxon Jesus yocaquin: —¿Papan yohini joi non jahuemeha hihti nincatihin? —hahquin.
41012029	Jesusen sca yohiquin: —Hihti nincati joi ta nea qui. Nincanahue, Israelibaan. Noquen hihbo Papa Dios ta jaa huesti hihbo qui.
41012030	Miin Hihbohon shinanhue miin jointiboyaxonbi, miin yoshinboyaxonbi, miin shinanboyaxonbi, miin coshiboyaxonbi.
41012031	Jaa pecaho ta nea qui. Mihbe jihuetaibohon shinanhue, mihmebi min shinamehti hihqui quescarihbijaquin. Nea rabe joi mentan ta hashoan hani joi yama qui —hahquin.
41012032	Jascajaha huishani honan joni sca yohuani: —Ponte ta min jai, Maestron. Papa Dios huesti tah qui. Huetsa yamahi, jaa huesti. Hihcoin tah min jai.
41012033	Noquen jointiboyaxonbi noquen shinanboyaxonbi noquen coshiboyaxonbi noquen Papahon shinantixon, non noquebi shinamehti hihqui quescarihbijaquin noquen hahbe jihuetaibohon shinanti ta Papa qui hinanti jatihibi mentan hashoan siri qui. Jatihibi hinábo rehtexon Papa qui hinanti mentan hashoan siri —hihqui.
41012034	Jan honanax yohuanai jisxon Jesusen sca jaa yohiquin: —Papan jihuemati hochoma ta mia qui —hahquin. Jaa pecaho yocati qui raquecani jatihibi.
41012035	Papan xobohoxon honanmahahnan Jesusen jato yocaquin: —¿Jenquetsapahin huishani honanbaan nescajahiquin: Cristo ta David xohta qui hahquin?
41012036	Dios Yoshiman shinanmaha ta Davidininbi yohinishqui: Papan ta heen hihbo yohinishqui: Hea mecayaho tsahohue, miin rahuibo hen mia namanjaxonnon caman.
41012037	Jaa yohihi, Heen hihbo, ta Davidininbi janishqui, jaanbi. ¿Jenquetsahax sca jahuen xohta hihtihiquin? —jato jaquin. Coin coinxon hicha tsamajaquetaibaan nincacanquin.
41012038	Honanmaquin jato yohirihbiquin: —Huishani honanbo qui raquenahue. Chopa nenque sahuehax ta nihniti costancaniqui. Janoxon maroti janin caibaan jato hapon hahti rihbi ta costancaniqui.
41012039	Jaho tsinquiti xoboho ta hashoan siribo tsahotibo rihbi queencaniqui. Fiesta tian ta jano hashoan cacannicabo tsahotai janin tsahocatsihcanihqui.
41012040	Haibo yononmanen xobo ta jahuen jahuequiboyabi bichincaniqui. Caibaan jato jisnon hihxon res ta chaijaquin Papa yocacaniqui. Jascapahbo ta hashoan casticanyaxihquiqui —jato jaquin.
41012041	Jano Papa Dios hinanti coriqui naneti hoque tsahoxon jaton coriqui nanehibo Jesusen jisquin. Coriquiyahpa jonibaan ta hichaxon hicha coriqui nanecannishqui.
41012042	Jahuabijoma haibo yononma huesti joxon cahen nanequin, rabe coriqui pishca huesti soro copitai.
41012043	Jahuen haxenicabo quenaxon sca Jesusen jato yohiquin: —Nincanahue, mato yohinon. Jatihibi coriqui nanehibo mentan ta nea yononmanen hashoan nanehiqui.
41012044	Hicha jaxon ta jaabaan nanecaniqui. Jahuabi jaxonma bi ta neatohon jan jai pishca queyobahinihqui nanequin —jato jaquin.
41013001	Papan xobohoh quehax cainaiton sca jahuen haxenica huestichin yohiquin: —Maestron, yotihoparahbo macanbo, yotihoparahbo xobo jise —hahquin.
41013002	Jesusen sca jaa yohiquin: —¿Nea hihtihosi xobobo min jisin? Ni huesti macanbi ta huetsa cahchian cahtsahoyamascatihiqui. Jatihibi ta potapaqueyaxihcanihqui —Jesusen jaquin.
41013003	Picotax sca Papan xobo hoque tocan Olivos manan janin tsahotaiton Jesus yocacanquin Pedro, Jacobo, Juan, Andres, jaabo rahsichin.
41013004	—Noque yohihue. ¿Jahuentian jascajayaxihcanihquin? ¿Jahua hahan honanti jayaxihquiquin, min noque yohiha quescabi janon? —hahcanquin.
41013005	Jesusen jato yohiquin: —Jisnahue. Mato parancanmis.
41013006	Jaa ta hen qui hihquish ta heen janen joyaxihcanihqui hicha. Hicha jonibo ta paranyaxihcanihqui.
41013007	Rehtenanaibo nincacax, hocho rehtenanaibo joi rihbi nincacax raqueyamanahue. Nete queyorihyamanon ta jascatihiqui.
41013008	Nahuabo ta hahbe nahuabo betan rehtenantihiqui. Quiquin hapon jonibo ta huetsa quiquin hapon jonibo betan rehtenantihiqui. Huetsancobo ta mai mihuanyaxihquiqui. Piti ta yamayaxihquiqui pihan hihquibo. Jascaraiboya ta hohmis hohmisti pehocohtiqui.
41013009	Matobi coiramenahue. Casticannicahbaan tananon ta mato hinanyaxihcanihqui. Haho tsinquiti xobohoxon ta mato rishquiyaxihcanihqui. Tinintibo bebon tah man nihyaxihqui, quiquin hapobo bebon rihbi. Man tah man jato yohicoinyaxihqui.
41013010	Heen joi siri ta jatihibi jonibo pari yohiti jaiqui.
41013011	Mato yahtanxon hinanaiya, jahua non jatihin hihxonma masa shinanyamanahue. Mato jaatianbi hinanai yohuan yohiyaxahnahue. Matonbi shinanaxma bi Dios Yoshiman yohuanmaha ta man yohuanyaxihqui.
41013012	Huetsa jonin ta jahuen huetsabi hinanyaxihquiqui, rehtehahbo. Huetsa papan ta jahuen baquebi jascajarihbiyaxihquiqui. Jaton papa, jaton mama rihbi rahuijaxon ta baquebaan jato rehtemayaxihquiqui.
41013013	Jatihixonbi ta mato jistahihmayaxihcanihqui man heen jane jai copi. Jascahahbo bi ta mahuanoxon caman tenehi joni hean teehihmayaxihqui.
41013014	Jan jano nihtima janin rahninti masajanica nichiton merahax mahchi quiri jabayaxahnahue, Judea mai mehahbon. Honanhue, nea quirica jisnican.
41013015	Xobo pemacanya janinhax jahuequi bihbahini xoboho hihcopaqueyamayaxahnhue.
41013016	Huai chian teetax rahcoti bichi joribiyamascayaxahnhue.
41013017	Tohoyabo betan xoma hahmahibo ta hohmis hohmisyaxihquiqui.
41013018	Matsi tianbi jascayamaxahcabo Papa yocanahue.
41013019	Papan jato jonijamenoni yamanish ta rahma caman tsoan jisyamanibo tiromabo netebo jayaxihquiqui. Jaax ta jahuentianbi jascapa hahquirihbi jaribitimahiqui.
41013020	Jaa netebo noquen hihbaan basimayamahiya cahen tsoabi baneyamahan. Jan caisnibohon shinanxon ta jaa netebo basimayamayaxihquiqui.
41013021	Jise, nea ta Cristo qui hihquiboya nincayamanahue. Jise, hoa tah qui, hihquiboya hihcoinai shinanyamanahue.
41013022	Cristohaxma bi Cristohicamahi Papan joi yohihihcamahibo rihbi ta jatihiqui. Hahan honantiboya hahan rahtetibo ta mato jismatihiqui, hahtipahxon Papan caisaibo parannoxon.
41013023	Jisnahue. Jascapahbo jatihibi jariyamanon ta hen mato yohiscai.
41013024	Jaa hihti tiromabo pecaho ta bariyahpanbi bari xabayamascatihiqui. Hoxne nete rihbi ta yamascatihiqui.
41013025	Naihoh quehax ta huishibo paqueyaxihquiqui. Hani huishmabo ta bahinma sca cayaxihquiqui.
41013026	Jaatian ta nai cohin tocan hihti coshi shinanya hihti xabatai hea noquebaque jahui hea jisyaxihcanihqui.
41013027	Jaatian tah hen heen yonotibo raanyaxihqui. Raanah ta reboqui caxon, chiponqui caxon bari cainai quiri caxon bari hihquihi quiri caxon jano nai chibechijaquehtancahuanaiton caxon jahuen caisaibo tsinquiyaxihquiqui.
41013028	Pesto jihui jisquin hahcajaquin honannahue. Pesto pereocotax bochocohiya tah man jene tian rahma jahui man honanai.
41013029	Jascajaribiquin hen mato yohihi quesca sca jai jisxon hea noquebaque neno pishca sca jaonahi honannahue.
41013030	Man honannon hihxon tah hen mato yohihi: rahma chini jihuetaibo queyorihyama jai bi ta hen mato yohihi quesca sca jayaxihquiqui.
41013031	Naiya mai queyocahinai bi ta heen joi jascabiyaxihquiqui.
41013032	¿Jahuentian jascapahbo jayaxihquiquin? ¿Jahua neten, jahua hora? Tsoanbi ta honanyamahiqui. Papan naihoh quehabaan yonotibaan bocabi honanyamaquin. Papan baquen rihbi honanyamarihbiquin. Papa huestichin honanquin.
41013033	Jisnahue. Jahuentian jaa nete jotihiquin honanaxma coiramenahue.
