41013034	Huesti joni hocho catani jahuicama tah hen jatihi. Jahuen xobo janinhax cacatsihxon cahen jahuen jonibo tee hihbomapaquequin. Huetsa jahuen tee, huetsa rihbi jahuen tee, jatihibi jaton tee jato hihbomapaquequin. Xehpoti coirannicah rihbi yohiquin coiranhue, hahquin.
41013035	¿Jahuentian xobo hihbo joyaxihquiquin? ¿Yamescaiya, yame pochinicon, hatapa queotaiya, xaba paquetaiya? Man tan man honanyamahi. Jaa copi coramenahue.
41013036	Man shinanyamahi tianbi joxon hoxahiton mato meramis.
41013037	Jatihibi jonibo hen yohihi quescajaquin tah hen mato jai: coiramenahue.
41014001	Pascua fiestaya chahoma paan fiesta rihbi nocoti rabe nete pishinaiya cahen sacerdote hapobo betan huishani honanbo yohinani: —¿Jenquetsahaxon non Jesus paranxon bihtihin rehtenoxon?
41014002	Fiesta jai tian bihtima ta jaiqui, hoa fiestajahi jonibo rehtenanmis —hihcani yohuani.
41014003	Jaabo jascarai bi Betania jema janin Jesus pihi tsahoti Simoman xoboho. Simon ta sipi paheyahpa japahonishqui. Pihi tsahotaiya huesti haibo jahui, hahan hininti nardo xeniyahpa pomoya, hihti copi bi res hahan hininti. Jahuen pomo retequebahinxon Jesusen mapo qui nardo xeni machiquin.
41014004	Machicaiya caibo rainyamahi: —¿Jahuejanoxon nea hahan hininti xeni jascajaquin yohyoquihquin?
41014005	Jaa nardo xeni maromaxon ta trescientos denarios, hashoan rihbi, bihquehaniqui jahuabijomabo sca coriqui pishca hinannoxon —hihcani, haibo qui rainyamahi.
41014006	Jesusen jato yohiquin: —Jenenahue. ¿Jahua jenquetsahin man jaa jatsanjain? Jan hea jascajaxonah ta siri bi res qui.
41014007	Mato tocan ta jahuabijomabo jascabihi jatihiqui. Man queenai tianbi tah man jato yanapanti hahtipahi. Huetsa tian ta mato tocan hea hihyamascatihi.
41014008	Jan hahtipahi quescaja ta haibaan jaxonaxqui. Hea tsahonyahnoxon ta heen yora hea hininjahiqui.
41014009	Yohicoin ta hen mato jai: jatihibi mai janinxon heen joi siri yohixon ta jaan hea jascajaxonni yohiyaxihcanihqui, jaa haibo shinanxon.
41014010	Jaatian sca Judas Iscariote cahi. Jaa cahen Jesusen haxemati huesti, sacerdote hapobo qui cahax jato Jesus hinanyahnoxon jato betan bexohi.
41014011	Jan jascacatsihqui nincacax coincoinxon yohicanquin: —Mia tah non coriqui hinantihi —hahcanquin. Jenquetsahaxon hen hinantihin hihxon Judasen shinanscaquin.
41014012	Chahoma paan fiesta pehocohti neten sca pascua carnero baque rehtehiboya Jesusen haxenicabaan yocaquin: —¿Jahuerahnon non catihin, pascua fiesta mia pitijaxonnoxon? —hahcanquin.
41014013	Yocacah cahen rabe jahuen haxenicabo raanquin yohixon: —Jema janin botannahue. Janoxon ta jeneyahpa poo maibehnani jahui jonin mato behchixihquiqui. Hahbe botannahue.
41014014	Jan hihcohi janin xobo hihbo yocanahue: Noquen maestron ta mia yohihiqui, Jahuerahnon hin, janoxon piti chique, janoxon heen haxenicabo betan hen pascua fiesta pinon.
41014015	Bochiquiha hani chique ta mato jismaxihquiqui, misayahpa, tsahotiyahpa, moa hihrescai. Janoxon noque pitijaxontannahue —jato jaquin.
41014016	Raana jema janin nocoti bocani. Jan yohihi quescabijaquin meracanquin. Pascua fiesta sca pitijaxoncanquin.
41014017	Bepiscaiya jahuen doceyabi Jesus nocoti.
41014018	Pihi tsahoxon jato yohiquin: —Man honannon hihxon tah hen mato yohihi: mato quiha huestichin ta hea bihmatihiqui, hehbetan pihi huestichin.
41014019	Masa shinanxon jatihixonbi yocapaquecanquin: —¿Hea hen quin? —hahcanquin.
41014020	—Heen doce quiha huesti tah qui. Hen poseman netinai tason qui ta jaan rihbi hehbetanbi jahuen poseman netinihqui.
41014021	Hea yohihi huishani joi jai quescari tah hen mahuanoxihqui. Hahraai hih ta jatihiqui, hea bihmahi joni. Jahuentianbi jonijayamaha ta jaa hashoan siribiresquehanihqui —jato jaquin.
41014022	Pihanan sca posen bihxon Papa yocaxon tehcapaquexon jato hinanpaquequin. —Bihnahue. Nea ta heen yora qui —hahquin.
41014023	Tason rihbi sca bihxon Papa yocaxon jato hinanquin. Hinana jatihixonbi hahqui xehaquin.
41014024	—Nea ta heen jimi qui. Hicha jonibaan hohcha copijaquin tah hen heen jimi potaxihqui. Mahuaquin tah hen mato hahxonbahinai.
41014025	Yohicoin tah hen mato jai: nea xehati tah hen hahquirihbi xehayamascatihi. Janoxon Papan jihuemahi janinxon pari ta hen behna sca xehayaxihqui —jato jaquin.
41014026	Papa qui behuahax sca Olivos manan janin boribicani.
41014027	Janoxon sca jato yohiquin: —Jatihixonbi tah man hea potabahinnoxihqui, huishani joi jai quescajaquin: Carnero coirannicah ta hen rehtetihi carnerobo potojahtani jabisihcani.
41014028	Hihquipi bi hahquirihbi huenihah tah hen hea pari Galilea main cayaxihqui, man chini canon —jato jaquin.
41014029	Pedronen sca yohiquin: —Jaabaan jatihixonbi mia potahi que bi tah hen hean mia potatimahi —hahquin.
41014030	—Yohicoin ta hen mia jai: hatapa rabe coti queori jaima tah min heen joni hihtima min quimisha coti yohinoxihqui nea yamebi —Jesusen jaquin.
41014031	Jascajaha coshin sca yohuani: —Hea miayabi rehtehibaan bi tah hen miin joni hihtima hen yohitimahi —hihqui. Jatihibi sca jascarih.
41014032	Getsemaní janeya huai janin sca bocani. Nocoxon sca jahuen haxenicabo yohiquin: —Nenobi tsahopaquenahue, hen Papa yocatannon.
41014033	Jascajaxon Pedro, Jacobo, Juan, jaabo rahsi boquin. Hihti masa shinanscaquin Jesusen. Rahte rahteti.
41014034	—Heen jointiboyabi tah hen bena benatai, hahan mahuati bena tah hen jai. Nenobi banexon coirannahue —jato jaquin.
41014035	Hoque pishca cahax beho racaxon Papa yocaquin, janoxihquibo jatimajati yocaquin.
41014036	—Papan, hea janoxihquibo jayamanoxahnon jahue, jatimajati hahtipahxon. Mian tah min jatihibi hahti hahtipahi. Jaabi hea queenai quescayamahi bi mia queenai quescahue —hahquin.
41014037	Joribixon jaabo hoxahiton meraquin. Hoxahiton meraxon Pedro yohiquin: —¿Min hoxayamahin, Simoman? ¿Huesti hora pishca min coiranti hahtipahyamahin?
41014038	Coiranhanan Papa yocanahue mato hohchati queenmayamahabo. Maton shinaman man coshiti shinanai bi tah man shinan coshi yamahi —jato jaquin.
41014039	Hahquirihbi caxon Papa yocarihbiquin. Jan yocacah quescajaquin yocarihbiquin.
41014040	Joribixon sca jato hoxahiton merarihbiquin, jaton bero quextojaqueti. Yocacah bi jahua yohiti honanyamacanquin.
41014041	Jahuen quimisha coti sca catani joribixon jato yohiquin: —¿Man tanti tantihi hoxaparihin? Senen ta jaiqui. Hora ta nocoscaiqui. Hea noquebaque ta hohchayahpabo jonibo hinannoxihquiqui, bichíbo hihxon.
41014042	Huenitax canon bonahue. Jisnahue, hea bihmanica ta jahuiqui.
41014043	Jan jascajahi betanbi Judas nocoti, jahuen doce quiha huesti. Hicha joni machitoyahpabo huinoyahpabo rihbi hahbetan becani. Sacerdote hapobaan raanah becani. Huishani honanbo betan judiobaan hanibaan rihbi raanah becani.
41014044	Jato betan bexohax bihmanica jato bebohi jahui. Hahan Jesus honanahbo jato yohibenanai: —Hen hicotannoxihqui joni tah qui. Jaa bihxon coiranxon hiotannoxahnahue —jato yohibenani jahui.
41014045	Nocotax res sca Jesus qui joxon: —Hihbon —hahxon hicotanquin.
41014046	Hicotanaiya Jesus bihcanquin.
41014047	Jesus bichiboya jaa patax nichi huestichin jahuen machito tsecaxon sacerdote hapon yonoti reraquin bi jahuen pabinqui res paxtebahinquin.
41014048	Jesusen sca jato yocaquin: —¿Yometso bihquin hahcajaquin man hea bichin, machitoyahpa joxon, huinoyahpa rihbi joxon?
41014049	Netetihibi Papan xobohoxon honanmahanan hen mato betan hihrasihi bi tah man hea bihyamahipiqui. Jaabi huishani joi jai quescabi janon tah man nescajahi —jato jaquin.
41014050	Jato jascajanon jatihixonbi jaa potabahini jahuen haxenicabo jabati.
41014051	Huesti beronanen cahen jahuen rahcoti res sahuexon Jesus chibanquin.
41014052	Jaa rihbi sca bichibaan bi jahuen rahcoti potabahinax chopanma sca hishtocanahi jabati cahi.
41014053	Sacerdote hapo janin sca Jesus hiocanquin. Sacerdote hapobo, judiobaan hanibo, huishani honanbo jatihibi jano tsinquicani.
41014054	Hiohibo bi hochoxon Pedronen jato chibanbonaquin sacerdote hapon xobo jemanhihti janin hihconoxon caman. Jemanhihtin sca sacerdote hapon yonotibo betan pehchihi tsahoti.
41014055	Xobohoxon cahen sacerdote hapobo betan tsinquitaibaan jatihixonbi Jesus qui yohuancointi joi benacanquin, cahexon rehtemanoxon. Benaxon bi merayamacanquin.
41014056	Hahqui yohuancoinihcamahi quesahi yohuanaibo hichahi. Jaa joiya huesti yohuancoinyamacani.
41014057	Caibo nihinahtax hahqui yohuancoini quescari quesahi yohuani.
41014058	—Nea mequeman xobojanihbo Papan xobo tah hen potapaqueyaxihqui. Quimisha neten potahipixon tah hen huetsa rihbi sca xobojayaxihqui, mequeman hahcahma sca, hih ta jaipishqui noquen nincanonbi —hihcani.
41014059	Jascaraibaan bi jaa joiya huesti yohuancoinyamacani.
41014060	Naponbi nihxon sca sacerdote hapon Jesus yocaquin: —¿Min jahua yohiti yamahin? ¿Jahua yohuan neabo mihqui jaiquin? —hahquin.
41014061	Jascahah bi jahua hihyamahi. Neteti. Sacerdote hapon yocarihbiquin: —¿Mia min Cristo quin? ¿Mia min noquen Papan siripan baque quin? —hahquin.
41014062	—Jaa tah hen qui. Coshiyahpaton mecayaho hea noquebaque tsahotai tah man jisyaxihqui. Nai cohin tocan jahui rihbi ta man hea jisyaxihqui —jato jaquin Jesusen.
41014063	Jan jascajahiya sacerdote hapon sca jahuenahbi jahuen chopa huaxabahinxon yocaquin: —¿Jahua copi non hashoan rihbi hahqui yohuanti benaparitihin?
41014064	Jan tiromahi Papa qui yohuanai ta man nincascai. ¿Jahuejati man shinanain? —hahquin. —Rehteti ta jaiqui —hihcani jatihibi.
41014065	Caibo hahqui toshbanhihcahini. Jahuen bemanan beracohxon rishquixon yocacanquin: —¿Tsoan mia rishquihiquin? Noque yohihue —hahcanquin. Sacerdote yonotibaan sca bihxon rishqui rishquirihbiquin.
41014066	Naman jemanhihti janin Pedro nichiya sacerdote hapon yonoti haibo jano cahi.
41014067	Pedro pehchihi jisxon bejisquin sirijaxon yohiquin: —Mia rihbi tah min Nazaret janinha Jesus manahi nihrasihi —hahquin.
41014068	Jascajaha jeenhihyamahi: —Jahua rah tah min jai. Min yohuanai ta hen honanyamahi —hihqui. Jemanhihti xehpoti janin sca Pedro nichi cahiya hatapa queoscai.
41014069	Jan cahi jisxon yonoti haibaan jano nichibo sca yohiquin: —Jaa ta jato betan nihnicah qui —hahquin.
41014070	Haibaan jascajahi bi Pedro jeenhihyamahi. Jascama ta qui hihresi. Jaa pecaho pishca jano nichibaan sca Pedro yohirihbiquin: —Hihcoini tah min jato betan nihnicah qui. Mia ta min Galilea mai meha qui —hahquin.
41014071	—Hen yohuancoinyamahiya Papan hea rehtenon. Papan hea jiscoina tah hen yohuancoinai. Man yohihi joni tah hen honanyamabiresai —jato jaquin.
41014072	Jahuen rabe coti sca hatapa queoti. Queotaiya cahen Jesusen yohiha joi Pedronen shinanscaquin: Hatapa rabe coti queori jaima tah min heen joni hihtima min quimisha coti yohinoxihqui. Jaa joi shinanax hihti benatax huaohihscai.
41015001	Xaba paquescaiya sacerdote hapobo, judiobaan hanibo, huishani honanbo, jaabo rahsibi tsinquitax yohinani. Jesus menexxon hioxon Pilato hinancanquin.
41015002	Pilatonen sca yocaquin: —¿Mia min judiobaan quiquin hapo quin? —hahquin. —Min yohihi quesca rahan —hahquin.
41015003	Hahqui tiromahi yohuanquin sca cahen sacerdote hapobaan joi tsamanscaquin.
41015004	Pilatonen sca jaa yocarihbiquin: —¿Min jahua yohiti yamahin? ¿Mihqui hicha yohuanquin joi tsamanaibo min nincayamahin? —hahquin.
41015005	Yocacah bi Jesus jahua hihyamascaiya Pilato rahteti.
41015006	Pascua fiesta tian ta jan sipojani huesti Pilatonen jato picoxonpahonishqui, jaabaan yocacai huesti picoxonquin.
41015007	Jaton quiquin hapo potacatsihquin, rehtenanxon huetsa jonibo rehtehiton jan sipojanibo jai. Huesti cahen Barrabas janeya.
41015008	Tsamajaquetai jonibo mapexon sca, jan jato hahxonpahoni quescajaquin Pilatonen jato hahxonnon yocacanquin.
41015009	Yocacatsihquibo bi jaan pari yocaquin: —¿Judiobaan quiquin hapo hen mato picoxonti man queenyamahin? —hahquin.
41015010	Sacerdote hapobo notsi notsixon hinanai honanscaxon jascajaquin.
41015011	Jascahah bi cahen sacerdote hapobaan tsamajaquetaibo yohuanquihnquin sinamaquin, Jesus yocatima shinanahbo. Sinaxon sca Jesusma bi Barrabas jan jato picoxonnon yocacanquin.
41015012	Jascajahiton Pilatonen jato yocarihbiquin: —¿Barrabas picoxonti man queenaiya maton quiquin hapo hahcaibo joni cahran? ¿Jaa hean jahuejatihin? —jato jaquin.
41015013	—Jihuin hueonhue —hahcanquin coshin bi res.
41015014	—¿Jahua copi nan? ¿Jahua tiroma jaiquin? —jato jaquin Pilatonen. Jan jascahah bi hashoan coshin sca yohuancani: —Jihuin hueonhue —hahcanquin.
41015015	Jenimahabo sca Pilatonen Barrabas jato picoxonquin. Jesus rishquimaxon, jihuin hueonnon hihxon, bihnahue jato jaquin.
41015016	Bihnahue hahca hapon xobo chicho sca sontarobaan Jesus hioquin, pretorio janeya xoboho. Jano hioxon sca hahbe sontarobo jatihibi quenacanquin.
41015017	Yancon chopa sahuemaxon moxa maitijaxon maimacanquin.
41015018	—Jihuehue, judiobaan quiquin hapon —hahcanquin hapojahicamaxon.
41015019	Jascajaxon jihui taxon marishquicanquin. Hahqui toshbanhihcani. Hapojahicamaxon hahqui raboxonen tisquihahpaquecanquin.
41015020	Hosanquin queyoscaxon yancon chopa pecaxon jahuen chopa sahuemacanquin. Sahuemaxon jihuin hueonnoxon sca hiocanquin.
41015021	Simon janeya joni cahchihoh quehax jahuex jano huinotaiton jahuen coros hiamacanquin. Jaa ta Alejandro betan Rufo jaton papa hihpahonishqui, Cirene mai janinhah.
41015022	Jano Gólgota jane jaiton hiocanquin. Gólgota cahen mapo xaoya manan hihcatsihqui.
41015023	Mirra rahoya vino mescoxon xehamacatsihquibaan bi queenyamahi.
41015024	Jihuin hueonscacanquin. Jahuen chopabo metisahcanquin. Tsoana banetihiquin hihxon macan bero borasa qui nanexon chicoha huetsa pari cainaiya huetsan bihnon, huetsa macan pari cainaiya huetsan sca bihnon.
41015025	Bari hihinahtaiya hueoncanquin.
41015026	Jahua copi rehtehiquin honanahbo hihxon quirica sca hueoncanquin. Judiobaan quiquin hapo, hihqui jaa quirica.
41015027	Rabe yometsoh rihbi hueoncanquin, huetsa jahuen mecayaho, huetsa jahuen memiho.
41015028	Jaatianbi ta huishani joi quesca sca janishqui: Hohchataibo betan hihqui shinanxon rehtehah ta qui, hihqui jaa joi.
41015029	Jano huinotaibaan sca jaton mapo bose bosehihcahinxon hosanquin. —Heeeen. Papan xobo potapaquehipixon tah hen quimisha neten hihxon jaa xahnen hen huenirihbiyaxihqui hih ta min jaipiqui.
41015030	Coros janinhax bototax mihmebi sca teehihhue —hihcani.
41015031	Sacerdote hapobo, huishani honanbo betan jascarihbihi yohuani. Hosancanquin. —Caibo teehihmaxon bi ta hahmebi teehihti hahtipahyamahiqui.
41015032	Criston, Israelibaan quiquin hapon, coros janinhax rahmabi botopaquequihranhue, botoquihranai mia jisxon non mia nincacoinnon —hihcani. Hahbe hueonahbaan rihbi hosanquin.
41015033	Barin manan tsacahiya sca jatihibi mai bahquishihcahinscai, bari racapaquenon caman.
41015034	Bari racapaquetaiya sca Jesus coshin yohuani: —Eloi, Eloi, ¿lama sabactani? —hahquin. Papan Dios, Papan Dios, ¿jahua jenquetsahin min hea jenescain? hihcatsihqui.
41015035	Jan jascahi nincaxon: —Jisnahue, Elías ta quenahiqui —hahcanquin jano nichibaan.
41015036	Hishtocahinxon huesti jonin xehati cachani qui taco quescapah maosahxon jihui taxo qui queonxon sananhihnixon xehamaquin. Xehamaxon: —Mananahue. Jaa botonnoxon Elías jahui non jisnon.
41015037	Jaatian sca saisaihihquish Jesus mahuascai.
41015038	Jaatianbi ta Papan xobo janin rontamehtai chopa chique huaxacahinnishqui, bochiqui janinhax naman caman.
41015039	Jesus bebon nihxon jan jascari mahuatai jisish capitan sca yohuani: —Hihcoini, nea ta Diosen baque qui —hahquin.
41015040	Haibobaan rihbi ta hochoxon jisnishqui. Huetsa cahen María Magdalena, huetsa cahen María, hoa chinitai Jacoboya José jaton mama, huetsa cahen Salomé. Jano nihxon ta jiscannishqui.
41015041	Galilea janin Jesus nichiya cahen jaabaan jaa chibanpahonish. Jaa pimarihbipahonish. Jesus betan Jerusalen janin jahuipi haibobo rihbi ta jano nihxon jiscannishqui, hichaxon.
41015042	Yantanscaiya cahen bahquish tantiti neten piyanoxon pitijacanquin, jaton pitijati neten.
41015043	Jaa copi jahuen raque potahax Pilato janin caxon Jesusen yora Josepan yocaquin. Jaa José ta Arimatea janinhah hihpahonishqui hahbe hapobo tsinquinica, shinanyahpa joni. Papan jihuemahi jiscatsihqui jaan rihbi manaquin.
41015044	Jesus mahuascai nincacax Pilato rahteti. Capitan quenaxon sca yocaquin: —¿Mahua sca jaiquin? —hahquin.
41015045	—Mahua sca ta jaaxqui —capitan jaiya jeenhihscai, Josepan jahuen yora bihnon.
41015046	Sábana maroxon Jesus botonpaquexon sabananen rahcoxon macan xanquen poquinipibo tsahon chicho racanquin. Macan taranxon sca tsahon quini behpoquin.
41015047	Jan jano tsahonai ta María Magdalena betan Josepan mama Marian jisnishqui.
41016001	Tantiti nete huinoscaiya hininjahi canoxon hahan hininti marocanquin, María Magdalena, Jacobon mama María, Salomé, jaabo rahsibichin.
41016002	Hahan semana pehocohtai neten sca xaba honanax yamequiribi tsahon janin bocani.
41016003	Yohuanbonacani: —¿Hahan tsahon behpohipi macan tsoan noque taranbohanxontihiquin? —hihcanahi.
41016004	Jaa macan cahen hihtihosi. Jari jisxon moa taranbohanah meracanquin.
41016005	Tsahon chicho hihcoxon joxo tariyahpa beronan mecayaho tsahotai meracanquin. Merahax rahte rahtecani.
41016006	Jaan jato yohiquin: —Rahteyamanahue. Man tah man Jesus benahi Nazaret janinha Jesus hueonipibo. Jaa ta huenitaxqui. Nenoma sca tah qui. Neno racanipi jisi benahue.
41016007	Yohihi sca botannahue: Mato rihbi canon ta Galilea main Jesus caresscaiqui. Janoxon tah man jaa jistihi, jan mato yohihipi quescabijaquin. Jahuen haxenicabo, Pedro rihbi yohitannahue —jato jaquin.
41016008	Yohihah rahte rahtetax tastahihquish tsahon janinhax picotax bishquihihcanahi bocani. Raquetax tsoabi yohibonahaxma bocani.
41016009	Hihquipish bi hahan semana pehocohtai neten hihari huenitax roqui María Magdalena qui pari Jesus cainnish. Jaa haibo janinhah roqui siete tiroma yoshin jaan piconish.
41016010	Caxon qui jaa Marian Jesus betan nihcahchihibo huinihi huaohihquiton meraxon yohiquin:
41016011	—Hahquirihbi ta teehihquiqui. Hen ta hen jistanai —hah qui jan jai bi qui hihcoinai shinanyamacanquin.
41016012	Jaa pecaho roqui huetsapahax sca huetsa rabe qui caini, jemama qui cahiton. Jahuen haxenica rabe.
41016013	Jaabo rabechin qui caxon texe yohihahbaan bi hihcoinai shinanyamarihbicanquin.
41016014	Jaa pecaho sca roqui jahuen once qui cainrihbihi pihi tsahotaiton. Hihquipish bi hahquirihbi teehihscai jisxon yohihahbaan bi hihcoinai shinanyamahiboya roqui jato hihti yohiquin, hihcoinai shinanyamahibo copi, jaton jointi chahomahi copi rihbi.
41016015	—Jatihibi main caxon jatihibi jonibo heen joi siri yohihi botannahue.
41016016	Nincacoinaiton man nashimahibo tah hen teehihmatihi. Nincacoinyamahibo tah hen casticanyaxihqui.
41016017	Heen janen tah man caibaan tiroma yoshinbo picoyaxihqui. Joi behnapan ta caibo yohuanyaxihquiqui.
41016018	Ronobo bichish bi ta hisinyamayaxihcanihqui. Hahan mahuati paheyahpabo xehahax bi ta hisinyamayaxihcanihqui. Hisinaibo ta mequeman meheyaxihcanihqui rohahahbo.
41016019	Jato yohi sca jan jaiya qui noquen hihbo Jesus naihohxon Papan bihinihninish, jahuen mecayaho sca tsahonon.
41016020	Jaabo sca ta jatihibinco caxon Papan joi haxemacannishqui. Noquen Hihbaan ta jato yanapanquin hahan honantijaxonnishqui, jaabo hihcoinai yohuanai honanahbo.
42001001	Mihqui tah hen nea joi raanai, señor Teofilon. Neno jenques japahonishquin hihxon hichaxon huishati shinannihbaan bi tah hen hean sca huishaxon mia yohicatsihqui.
42001002	Cristo jomenoni jisnicahboxon ta jahuen joi yohinicabaan noque jaa joi honanmascanishqui, jaabaan jisnixon.
42001003	Min honannon hihxon tah hen hean rihbi huishapaqueti shinanai. Neateman pehocohnish rahma caman jenques jaiquin jatihibi honanquin sirijaxon tah hen huishaxon mia yohihi.
42001004	Jenquetsahpa yohuan jacoinnishquin min mian rihbi honancoinnon tah hen nea huishahi.
42001005	Judea main Herodes quiquin hapo japarihiya ta Zacarías janeya joni janishqui. Noquen Papa noque yocaxonnicah, jahuen joi haxemanicah. Abías baquebo betan teenica. Jahuen haibo ta Elisabet janeya janishqui, yocaxonnica Aaroman chiní baque.
42001006	Jaa haibo betan bebo cahen rabebi pontejaquin shinanaibo, Papan yohini joibo nincacoinaibo. Papan yononi quescabijaquin hahcaibo. Jascajati ta jaiqui hihxon Papan yohihi quescabijaxon rabebichin jahua joibi pishinmayamaquin.
42001007	Jascapahbohax bi baquejomabo. Jahuen haibo baqueyosma, yoxaboscai, jaa rihbi yosiboscai.
42001008	-
42001009	Hen mia yohihi quescari jaton coiranti nete nocotaiya cahen Abías baquebo Papan xobo coirani jaax bocani. Jaton tee hahqui jano Zacarías cahi. Papan xoboho hahan hininjati quetejatanhue hahca jano mapescai.
42001010	Chichoxon Zacarías huestichin quetejahiya bi ta jemanhihti janin texe jonibo tsamajaquenishqui. Quetejati hora nocotai quen jemanhihtinin tsinquijaquexon Papa yocacanquin.
42001011	Janoxon quetejati janin nihxon sca, Papan yonoti hahqui sanareneni jahui Zacaríasnen jisquin. Jahuen hininjati pataxbi nihrenenai jisquin.
42001012	Jisish rahte rahteti. Hihti raqueti.
42001013	—Raqueyamahue, Zacarian. Min yocacai ta Papan nincaquihqui. Min hahqui baquejaha ta miin haibaan tohoscaxon baque bihyaxihquiqui. Jaa pishca tah min Juan janeyaxihqui.
42001014	Jaa baque copi tah min jenimayaxihqui, hihti coincoini. Jan cainaiya ta hicha jonibo rihbi jenimayaxihcanihqui.
42001015	Papan jisí ta haniscaax shinanya joni sca jayaxihquiqui. Pahe xehayosma. Mae, hompa, jascapa pahebo xehayamaquin. Cainrihyamahiton bi ta Dios Yoshiman jaa hihbojayaxihquiqui.
42001016	Jaa copi ta haniscaxon jaan yohihah miin caibaan hichaxon jaton shinan ponteyaxihquiqui, jaton Papa Dios qui hinamehxon.
42001017	Jahuen hihbo bebohi ta miin baque nihyaxihquiqui. Elías yamanicaton coshi shinanya ta nihyaxihquiqui. Jahuen yoshin siri Papan Elías hinanni quescajaquin rihbi ta jaa rihbi hinanah jaaya nihyaxihquiqui, jonibo shinan hinanbonahi nichi. Jaton baquebohon shinanahbo jato shinan hinanquin. Hihti sirijaquin shinan sca jaábo nincayosmabo yohibonaquin. Jaton Hihbo nincacatsihquibo jaábo hihxon ta jato yohibonayaxihquiqui —hahquin Papan yonotinin.
42001018	Jascari Papan yonoti yohuani jaiya: —¿Min hihcoinai hen honannon, jahua min hea jismatihin? Jise. Hea tah hen yosiboscai. Heen haibo rihbi yoxaboscai —hahquin Zacaríasnen.
42001019	Jaatian sca: —Hea tah hen Gabriel qui, noquen Papa Dios bebon nihnicah. Yohitanhue hea Papan jaah tah hen mia yohihi jahui. Jaa copi tah hen mia joi siri yohihi.
42001020	Hen mia yohihah nincahue. Joyo sca tah min jatihi. Hen mia yohihi nocoyaxahnon caman tah min yohuantimacahinscatihi, hen yohihah bi hihcoinai shinanyamahax. Hen mia yohihi quescabi ta jayaxihquiqui, jahuen nete nocotaiya —hihqui Papan yonoti.
42001021	Zacarías piconon caman jaa manati jemanhihtinin jonibo nichi. Papan xoboho jan basihiya rahtecani.
42001022	Jaatian sca picoscai. Picotax bi joyoscai, Jascabi yohuantimacahinxon behantanresquin. Jan behantan behantanaiya ta chichoxon Papan jismaha jan jahuara jisbenanai honanscacannishqui.
42001023	Jaa pecaho sca jahuen xobon cati nete nocoscaiya jahuen xobon caresscai.
42001024	Jahuen xobon jan nocotipi pecaho hahbetan hihquish jahuen haibo Elisabet tohoscai. Tohoxon bi pichca hoxne jahuen toho paxajaquin jisyamahabo. Tsoabi yohiyamaquin.
42001025	Papan ta hea hahxonihqui. Jonibo tocan hen hihtimahyamascanon ta jaa queenai tianbi hea hahxonihqui, hihqui.
42001026	Jan Elisabet yohiho seis hoxne sca ta Nazaret janeya jema janin sca Papan yonoti canishqui, Papan raanah. Gabriel janeya, Papan yonoti.
42001027	Jano cahax huesti haibo qui nocoti cahi. María janeya haibo. Bebaan honanahma. Jaa bihyaxihqui joni ta José janishqui, Davidinin chini baque.
42001028	Nocoxon sca Papan yonotinin yohiquin: —¿Min jascabi jayamahin, haibon? Mia ta noquen Hihbaan shinanihqui. Mihbetanbi ta hihquiqui —hahquin.
42001029	Jan jascahah, haibo rahte rahteti. Jan jascarai jahua hihcatsihquiquin hihqui, jahuen jointi chicho res.
42001030	Rahtetaiton sca: —Raqueyamahue, Marian, noquen Papa ta mihon jenimahiqui.
42001031	Jise. Min tah min tohoscayaxihqui. Bebo baque bihxon sca tah min jaa Jesus janeyaxihqui.
42001032	Jaa ta shinanya joni hihyaxihquiqui. Papa naihoh quehaton baque tah qui hih ta jayaxihcanihqui. Jahuen xohta yamanica Davidinin jihuetahbo ta Papa Diosen jaa hinanyaxihquiqui,
42001033	queyotaxma jan jascabi sca judiobaan quiquin hapo hihnon —hahquin Papan yonotinin.
42001034	Jascahah Marian yocaquin: —¿Jenquetsahaxon hen heen bene yamahi bi hen baque bihtihin? —hahquin.
42001035	Jaatian sca: —Dios Yoshiman ta mia hihbojahiqui. Papan coshi shinaman ta mia coiraniqui. Jaa copi ta min bihyaxihqui baque yohihi, Jaa ta Papan baque qui, Diosen baque, hihyaxihcanihqui.
42001036	Jise. Miin tsabe Elisabet rihbi ta yoxabohax bi tohoyascai qui. Baquejoma hihpahonish bi ta jahuen seis hoxne tohoya sca jaiqui.
42001037	Papan ta jatihibijati hahtipahiqui —María jaquin Papan yonotinin.
42001038	Jascahah: —Hea tah hen qui, hih ca hen jai sen, heen Hihbaan jihuetah. Min hea yohihah quescajaquin jan hea janon —hahquin Marian. Jaatian Papan yonoti caresscai.
42001039	Papan yonoti jascaripi pecaho Judea main sca histon cacatsihquish María caresscai. Mahchibo jano jaiton cahi, jan honanai jema janin nocoti cahi.
42001040	Nocotax sca Zacarían xoboho mapeti. Min jascabi jayamahin, tsaben hahquin Elisabet hicotanquin.
42001041	Min jascabi jayamahin tsaben hahcai betan bi jahuen xahquin janin jahuen baquexo tehquexihtani Elisabetnin honanquin. Dios yoshiman hihbojaha sca Elisabet coshin yohuani:
42001042	—Hihti hahxon ta noquen Papan mia jaiqui. Miin xahquin janin jai baquexo ta jaan mia hahxoniqui.
42001043	¿Hea jahua que ma bi min heen hihbaan mama hihquish min hehqui jahuin?
42001044	Hihcoin tah hen jai. Jise, min hea yohihi hen nincacai betan bi ta coincoinax heen xahquinhoh quehax heen baquexo tehquexihtanaxqui.
42001045	Noquen Papan mia hinantijaxon yohihipi nincacoinax tah min hihti jenimascatihi —hahquin Elisabetnin.
42001046	María sca noquen Papa qui siripi yohuani: Mia tah min hihti siri qui, Papan, hih tah hen jai, heen jointiboyabi.
42001047	Noquen Papa ta hea jihuemanicah qui. Jahan tah hen hihti jenimahi hih tah hen jai noquen Papa yohihi.
42001048	Jahuen hina pishca res hen hihqui bi ta hehon shinanihqui. Hehon shinanxon jan hahxonai copi ta jayaxihquibo yohuancoinsca jayaxihcanihqui. Papan ta jaa hahxonnishqui hih ta jayaxihcanihqui hea yohihi.
42001049	Jahuen coshi shinaman ta hea hihti hahxonihqui. Jaa ta Papa Dios coin qui.
42001050	Jan yohihi quescabijaquin non hahcaiboya ta noquehon jascabijaquin Papan shinanihqui.
42001051	Jahuen mequen siripan hahxonquin ta jahuen coshi noque jismahiqui. Nincayosmabo ta jaan rabinmahiqui.
42001052	Hani quiquin hapobo namanjaxon ta jaton yohuanbo jato jenebahinmahiqui. Jahuaborabojomabo rihbi ta mehehiqui, hihti meyayahpa quescapahbo sca jaábo.
42001053	Pihan hihquibo rohahihriscanon jato piti siribo pimaxon bi ta hicha jahuequiyahpabo picatsihcanahabo jato camahiqui.
42001054	Israeli baquebo hahxontijanixon ta jan yohini quescabijaquin noque yanapaniqui, noque jahuen jonibo quen.
42001055	Abraham yohinixon ta noquen xohtabo rihbi sca hahxontijanixon jan yohini quescabijaquin hahxonscaiqui, jascabi sca janon hihqui María.
42001056	Elisabet janin cahen quimisha hoxnebo sca María jihueti. Janohax res sca jahuen xobon caribiscai.
42001057	Jan cahipi cahchiqui sca jahuen tsaben jahuen baque bihresscaquin, bebo baque pishca. Bichish, hihti jenimahi.
42001058	Hahbe jihuetaibo betan jahuen jenabo rihbi jenimacani. Hahan shinanxon ta noquen Hihbaan hihti hahxonihqui, hihcani.
42001059	Huesti semana huinoscaax jaya jahuen mama, jahuen papa cahi, jahuen jane huishamahi. Janoxon honantijati janin caxon, hahan judiobaan honantijahahbo hihxon jaton baquexo jismaquin. Janohahbaan sca: —¿Jahuen papan janeya janon non Zacarías huishatihin? —hahcanquin.
42001060	—Hahyamaquin rahan. Jahuen jane ta Juan qui —hihqui jahuen mama.
42001061	—Jaa janeya ta miin jenabo yamahihqui, tsoabi —hahscacanquin.
42001062	Jaatian sca jahuen papa cohantanquin yocacanquin: —¿Mian min jahua janecatsihquin?
42001063	Jahuen papan sca huishaquin hahcajaquin tabla pishca yocaxon bihxon, hahqui huishaquin. Jahuen jane ta Juan qui hahquin huishaquin. Rahte rahtescacani, jan huishahi jane jisish.
42001064	Jaatianbi jahuen jana choyocahinax Zacarías yohuanscai. —Hahxon tah min hea jai, Papan —hihscai.
42001065	Jan yohuanscai nincacax, jaton hahbe jihuetaibo rahte rahtescai. Jenquetsahax jahuen baquexo jaresscaiquin hihquish janohahbo yohuan chanicanahiboya sca Judea mahchi janinbo jihuetaibo jaya res yohuan yohuancani.
42001066	Chanihibo nincaxon shinancanquin: Hahan Papan shinanai baque tah qui, Jenquetsahpa joni jaa jayaxihquiquin, hihxon shinan shinancanquin.
42001067	Dios Yoshiman hihbojaha jahuen papa yohuanai joi rihbi nincascacanquin. Jaa Zacarías yohuanni ta nesca qui:
42001068	Hahxon tah min noque jai, Papan. Non tiromabohi copi noque casticanquin mahuamatihi bi tah min noquehon shinanxon hahqui paxacahuanti joni noque hinanscai.
42001069	-
42001070	Neateman miin joi yohinicaton janan min yohuanni quescabihi tah min rahma jai. Davidinin chini baque tah min noque hinanai, quiquin hapoxon noque jihuemahi jan jayaxahnnon tah min noque hinanai.
42001071	Noquen rahuibaan noque hihbojapanan ta jaan noque xahbanjamayaxihquiqui. Noque jistahihmahibo jatihibi ta jaan pantetihiqui, noque jahuejayamascaábo.
42001072	Noquen xohtabohon shinanxon min jato hahxontijani quescabijaquin tah min noque hahxonscai, Papan. Min jato yohini quescabijaquin tah min noque hahxonscai.
42001073	-
42001074	Jaton rahuibo qui hen jato xahbanjamahah ta raquexonma sca miin chini baquebaan hea teexonyaxihquiqui hah tah min noquen xohta Abraham janiqui, Papan, noque yohiquin.
42001075	Jaa yohicoinnixon tah min noque hahxoncoinscai, Papan. Sirijaquin shinanhahnan sca non janon. Tiroma shinanjomabo non jihueti hahtipahscanon. Mahuanoxon caman non jascabi sca mia shinanhahnan jihuenon tah min noque hahxonai, Papan Papa Dios jaxon, jahuen baquexo rihbi sca Zacaríasnen yohiquin:
42001076	Naihoh queha Papan joi yohinica ta mia hihtihi, baquexon. Noquen Hihbo beboxoni tah min nihyaxihqui, jonibo yohiquin shinan hinanbonaquin. Noquen Hihbo nincati shinan jato hinanbonaquin.
42001077	Jatohon shinanxon noquen Papan jaton hohcha sohuaxona jahuen baquebo sca jihuenon tah min jato honanmabonayaxihqui.
42001078	Noque jisí noque qui botopaquexon ta Xaba Hihbaan noque xabajayaxihquiqui.
42001079	Bahquish chian jihuetaibo ta xabajaxonyaxihquiqui. Mahuati qui raqueti jihuetaibo ta xabajaxontihiqui, hahan jihueti bahin sca nichíbo hihqui Zacarías.
42001080	Jascapa cainnish cahen jahuen baque hanicahuani. Jahuen shinan caícanahi. Jahuen Hihbaan joi yohiti nete janon caman cahchiho res nichi jihueti.
42002001	Jaatian ta Cesaro Agostonen jahuen jonibo yohinishqui, jatihibi jonibaan jane huishapaquehahbo.
42002002	Jascajati jan yohimenoni tah qui, Siria main Cirino jaton tininti hihpahoni tian.
42002003	Cesaronen jascajaquin yonohah ta jaton jemabo janin jatihibi jonibo bocannishqui, jaton jane huishahahbo.
42002004	Galilea mai janinhax José rihbi cahi, Nazaret jema janinhaxbi. Judea main cahax, jahuen xohta Davidinin jema janin nocoti cahi. Jaa jema ta Belen janeya qui. Davidinin chini baquehax copi ta jano canishqui.
42002005	Tohoyascai jahuen haibo hihyaxihqui ta María hahbetanbi canishqui. Jaan jaa bihyaxihqui copi jahuen jane rihbi jahuen benenahyabi huishahbo.
42002006	Jano nocoxon Marian jahuen baque jan bihnoxihqui honanscaquin.
42002007	Jano jai xobo bocho rahsi jaiya jahuenrahnon hoxatimahiya ganado xobohoxon sca jahuen bihmenohi baquexo bihxon, chopan rahcoxon, vacan piti racanxonti janin racanquin.
42002008	Jaatian rihbi ta jaa maibo janin carnero coirannicahbo janishqui. Jaton xobo hochó copi ta pastochianxon jaton carnerobo coiranshinacannishqui.
42002009	Yame coiranaiton jato qui Papan yonoti cainquihrani. Papan xaba rihbi jato janin xabarenenaiya rahte rahtecani.
42002010	—Raqueyamanahue. Joi siri mato yohihi tah hen jahui, jatihibichin nincacax jenimahabo.
42002011	Nea netenbi ta Davidinin jema janinxon huesti haibaan jahuen baque bichishqui, mato jihuemanica coin noquen Hihbo Cristo.
42002012	Hahan honanti sca tah hen mato yohihi: chopan rahcohah vacan piti racanxonti janin racatai tah man jaa meratihi. Jistannahue —hahquin Papan yonotinin.
42002013	Jaatian sca hahchonquihrani hicha Papan yonotibo sanareneni. Papa qui yohuani siricani.
42002014	Noquen naihoh queha Papa ta hihti coshi shinanya qui. Nai nequebihahbohon hihti shinanxon ta hahan sirijaquin shinanti shinan jato hinanihqui, hihcani.
42002015	Papan yonotibo naihoh boresscaiboya sca carnero coirannicahbo yohinancani: —Noquen Hihbaan noque honanmaha jisnon bonahue. Belen janin canon bonahue —hihcani.
42002016	Bishquihihcanahax sca nocoxon Maríaya José meracanquin. Jisíbo bi vacan piti racanxonti janin baquexo racati.
42002017	Honanscaax janohax joquin sca Papan yonotinin noque yohihah tah non jistanai, hihxon sca jatihibi jonibo yohibenacanquin.
42002018	Yohihahbo jatihibi rahtecani. Coirannicahbo yohuanai joi jahua hihcatsihquiquin hihcani, rahtetax.
42002019	Rahtetaibaan bi María rahteyamahi. Jaan cahen jahuen jointinin shinanresquin, chanihibo joibo shinanquin.
42002020	Jaatian sca coirannicahbo jaton pasto janin nocorihbicani. Noquen Hihbo ta coshi shinanya qui hihcani. —Min noque yohihipi jatihibi tah non jistanahqui, Papan. Min noque yohihipi quescabi tah qui. Hahxon tah min noque jai —hihcani.
42002021	Jan cainipi huesti semanan sca honantijamaxon Jesus janecanquin. Jahuen maman xahquinho jahuabi nanéyamaparihiya, Jaa tah man Jesus janeyaxihqui, Papan yonotinin jato jaho quescabijaquin janescacanquin, Jesus janeya janon.
42002022	Man baquexo janeho huesti hoxne senennon caman tah man Papan xobo qui samatihi hahquin ta Moisesnin huishanishqui. Jaa copi jascajacanquin. Jahuen hoxne senenscaiya Papa hinani sca baquexoya bocani, Jerusalen janin.
42002023	Papan joi janin ta jascajati huisha jaiqui: Jahuen maman bihmenoho bebo baque jatihibi yohihi tah man Papanah ta qui hih man jatihi, Papa hinani.
42002024	Huetsa rihbi ta jaiqui, Papan huishamani: Haibaan baquexo bichipi copi rabe nobex hinanyamaxon rabe coma pishca mohitahpa noquen Papa Dios hinanxon rehtexonquin, hihqui jaa huisha.
42002025	Jascajati joi copi Jerusalen janin bocani. Jaatian rihbi ta Jerusalen janin Simon janeya joni janishqui. Pontejaquin shinanai joni. Noquen Papahon shinanai joni. Noque jahuen jonibohon shinanxon noque jihuemanica Papan raantihi honancoinax manatai joni. Jaa hihbojaxon ta Dios Yoshiman honanmanishqui.
42002026	Papan raanai joni jisishma mahuati tah min jatimahi, hahquin Dios Yoshiman.
42002027	Papan xoboho sca Dios Yoshiman hihuehah Simon nocoti. Jaatianbi jano Papan huishamani joi jai quescabijahi Jesusen papa betan jahuen mama rihbi jahui, Jesus hihuehi.
42002028	Jaya mapetaiton sca jaton baquexo bichinxon Simoman hicotanquin. Chihtoxon noquen Papa yohiquin.
42002029	Hihti sirijaquin sca tah hen shinanai, Hihbon. Hea yohinihxon tah min jaabijahi. Mihqui caresscanoxahnpan.
42002030	Min raanai noque jihuemanicah tah hen jisresscai, Papan.
42002031	Jatihixonbi jisíbo hihxon tah min raanscai.
42002032	Mia honanyamapahonihxon bi ta nea baque copi noquen nahuabaan rihbi mia honanscatihiqui. Noquen caibo rihbi ta miin joniboxon nea jisish hihti siribohi yohuanyaxihcanihqui, Papan hihqui Simon.
42002033	Jaton baquexo yohihi Simon jascaraiya jahuen papa betan jahuen mama rahteti. Rahtetaiboya:
42002034	—Noquen Papan ta matohon shinanihqui —hihxon, baquexon mama bejisahnan sca, jahuen baquexo yohihi yohuani— Jise. Nea copi ta hicha noquen caibo jascabi behnoti sca jaticaniqui. Hicha rihbi ta nea copi jascabi sca jihuetihiqui. Hahqui ta caibo rihbi tiromahi yohuanyaxihquiqui. Noquen Papa hahan honantihi bi tiromabohi yohuani.
42002035	Jonibo jenquetsahpa shinanyahpabohin non honannon ta neatohon noque yohiyaxihquiqui. Mian rihbi tan min jointi machexehxon masa shinanyaxihqui —hihqui Simon.
42002036	Jano rihbi ta huesti haibo janishqui, Ana janeya. Fanuelnin baque, Aserin chini baque. Papan shinanmahah yohuannica haibo. Xontacohax jahuen bene betan siete bari jihuenish bi jahuen bene mahuataiya yononma sca banenish yoxaboscai.
42002037	Ochenta y cuatro bari jai bi sca yoxabohax bi Papan xoboho nihxon bariyahpan, yame rihbi piti tenehahnan Papa yocaquin.
42002038	Simon betan nichibo merahax: —Hahxon tah min noque jai, Papan. Jaa jisish tah hen hihti jenimahi —hihqui haibo. Jerusalen janin jihuetaibo sca yohihi cahi. Papan jihuemanica jopahinon hihquish manataibo jatihibi sca ta yohinishqui, Jaa ta jaresscaiqui, hahquin.
42002039	Jaatian sca Papan yohinih quescabijaquin queyohax Galilea main sca cahi Jesusen mama betan jahuen papa caribihi. Cahipish Nazaret jema janin jaton xobon nocorihbiscacani.
42002040	Jano jihuenish sca jaton baque haniscaax coshiscai. Hihti honan. Hahan Papan hihti shinanai joni.
42002041	Jatihibi bari tian ta Jerusalen janin jahuen mama betan jahuen papa capahonishqui. Pascua fiesta tian jano fiesta huinoti bocani.
42002042	Doce bari Jesus jaiya sca jaabo hihpahoni quescari fiesta huinoti jano bocani. Jaa rihbi jato betan cahi.
42002043	Fiesta queyoscaiya sca jaton xoboho jonoxon beribicani. Jema janin jaton baque banetai bi honanaxma jahuen papabo joribicani.
42002044	Jahuen chahibo betan jaa rihbi jahui shinanax nihbahinahi becani. Bepi sca jaton baque yamajaxon jato betan jahuibo janin sca benacanquin. Jaton jenabo yocacah bi yamahi.
42002045	Benacasquimahax sca Jerusalen janin benahi boribicani, rabebi.
42002046	Jano quimisha neten benacasquimacanquin. Benabonaxon sca Papan xoboho haxemanicahbo betan jaa tsahotai meracanquin. Haxemanicahbo yohuanai nincanoxon, jano jaa tsahotai merascacanquin. Hashoan honancatsihquin jato yocarihbiquin. Jato betan yohinani tsahotai.
42002047	Jan honanxon yohuanquihna haxemanicahbo rahteti. Nincaqui jano tsahotaibo rihbi rahteti.
42002048	Papan xobo janin jahuen haxemanicahbo yohuanquihnaiton merahax jaabo rabe rihbi rahte rahteti. —¿Jenquetsahpahin min noque betan cayamahipiquin, baquen? ¿Min honanyamahin? Masa shinanhahnan tah non mia benacasquimahipiqui —hahquin jahuen maman.
42002049	—¿Jahua copi man hea benarahsihin, maman? ¿Heen Papan teebo jisti hea jai man honanyamahin? —jato jaquin.
42002050	Jascajaha bi jan yohihi jahua hihcatsihquiquin honanyamacanquin.
42002051	Jaatian sca Nazaret janin jato betan caresscai. Nococani. Jano jihuescacani. Jahuen papan, jahuen maman yohihah quescabijaquin hahquin. Hicha bari huinoscai bi hen huishaxon mia yohihi jatihibi jahuen maman shinanpariquin.
42002052	Jano jihuetax ta Jesus haninishqui. Jahuen shinan rihbi caicanahi. Jano jaibaan jisí ta siri joni jaa janishqui. Papan jisí siririhbihi.
42003001	Jasca sca janíbaan ta huetsa quiquin hapo jaresscanishqui, Tiberio janeya. Quince bari sca jaa jaton hapo jaiya cahen jonibo jisxonnicah rihbi jai, jahuen gobernadorbo. Judea main jahuen gobernador ta Poncio Pilato janeya janishqui. Jaatian rihbi ta Galilea main Herodes haponishqui. Herodesnin huetsa Felipe ta Iturea main sca haponishqui. Traconite janinbo rihbi jahuen mai, jaa hihboti. Janohax ta Abilinia janinbo Lisaniasnen hihboti janishqui.
42003002	Anas betan Caifas rihbi ta judiobaan quiquin yohuan hihbobo janishqui. Jaabo rahsi hapobo jaiya sca ta jano tsoa jihueyamahi janin jihuexon noquen Papa yohuanai Juaman nincanishqui. Jaa Juan cahen Zacaríasnen baque. Papa yohuanai nincacax jaa joi yohihi sca nichi.
42003003	Jordan huean janinbo sca nihnichi. Quetanhihnibahinxon quetanpaquebahinrihbiquin. Yohibonahi nichi. —Noquen Papan maton hohcha sohuanon shinan siri sca bihnahue. Shinan behnayahpa man jaiya hen mato nashimanon benahue —Juaman jaquin yohibonaquin.
42003004	Isaíasnen rihbi ta Papan joi yohinicaxon jaa yohihi neateman huishanishqui. Jano tsoa jihueyamahi janin tah hen quenahi: Noquen Hihbo hahan jonon bahixonnahue. Pontequin bahixonquin.
42003005	Mai xanquen jatihibi tah man bochojabonatihi. Mahchi jatihibi rihbi tah man mapaquin mispanjabahintihi. Mayabo rihbi tah man pontetihi. Xanquen xanquenaibo rihbi sirijabonaquin.
42003006	Jaatian ta Papan raanah jihuemanica joresscai jatihibi jonibaan jisyaxihquiqui hah ta Isaíasnen janishqui huishaquin.
42003007	Isaíasnen jascajani copi ta nashimamahi behibo Juaman yohinishqui: —Papan ta mato casticantihiqui. ¿Tsoan mato Papan mato castanmis yohihah man neno jabaquihrani jahuin, rono papayahpabon?
42003008	Maton shinan pontejacoinax siri shinanya sca jihuenahue hih ca hen jai sen, maton shinan honanahbo. Noquen Papa ta Abraham qui hihyamarihbinahue. Nea macanbo ta Papan jonijati hahtipahiqui, Abrahanen baquebo sca janon, hahan Papa jenimahibo sca janon.
42003009	Jihui reranoxon hahcajaquin ta jahuen yami bihxon Papan tarescaiqui. Siri bimijomabo tarexon cohaquin hahcajaquin ta tiroma shinanyahpabo Papan casticanscaiqui. Shinannahue —jato jaquin.
42003010	Jascahah yocascacanquin. —¿Hicon nan? ¿Jahueja sca non jatihin?
42003011	Yocacahbo sca jato yohiquin: —Rabe cotonyahpaxon cotonjoma joni huesti hinannahue. Pitiyahpaxon, jascajaquin rihbi pitijoma joni hinannahue jan pinon —jato jaquin.
42003012	Jaatian sca coriqui cobranaibo rihbi becani. Jaan jato hihquimatanquin nashimanon hihquish becani. Nocoxon sca yocacanquin: —¿Noquen non jahuejatihin? —hahcanquin.
42003013	—Hapon mato yohihi tihi res cobrannahue. Man mahuinmamis —jato jaquin.
42003014	Sontarobaan rihbi sca yocaquin. —Noque rihbi sca yohihue. Sontaroxon non jenquetsahatihin —hahcanquin. —Man tah man tsoabi tahtijaxon jahuabi bichintimahi. Quesaxon bichintimarihbihi. Maton hapobaan mato copijahi res bihxon jaa res bihti shinannahue —jato jaquin.
42003015	Juaman jascajahiya manahihti quenichibo shinamehti: —Jaa tsi ra Papan caisai joni quin —hihcani, Juan yohihi jaton jointinin shinamehti.
42003016	Jascaraiboya: —Hean hen mato jenen nashimahi bi ta hea mentan hashoan coshi joni jahuiqui. Ni jahuen sapato risbi pecaxonti tah hen senenyamahi jaa hihti siri copi. Jaan ta jahuen yoshin siri mato hinantihiqui chihi rihbi mato maracanquin.
42003017	Chishpo nihuen potanon hihxon bero romishin potaquin hahcajaquin ta Papan xecoscaiqui. Bero rahsi tsamatai tsinquixon sca jahuen bexojati janin niaxon bi ta nocayosma chihin chishpo mapojayaxihquiqui —jato jaquin.
42003018	Jascapahbo joibo ta jato hicha yohinishqui, nincacoinahbo. Joi siri jato nincamaquin.
42003019	Siri joibo jan yohihi que bi ta quiquin hapoxon Herodesnin bihmaxon sipo xoboho Juan tsahonnishqui. Jascatimahi bi tah min miin huetsan haibo betanbi hihqui, Juaman jaho copi Herodesnin jaa sipo xoboho tsahonquin. Jatihibi jan tiromajaquin hahni Juaman yohiho copi rihbi sipo xoboho tsahonquin.
42003020	Hihti tiromaxon bi ta hashoan sca tiromajaquin Herodesnin Juan bihnishqui.
42003021	Jaabi, sipo xoboho Herodesnin jaa tsahonyaxahnon ta Juaman jato nashimapahonishqui, jato nashimanon hihquish hahqui nocotaibo. Jascapahbo nashimaxon ta Jesus rihbi nashimanishqui. Nashimaha ta noquen Papa yocanishqui. Yocacahnan, nai quehpemehtai jisquin.
42003022	Jaton jisnonbi sca naihoh quehax nobex quescapah botopaqueti jahui jisquin. Naihoh quehax yohuanairihbi nincacanquin. —Mia tah min jahan hen queenai heen baque qui. Mihon tah hen hihti jenimahi —hihqui.
42003023	Jaa pecaho ta joi siri yohibonahi sca Jesus nihnishqui, treinta bari jaax. Jonibaan jisí cahen jaa Josepan baque. Jahuen chahita cahen Helí.
42003024	Helí sca cahen Mataten baque. Matat cahen Levin baque. Leví cahen Melquin baque. Melqui cahen Janan baque. Jana cahen Josepan baque.
42003025	José cahen Matatiasnen baque. Matatias cahen Amosen baque. Amos cahen Nahuman baque. Nahum cahen Eslin baque. Esli cahen Nagainin baque.
42003026	Nagaí cahen Maaten baque. Maat cahen Matatiasnen baque. Matatias cahen Semeinin baque. Semei cahen Josepan baque. José cahen Judapan baque.
42003027	Judá cahen Joananen baque. Joana cahen Resan baque. Resa cahen Zorobabelnin baque. Zorobabel cahen Salatielnin baque. Salatiel cahen Nerin baque.
42003028	Neri cahen Melquin baque. Melqui cahen Adin baque. Adi cahen Cosamam baque. Cosam cahen Elmodamen baque. Elmodam cahen Erin baque.
42003029	Er cahen Josuepan baque. Josué cahen Eliezernin baque. Eliezer cahen Joriman baque. Jorim cahen Matatinin baque. Matat cahen Levin baque.
42003030	Leví cahen Simeonen baque. Simeon cahen Judapan baque. Judá cahen Josepan baque. José cahen Jonaman baque. Jonan cahen Eliaquim baque.
42003031	Eliaquim cahen Meleanen baque. Melea cahen Mainanen baque. Mainan cahen Matatanen baque. Matata cahen Nataman baque. Natan cahen Davidinin baque.
42003032	David cahen Isaipan baque. Isaí cahen Obedin baque. Obed cahen Boozen baque. Booz cahen Salmonen baque. Salmon cahen Naasonen baque.
42003033	Naason cahen Aminadab baque. Aminadab cahen Adminen baque. Admin cahen Arnin baque. Arni cahen Esroman baque. Esrom cahen Faresen baque. Fares cahen Judapan baque.
42003034	Judá cahen Jacobon baque. Jacobo cahen Isaaquen baque. Isaaque cahen Abrahanen baque. Abraham cahen Tarepan baque. Taré cahen Nacoren baque.
42003035	Nacor cahen Seruquen baque. Seruque cahen Ragaunen baque. Ragau cahen Peleg baque. Peleg cahen Eberin baque. Eber cahen Salan baque.
42003036	Sala cahen Cainanen baque. Cainan cahen Arfaxad baque. Arfaxad cahen Seemin baque. Seem cahen Noeman baque. Noem cahen Lamequen baque.
42003037	Lamec cahen Matusalenen baque. Matusalé cahen Enoquen baque. Enoc cahen Jaretan baque. Jaret cahen Mahalalelnin baque. Mahalalel cahen Cainanen baque.
42003038	Cainan cahen Enosen baque. Enos cahen Setin baque. Set cahen Adaman baque. Adam cahen Papa Diosen baque.
42004001	Dios Yoshiman shinanyahpahax sca Jordan huean janinhax Jesus cahi. Cahi, Dios Yoshiman jano cahue hahca, jano tsoa jaitonma sca cahi.
42004002	Cuarenta neten jano nihnixon bi ta jahuabi piyamanishqui. Tiroma yoshiman sca ta hohchamacatsihquin tana tananishqui. Jahuen cuarenta neten sca hihti picatsih sca jaiya sca Satanasnen tanarihbiquin.
42004003	—Papa Diosen baquexon, toa macan yohihue, piticahinscanon —hahquin.
42004004	Jascajaha: —Piti res jaax jihuetima tah man jai hah ta Papan janishqui huishamaquin —hahquin Jesusen.
42004005	Jaatian sca queya maniquihnxon bochiquixon sca jatihibi mai janin jai jemabo Satanasnen jismarenenquin.
42004006	—Hoa jatihibi ta Papan hea hinannishqui. Queenxon tah hen mia hinantihi, mian sca jato hihbojanon. Jaton jahuabora jatihibi mina sca hihnon.
42004007	Hea bebon min miin raboxonen nichish betihihpaquexon yocacah tah hen mia hinantihi —hahquin Satanasnen.
42004008	Jascahah: —Miin Papa Dios huesti tah min yocatihi, jaa huesti qui tah min betihihpaquetihi hih ta Papa jaiqui jahuen huisha joi janin —hahquin Jesusen sca.
42004009	Jaatian Jerusalen janin sca Satanasnen hioquin. Jano sca Papan xobo pemacanya Jesus penimaxon: —Papa Diosen baque hihquish nenohax cayahue.
42004010	Jahuen yonotibo ta Papan yohitihiqui, mia coiranabo hih ta jaiqui Papan huishani janin. Cayahue.
42004011	Jahuen mequeman ta mia bihtihiqui, macan qui min joxcorohyamanon hih ta jaribinishqui jahuen quirica janin —hahquin Satanasnen.
42004012	Jascahah bi: —Hea cahra hahxoncointihiquin, tanapan hihxon, Miin Hihbo Dios tanayamahue hah ta Papan janishqui —hahscaquin Jesusen.
42004013	Satanasnen hohchamacatsihquin bi jenquetsahaxon bi hohchamatimahiya sca Jesus jenebahini caresscai, joribiyaxahpan hihquish.
42004014	Jaatian Jesus rihbi joresscai. Dios Yoshiman coshi hinanah, Galilea main sca cahi jahui. Nocotaiya, Papan coshiyahpa ta jaa qui hihqui jano jihuetaibo sca yohuan chanicanahi bocani jatihibi janin.
42004015	Jaton tsinquiti xoboho mapexon ta jato haxemapahonishqui. Jan yohihi nincacax, nea ta Papan raanai joni qui hihscacani.
42004016	Jaa pecaho Nazaret jema janin sca Jesus nocoti cahi, janohax jan hanini janin sca nocoti. Jan japahoni quesca sca tantiti neten jaton tsinquiti xobo janin jato betan tsinquiti cahi.
42004017	Tsinquitaibaan sca noque nincamarohahue hahxon Isaiasnen huishani quirica hinancanquin. Jato nincamanoxon sca nihxon quirica quehpenxon jano nea joi jai benaxon jato nincamaquin.
42004018	Dios yoshiman ta hea hihquihiniqui. Jahuajomabo joi siri hen yohinon ta hea caisnishqui. Caisnixon ta hea raannishqui, hinábo hen piconon hináboma sca jaábo. Benchebo rihbi hen yohinon ta hea raannishqui hahquirihbi jisti hahtipahabo. Tiroma hihboyahpabo hen piconon ta hea raanishqui, hinábomascanon.
42004019	Papan jisí ta rahma jahuen joi siri nincamaha hihti siri qui hahquin jato nincamaquin.
42004020	Jascajaquin nincamaxon jahuen quirica xehpoxon quirica coiranxonnica hinanrihbihax tsahopaque sca jai. Tsahotaiya jaa bejisi manacani.
42004021	Jaatian sca: —Nea hen mato nincamaha joi ta rahma maton nincanonbi jascacoinscaiqui, Papan yohini quesca sca —jato jaquin.
42004022	Jan yohihah nincaquin sirijahax rahte rahtescacani. Papan noque hahxoncoinai joi ta noque nincamahaxqui hihquish rahte rahtecani. Jaatian sca shinanax: —Nea Josepan baquema quin —hihscacani.
42004023	Jascari yohuananaiboya: —Hea rah tah man jatihixonbi hea nescajaquin yohiyaxihqui. Rahomehhue, rahonnican hah ra tah man hea jayaxihqui. Capernaum jema janinxon roqui miin coshiyaxon min jato jenquetsaja ra jaxonipi. Neno miin mainxon sca noque jascajaxonhue hah tah man hea jaribitihi —jato jaquin.
42004024	Jato jascajaxon jato hihti yohiscaquin: —Jaabi tah hen mato yohicoinai. Jahuen main cahiton ta Papan joi yohinica jahuen caibaan sirijaquin bihtimahiqui.
42004025	Hihcoinja tah hen mato jai. Elías yamanica jihueni tian ta basi hoi paqueyamanishqui, quimisha bari seis hoxnerihbi hoi yamanon. Jatihibi janin ta hihti pihaxmahnhuan sca hihcannishqui.
42004026	Hicha maton caibo yononmabo jaatian rihbi janí que bi ta jato qui Papan Elías raanyamanishqui. Jato qui ma bi ta Sarepta jema janin Papan raannishqui, huesti sidono yononma haibo qui caxon piti caijaxonnon.
42004027	Jascajaquin rihbi ta Eliseo jihuenitian sca hicha maton caibo sipiyahpabo janí que bi jatoma bi Siria mai janinha huesti res Papan rohajanishqui —jato jaquin.
42004028	Jaton nahua Papan hahxonai nincacax sinacahincani, tsinquiti xoboho jaibo rahsibi sina sinati.
42004029	Bihtanxon sca jemama qui Jesus bocanquin. Jano jai hani xanquen janin boxon rehtenoxon naman potacatsihquibo.
42004030	Rehtecatsihquibaan bi jato nabebacahini cahax Jesus caresscai.
42004031	Capernaum jema janin sca cahi, Galilea mai janin. Nocotipixon jaton tantiti neten jato haxemaquin.
42004032	Jan yohihah nincacax ta rahtecanishqui, shinan hihboxon jaan jato honanmaha copi.
42004033	Jaton tsinquiti xoboho rihbi ta tiroma yoshinyahpa joni mapenishqui. Jesus yohuanai nincacax coshin sai saihihscai.
42004034	—¡Hahrai! ¿Noque jahuejahi min jahuin, Jesus Nazarenon? ¿Noque queyohi min joresscain? Mia tah non honanai. Mia tah min Diosen baque qui —hahquin yoshinyahpaton.
42004035	Jascahah bi: —Jascaraxma netetax jaa jenebahini catanhue —hahquin Jesusen. Catanhue hahca yoshiman jaa joni tapon hueranbohanquin, jato tocan racanon. Jahuabi tiromajaxonma sca jaa joni jenebahinquin.
42004036	Jaa jisish raqueya sca hihcani jaa xoboho jaibo rahsi. Raquetax yohinanancani. —¿Jenquetsahpa coshi shinanya jaa jaiquin? ¡Jistan! Jahuen coshiyaxon ta catanhue hahquiqui. Jaan yohihah ta tiroma yoshinbo boresscaiqui —hihcani.
42004037	Jaa copi ta jaya joihi hicha bocannishqui, janobo jaibo chanicatsihqui xobo tihibi mapecanahi.
42004038	Jaton tsinquiti xobo janinhax sca Simoman xobon Jesus cahi. Nocotaiya bi Simoman haita yona yonati racati. Jaa copi, Rohajaxonhue, hahcanquin, nocoscaiton.
42004039	Hihcohax jaa racatai patax nihrenenxon sca jahuen hisin Jesusen yonoquin jenebahinhue, hahquin. Yonohah, yonayamascacahini. Rohascaax huenitax jato pitijaxoni mehca mehcascai.
42004040	Bari hihquiscaiya sca jaton hisinyahpabo hihuecanquin. Hihuehibo mehexon sca jato rohajapaquequin.
42004041	Hicha tiroma yoshinbo rihbi ta jaan camanishqui. Jenebahini catanhue jan jaah sai saihihcani. Mia tah min Diosen baque qui hihcahini boresscacani. Jaabo hashoan coshin yohuanpanan ta jato netemanishqui. Jaa Cristo hihqui honanax yohuanaibo copi jato netemaquin.
42004042	Xaba paque sca jaiya sca jano tsoa jaitonma sca Jesus cahi. Tsamajaquetaibo caxon jaa benabonaxon merahax hahqui nocohihnati. —Noque jenebahini cayamascahue, hihbon. Noque qui banejaquerohahue —hahcanquin.
42004043	Noque qui banejaquerohahue hahcabo bi: —Huetsa jemabo janin rihbi tah hen Papan joi yohibonahi cati jai, Papan jihuemati joi honanahbo. Jaa copi tah hen jahui —jato jaquin.
42004044	Jaa pecaho sca judiobaan tsinquiti xoboboho mapecanaxon Papan joi siri jato yohibonaquin.
42005001	Jaatian sca Genesaret hian quexa sca cahax, nihxon jano jaibo honanmaquin. Nincacatsihquish sca tsama jonibo hahqui tsinquijaqueti.
42005002	Nincacatsihquibo tsehquesihquin hueranbonaha jisí bi nonti rabe quexa racatai. Nonti racatai bi yapa rahconicabo yamahi, yapa rahcotani jahuex jaton tarrafa pahtsaqui mapescaibo. Huetsa nonti ta Simomana janishqui, huetsa nonti cahen jahuen companihrobaana.
42005003	Simoman nontin nanéxon sca: —Napon hori noque hueranbohanhue —hahquin Simon yohiquin. Jaatian sca nontin tsahoxon sca quexa nichibo haxemaquin.
42005004	Yohuanquin janquenjaxon sca Simon yohiquin. —Nemin janin sca noque hioxon maton tarrafa potanahue, yapa bihnoxon —hahquin.
42005005	—Pota potashinaxon bi tah non jahuabi bihyamahaqui, maestron. Jaabi, mian yohihah tah hen potahi —hahquin Simoman.
42005006	Potaxon sca hicha yapa rahcoquin. Yapa hashoan hichahiya jaton tarrafa huaxacatsihscai.
42005007	Mapo behue behuehahxon sca jaton companihrobo quenacanquin, huetsa nontin joxon jato yanapanabo. Joxon rabebi jaton nonti bochojabahincanquin hihquicatsihscanon caman.
42005008	Yotihi ra jisish raquescaax Jesus bebonxon raboxonen tisquihahpaquexon: —Hea jenebahinhue, Hihbon. Hea tah hen hohchayahpa joni qui —hahquin, Simon Pedronen.
42005009	Huestijaquin potaxon bi yotihi ra yapa bichish Pedro raquescai, hahbe yapa bihnicahbo rihbi.
42005010	Zebedeon baque rabe rihbi ta jascarihbihi raquenishqui, Jacobo betan Juan, Simoman companihrobo rabe. Raquescaiboya: —Raqueyamahue, Simoman. Rahma tah min joni bihnicah sca jatihi —hahquin Jesusen.
42005011	Taxnaxon sca cahen jaton nontibo jatihibi jenebahini sca Jesus manahi sca bocanni.
42005012	Jaa pecaho sca ta janobo jai jemabo qui nocoti canishqui. Huesti jema qui nocoxon sca sipiyahpa joni behchiquin. Sipiyahpaton sca Jesus merahax taracahpaquexon Jesus hihti yocaquin. —Jeen hihxon res tah min hea rohajatihi, Hihbon. Mian tah min hahtipahi —hahquin.
42005013	Jascajaha, mehexon sca: —Queen ta jai. Rohascahue —hahquin. Jaatianbi jahuen bichi siricahinscai, behna sca.
42005014	—Hen mia rohajaha tsoabi yohiyamaxahtahi min. Min yohimis. Tsoabi yohixonma, sacerdote jismatanhue, Moisesnin yohini quescabijaquin hinanti pishcaya catanhue, rohascaxon hinanti pishca. Jascajaquin tah min jato nincamatihi, jonibo tocan hahquirihbi jihueti hahtipahnoxon —hahscaquin Jesusen.
42005015	Yohiyamahue hahca bi hashoan sca jonibo yohibonaquin, Jaan ta hea rohajahaxqui hahquin. Jaa copi hihti caibo sca becani. Jesus yohuanai nincanoxon rahomehti becani.
42005016	Jan cahá cahchiqui nocotahbo jaa huesti Jesus cahi. Jano tsoa jaitonma cahax basihi, Papa yocaqui basihi.
42005017	Huetsa neten sca ta jato haxemaribinishqui. Jato yohihi bi ta fariseoboya jaton haxemanicahbo nocohihnatax nincaqui tsahopaquecannishqui. Galilea mai mehax jahuibo, Judea mai mehax jahuibo rihbi, Jerusalen jema janinhax jahuibo rihbi nincaqui tsahocani. Papan coshiyaxon jan rohajahi sca jiscanquin.
42005018	Tsinquijaquetaiboya sca jahuen yora honanyamajaquetai joni becanquin. Jahuen cacajatiyaxonbi hihuexon Jesus bebonbi janacatsihquibaan bi joni hichahiya jenquetsahax hihcotimahi.
42005019	Jenquetsahaxonbi mapematimahiya sca jayabi xobo pemacanya hinaxon xehuabo xecabohanxon jahuen cacajatinin sca rontanpaquebohanxon Jesus bebonbi sca racanpaquecanquin.
42005020	Jan jato rohajaxontihi shinancoinaibohi jisxon, racatai joni Jesusen yohiquin: —Miin hohcha tah hen mia sohuaxonai, hiconin.
42005021	Jaatian jano tsahotai fariseoboya jaton haxemanicahbo jaabo rahsibi yohinancani. —¿Jahua hihqui shinanax Diosihcamahi yohuanihquin? Papa Dios huestichin ta hohcha sohuati hahtipahiqui. ¿Neatohon rihbi hahtipahiquin? —hihcani.
42005022	Jaya baxexaibo honanxon Jesusen jato yocaquin: —¿Jahua yohuan man maton jointinin jain?
42005023	¿Jahuemeha hashoan teema yohitihquin? ¿Miin hohcha tah hen sohuaxonai hihqui nan? ¿Huenihihnatax nihaquetanhue hihqui nan?
42005024	Jaabi, noquebaque hihxon hen mainxonbi hohcha sohuaxonti hahtipahi honannoxon jisnahue —hahxon sca yora honanyamajaquetai yohirihbiquin: —Mia tah hen yohihi. Huenihihnaxon miin cacajati bihbahini caresscatanhue, miin xobon —hahquin.
42005025	Yohihah sca jaton jisnonbi huenicahuanxon jahuen cacajati bichish jaya cahi caresscai. Jahuen xobon cahi. —Papa Diosen ta hea rohajahaxqui —hihcanahi cahi.
42005026	Nincacax rahte rahtecani. —Papan ta hahxoncoiniqui —hihcani. Caibo rihbi hihti raquetax: —Tsoan jisníma tah non rahma jisiqui —hihcani.
42005027	Jaa pecaho sca caxon, tininti cobranxonai joni Jesusen meraquin, Leví janeya. Jahuen janoxon cobranti misa janin tsahotaiton meraquin. Meraxon: —Hehbe cahi johue —hahquin.
42005028	Jascajaha huenixon jatihibi potabahini cahi, Jesus manahi sca.
42005029	Jaatian sca jahuen xobo janin sca hani fiesta hahqui jonon Levin Jesus quenamaquin. Jaan quenamaha hahbe cobrannicabo rihbi hicha jano jai, jaton hahberabetibo rihbi.
42005030	Jaabo rahsi jaa manahi tsahotaiya sca fariseobo betan jaton haxemanicahbo reren rerenxon, Jesusen haxematibo cahecanquin. —¿Jahua copi man cobranmisboya hohchayahpabo betan man pihi tsahotain? ¿Jahua copi man jascapa betan xehahin? —hahcanquin.
42005031	Jesusen sca jato joi bichinquin. —Hisinjomabo ta rahonnica pishinyamahihqui. Hisinyahpabo caya rahonnica pishinih.
42005032	Pontebo quenahima bi ta pontemabo quenahi hea joníqui, shinanquin pontejahabo —jato jaquin.
42005033	Jaatian: —Juaman haxenicabaan ta hicha piti tenehiqui. Hicha rihbi ta Papa yoca yocacaniqui. Fariseobaan haxematibaan ta jascajaribicaniqui. Minabaan ta jascajayamacaniqui. Minabaan ta pipi pipixon xeha xehacaniqui —hahcanquin.
42005034	—Jaton huetsa huanomahi caxon ta huanomahanan piti tenetima jacanihqui.
42005035	Huetsa tian ta jaton huanomati yamascatihiqui, Papan jato bichinah. Jaatian pari ta benáxon piti teneyaxihcanihqui —hahxon, honanahbo hihxon sca jaa patax queha joi jato yohiquin.
42005036	Nescajaquin jato yohiquin: —Chopa payo honacatsihquin tah non hahan honanoxon hotsihahma chopa behna non teque huaxayamahi. Behna chopayaxon honanoxon non huaxahah ta behna chopa tiromascatihiqui. Payo honahah bi ta behna hotsihax chopa payo betan senenyamarihbiscatihiqui.
42005037	Noquen xehati behna rihbi tah non xeni bichi borasa qui non bochojayamahi. Non bochojaha bi ta pahescaxon borasa pohtoshihmahax noquen xehati yohyocohtihiqui, noquen borasa rihbi tiromascanon.
42005038	Xehati behna tah non hestenica borasa behnabo qui bochojati jai.
42005039	Xehati pahe xehahax tah non bata queenyamarihbihi. Pahe ta nohuepihqui hihquish —hahquin Jesusen.
42006001	Jaatian sca tantiti neten sca bahin cahax trigo huai nabebacahini cahi. Hahbetan caquin, jahuen haxenicabaan huestibo bero tesabonaxon, bishqui bishquihahxon xocaxon picanquin.
42006002	Jascajahiton fariseobaan jato yocaquin: —¿Jahua copi man jascajahin, tantiti neten non piti tsinquitimahi bi? —hahcanquin.
42006003	Jesusen sca jato yohiquin: —¿Papan joi jisquin man Davidinin hahní honanyamahin? Hahbetan cahibo picatsihquiya jaa rihbi picatsihquish,
42006004	Papan xobo janin hihcoxon Papa jismanoxon pejanxonti paan hinanah bihxon, pixon, hahbe nichibo rihbi jan hinanni man honanyamahin? Jascapa ta tsoanbi pitimahiqui, Papa yohixonnica huestichin ta jaa piti hahtipahiqui —hahquin Jesusen.
42006005	Sirijaquin yohiquin sca jato yohirihbiquin: —Hea ta hen noquebaque qui, tantiti nete hihbo —jato jaquin.
42006006	Huetsa tantiti neten rihbi sca jaton tsinquiti xoboho mapexon jato haxemaribiquin. Huesti meyosma joni rihbi jano tsahoti, mecayaho jahuen mequen yosmahi.
42006007	Tantiti neten ta rahonnicabaan tsoabi rahontimahihqui, tantiti netenbi jaa rohajatihiquin hihxon ta jaton haxemanicahbo betan fariseobaan jisisnishqui. Hahan cahenoxon jisiscanquin.
42006008	Jahua yohuan jaabo rahsi jaiquin jahuen jointinin honanxon ta jaton nincanonbi meyosma joni sca yohinishqui: —Huenihihnatax naponbi nihhue —hahquin. Jascajaha huenihihnatax jato tocanbi nihrenenscai.
42006009	Reren rerenaibo sca Jesusen yocaquin: —¿Tantiti neten non siribojaxontimahin? ¿Tantiti neten non tiromajatihin? ¿Joni huetsa non tantiti neten jihuematihin? ¿Non mahuamatihin? Hea yohinahue —hahquin Jesusen.
42006010	Jato jispaquexon meyosma sca yohiquin: —Miin mequen sanahihnihue —hahquin. Yohihah mehanscaax rohacahinscai.
42006011	Roha sca jaa jai bi jano tsahotaibo sina sinati. Jesus qui yohuan yohuanscacani, jahueja non jaa jatihin, hihqui.
42006012	Jascaripish noquen Papa yohihi sca mahchi manichi Jesus cahi. Yametai bi janoxonbi Papa Dios yoca yocashinaquin.
42006013	Xabacoscaiya cahen jahuen haxenicabo quenascaquin. Hahqui jahuiton doce res caisxon: —Mato tah man heen raantibo qui —hahquin.
42006014	Jan caisni ta neabo qui: Simon, jahuen jane huetsa cahen Pedro. Jahuen huetsa Andres rihbi, Jacoboya Juan jaabo rabe rihbi, Felipe, Bartolomé.
42006015	Mateo, Tomas, Santiago Alfeon baque, Simon Zelotes hahcaibo
42006016	Judas Santiagonen baque, Judas Iscariote, jaabo rahsi. Judas Iscariote cahen Jesus paranxon judiobo
42006017	Jato betan botoquihrani jahuex sca mai mispani janin nihrenenai bi hicha haxehibo becani. Nincaqui becani, hihti caibo. Jaabo cahen Judea mai mehax behibo, Jerusalen janinhax behibo. Tiro jema janinhahbo, Sidon jema janinhahbo, quebijistima hian quexa jihuetaibo.
42006018	Jesus nincacatsihqui jahuibo, rahomehti jahuibo. Caibo rihbi tiroma yoshinbaan hihbojani bi becani. Jascapahbo rihbi ta Jesusen rohajanishqui.
42006019	Jesus mehehax jahuen coshin rohahibo rahsibo quen jano jaibo rahsichin jaa mehecatsihscacani.
42006020	Jato honanmaxon bejisquin sca jato yohiquin: Jenimanahue jahuaborajomabon. Papan ta mato jihuematihiqui. Mato cah man jahuen jihuetahbo.
42006021	Jenimanahue pihan hihquibon. Man tah man yaniyaxihqui, rohahihrichi. Jenimanahue huinihibon. Man tah man coin coini bitsayaxihqui.
42006022	Jonibaan mato jistahihmaha jenimanahue. Mato yohuanquihnyamascaxon bi mato roa roahahbo bi jenimanahue. Man hea nincacoinai copi maton janeya tiromahi yohuanaiboya jenimarihbinahue.
42006023	Mato jascahibaan bi hihti coincoinnahue. Jaton xohtabaan ta Papan joi chaninicabo jascajaribinishqui. Naihoh sca ta janoxon mato hinantibo Papan mato hicha bexojaxonihqui. Jaa copi jenimanahue.
42006024	Jascapahbo hahan jenimati jaibo bi ta hicha coriquiyahpahax man ¡Hahrai! hihyaxihqui. Maton jahuaboraya jenimati shinanxon bi tah man jahuabi hashoan bihtimahi.
42006025	Rahma yanitax bi tah man Hahrai hihyaxihqui hihti pihaxmahhuan hihquish. Rahma bitsatax bi tah man Hahrai hihyaxihqui bena benatax huaohihquish.
42006026	Jatihibi jonibo mato qui siripi yohuanaiya Hahrai hihnahue. Papan joi yohihihcamahi quesahiboya ta maton papabo jato qui jascarihbihi siripi yohuanpahonishqui.
42006027	Mato tah hen yohihi, nincanahue. Maton rahuibohon shinannahue. Mato jistahihmahibaan bi jato sirijaquin hahxoncoinnahue.
42006028	Mato roahibaan bi jato qui Papa yocaxonnahue. Mato tahtijahibaan bi jato yocaxonnahue.
42006029	Mia copasah bi copixonma ramiqui sca jismahue. Miin coton mia bichincatsihquiya jaa hinanax miin camiseta rihbi yohuashihyamahue.
42006030	Mia yocacaibo jatihibi hinanhue. Mia bichinai bi bichinyamascahue.
42006031	Hea hahxoncanpahinon hih min jain, jato pari hahxonhue, min jato hahxonai quescajaribiquin mia hahxonnon.
42006032	Matohon queenaibohon tah man copinani queenai. ¿Jaa copi man shinanyahpabo hihqui man shinanain? Nincayosmabo rihbi ta jascanica qui, jatohon queenaibohon queeni copinani.
42006033	¿Caibaan rihbi mato siribojaxonah, copinanquin sca jato siribojaxonquin bi man jaa copi hicha shinanyahpabo man jihuetai man shinanain? Nincayosmabaan rihbi ta jascajanica qui.
42006034	¿Jan mato hinanrihbitihi honanxon man joni huetsa coriqui hinantahbax man jaa copi shinanyahpa sca jain? Nincayosmabaan rihbi ta hahbe nincayosmabo hinantahbahiqui, jatihibi bihribiyanoxon.
42006035	Jaabo jascahi bi tah man maton rahuibohon man shinantihi. Jascapahbo siribojaxonnahue. Hinantahxon bihribiti masa shinanyamanahue. Naihohxon sca ta Papan mato hinanrihbiyaxihquiqui, hashoan hicha sca. Bihribiti shinanxonma hinantahbax tah man noquen naihoh queha Papan baquebo jihuetihi. Jaan rihbi ta jahuen sinatahbohon shinanihqui, jahuen tiromabohon bi shinanquin.
42006036	Yomanahtaibohon shinannahue, maton naihoh queha Papan hahcai quescajaquin. Hohmis hohmisaibohon bi maton naihoh queha Papan jatohon shinanquin hahcai quescajarihbinahue.
42006037	Min hahcai quescajayamaquin bi jaan hahcai quescajaquin joni huetsan jahuaborajahi jisish, Jahuejanoxon jascajahiquin, tiroma joni tah qui hihyamanahue. Jaatian ta mato rihbi Papan jascajayamayaxihquiqui. Caibaan mato tiromajanih bi jaa tiromani shinanyamanahue, maton Papan rihbi man tiromani shinanyamanon.
42006038	Pishinaibo hinannahue, maton papan ta mato hinanrihbiyaxihquiqui. Yohuashihxonma ta tasa bochojaxon bishtaxpaquexon tsahonpaquexon shaconxon hahquirihbi matsanhihnixon mato hinanrihbiyaxihcanihqui. Hinannoxon man toponai quescabijaquin ta maton Papan mato hinanrihbiyaxihquiqui —hahquin Jesusen.
42006039	Jato jascajaxon jaa patax queha joi sca jato nincamaquin. Benchen ta hahbe benche bahi jismatimahiqui. Jismacatsihqui bi ta mai xanquen qui rabebi paquetihiqui.
42006040	Haxenica ta jahuen haxemanicah mentan hashoan honan hihyamahiqui. Sirijaquin haxemaha pari ta jahuen haxemanicah quesca sca jatihiqui.
42006041	¿Jenquetsahaxon min miin bero janin jihuihhuan jaxon bi miin huetsan bero qui jai poto pishca min yohitihin?
42006042	Miin bero janin jihui jaxon jenquetsahaxon sca min miin huetsa yohitihin, Miin bero janin jai poto pishca hean tsecanon tenehue huetsan, hah min jatihin? ¡Quesan! Miin bero qui jai jihui pari tah min potatihi. Jaatian pari tah min jisquin sirijaxon miin huetsa bejistihi, jahuen poto bero pishca tsecanoxon.
42006043	Jihui siribo ta bimi tiromayahpa yamatihiqui. Jihui payo rihbi ta bimi siriboya jatimahiqui.
42006044	Jenquetsahpa jihui hin hihxon tah non jahuen bimi jisxon jatihibi jihui honanai. Moxayahpa jihui queha tah non pama tsinquitimahi. Moxayahpa yora quiha rihbi tah non xexon bihtimahi.
42006045	Noquen jointi janin siri shinanbo jaiya tah non siri yohuan noque jai. Jascarihbihi tah non tiroma jonihax noquen jointi janin tiroma shinanboya tiroma yohuan rihbi jai. Noquen jointi janin jai shinanboya tah non yohuanai.
42006046	¿Hen jahuejanon hihxon man hea Hihbon Hihbon hahcain, hen mato yohihah hea nincaxonma bi hea quenaquin?
42006047	Hehqui joxon hen yohihi nincaxon jaabijaquin hahcaibo rahsi jenquetsahpabo hin hihxon tah hen mato yohihi.
42006048	Jascapa hihquish tah min xobojahi joni quesca qui. Xobo jihuibo nichinnoxon ta nincacoinnicaton nemin pari mai poquinihqui, minquex mai qui nocoxon xobo jihui nichinnoxon. Jaatian ta jenehhuan joxon mai mahpobahinxon bahiquin xobo bocatsihquin bi hahtipahyamahiqui, sirijaquin jan xobo jihui nichinai copi.
42006049	Hen yohihah nincaxon bi hahyamahi joni ta mashin xobojanoxon bemacanya poquinxon jihui nichinai quescapah qui. Jenehhuan joxon maimahah ta xobo paquerestihiqui, jenen huaxa huaxascanon —jato jaquin Jesusen.
42007001	Jato nincamaquin queyohax sca Capernaum jema janin cahi.
42007002	Jano ta huesti sontaro capitan rihbi jihuenishqui. Hahan jan hihti shinanai jahuen joni jai bi jaa jahuen joni hisini. Mahuati hisini racati.
42007003	Jesus nocoscai chanihi nincaxon jahuen joni rohajaxoni Jesus jonon hihxon judio hapobo sca raanquin yohitannahue hahxon. Raanah bocani.
42007004	Jesus qui nocoxon sca hihti yocacanquin. —Jaa hahxonrohahue, Hihbon. Nahuahax bi ta siri joni qui.
42007005	Noquen caibohon ta queenihqui. Noquen tsinquiti xobo rihbi ta jaanbi noque hahxonnishqui —hahcanquin.
42007006	Jascajaha jato betan Jesus cahi. Capitanen xobo qui nocoti cahiboya sca capitanen raanah caibo sca jato behchihi jahui. Behchixon yohicanquin: —Hehon shinanax bi paxquini hocho joyamahue, Hihbon, hih ta jaiqui, Hihbon. Hea ta hen jahuama qui. Heen xobo janin mia hihquiti tah hen senenyamahi.
42007007	Jaa copi tah hen heabi mihqui cayamahaqui. Jano xonbi yohireshue. Min yohihah ta heen joni rohaxihquiqui.
42007008	Hen tah hen honanai. Hean rihbi tah hen heen hapon yohihah hen hahcai, heen sontarobo rihbi tah hen jai, hean yonohibo. Hean cahue hahcá ta catihiqui. Huetsa rihbi cahen johue hahca jahui. Nescajahue hahca cahen hean yohihi quescajaquin, hih ta jaiqui, Hihbon —hahcanquin yohixonquin.
42007009	Capitan yohuanai chanihahbo Jesus rahteti. Janobi rabejaquexon chibanaibo sca yohiquin: —Mato yohinon nincacoinnahue. Jascapa nincacoinnica tah hen ni huestibi Israeli baquebo merayamanihqui —hahquin.
42007010	Jesusen yohihah sca ta capitan janin boribixon jahuen joni rohascai meracannishqui.
42007011	Hoxashinahax mohiyahtax res sca ta Nain hahcaibo jema janin Jesus cahi canishqui. Jahuen haxenicabo betan hicha jonibo rihbi Jesus manahi bocani.
42007012	Jema xehqui qui nocoti caquin sca tsahoni jahuibo behchicanquin. Mahuatipi hiabenahibo behchicanquin. Jaa huesti jahuen baque mahuatipi quen cajon hiacaibo jahuen maman chibanbenaquin. Jahuen bene yamahi, yononma. Jema mehabo rihbi hicha jaa manahi becani.
42007013	Yononma jisxon hahan shinanxon: —Huaohihyamahue —hahquin noquen Hihbaan.
42007014	Yohixon caxon sca cajon mehequin. Jan mehehiya hiacaibo janobi nihreneni. —Beronan. Mia tah hen yohihi, huenihue —hahquin.
42007015	Jan yohihah mahuatipi tsahohihnascai. Tsahohihnatax yohuanscaiya jahuen maman bihnon: —Miin baque bihhue —hahquin.
42007016	Hihti rahte sca jacani. —Papan ta noque hahxoniqui. Jahuen joi nincamanica janon ta noque quiha huesti Papan caisnishqui —hahcanquin, Jesus yohihi. —Noque jahuen jonibohon ta Papan shinanihqui —hihcanahi boribicani.
42007017	Yohuanchanicanahiboya sca ta Judea mai janinhahbaan jatihixonbi nincanishqui, chanihahbo, jaa senenbi jihuetaibaan rihbi nincaquin.
42007018	Juaman haxenicabaan rihbi Juan yohiquin. Nincaxon rabe jahuen haxenica Juaman raanscaquin.
42007019	Noquen Hihbo yocaqui cahábo hihxon jato raanquin. —¿Hoa jahui joni Papan noque yohini mia quin? ¿Jo hen jatiquin huetsa, non mananon? hahquin yocatannahue —hahquin.
42007020	Jaan raanah cahax nocoxon yohicanquin. —Nashimanica Juaman ta noque raanaxqui non mia yocanon. ¿Hoa jahui joni Papan noque yohini mia quin? ¿Jo hen jatiquin huetsa, non mananon? —hahcanquin.
42007021	Jaton jisnonbi sca hicha hisinaibo jaan rohajaquin. Hohmis hohmisaibo rihbi rohajaxon tiroma yoshiman jatsanjahibo rihbi rohajaquin. Hicha benchebo rihbi rohajaquin, jisíbo sca.
42007022	Jaatian yocacaibo sca jaan yohiquin: —Man jisxon nincacah Juan yohitannahue. Benchebaan ta jisresscaiqui. Chantobo ta nihresscaiqui. Sipiyahpabo ta siricahinscaiqui. Pabebaan ta nincascaiqui. Mahuatipibo ta jihuerihbiscaiqui. Jahuaborajomabaan ta joi siri nincaquihqui, hahquin yohitannahue.
42007023	Hen yohihi nincacoinaibo ta hahan jenimati jaiqui —jato jaquin.
42007024	Juan yohihi boressca jaiboya sca Juan tsoa quin honanahbo hihxon tsinquijaquetaibo noquen Hihbaan yocaquin: —¿Jahua jisí man jano tsoa jihuetaitonma caniquin?
42007025	¿Tahua huesti nihuen xayanai nan? ¿Jahua cahran man jisi caniquin? ¿Chopa siri sahuehi joni nan? Hihti siri chopayahpabo tah man hapobaan xoboho pari man meratihi.
42007026	¿Jahua cahran man jisi caniquin? ¿Papan joi yohinica nan? Jaa rahan. Mato yohinon nincanahue. Yohinica res ma bi ta yohinica mentan hashoan coshi joibo jaa jaiqui.
42007027	Hahqui ta huishacannishqui: Jise: Mia bebon canon tah hen heen raanti joni raanai. Mia ta bahi bexojaxoni catihiqui mia hahan canon hih ta jaa yohihi Papan joi janin jaiqui.
42007028	Nincanahue, hen mato yohinon. Juaman yohihi joi mentan hashoan siri joi yohiti ta tsoabi yamahihqui. Papan jihuetahbo res ta jahuamahax bi Papan jihuemaha hashoan siri joi yohiti jaiqui —jato jaquin.
42007029	Jan yohihi nincacax Juaman nashimanibo sca: —Papan ta noque hihti hahxonihqui —hihscai. Coriqui cobranxonaibo betan tsinquijaquetaibo jascacani.
42007030	Fariseobo betan jaton haxemanicahbo jascayamahi. Juaman jato nashimati queenyamanish, rahma Papa queenai quescajati rihbi queenyamarihbicani.
42007031	—Rahma jihuetaibo ¿jenquetsahpabo quin? Jahua quescapahbo hin hen mato yohinon nincanahue.
42007032	Mato tah man baquebo jaabo rahsibi shirohi quescapahbo qui, notsi notsihi nescari yohinanaibo: Man bairahnon hihxon non rehue hahcai bi tah man bairahyamahi. Non huinihah bi tah man noque betan huaohihyamahi hihqui ta notsihi quenananiqui. Jascapahbo tah man qui, rahma jaibo.
42007033	Joxon ta piti siribo Juaman piyamanishqui, xehati rihbi xehayamaquin. Jan piyamahiya tah man hahqui yohuanpahonihqui, tiroma yoshinyahpa tah qui, hihqui.
42007034	Hea sca joxon tah hen pixon xeharihbihi. Hen jascajahiya tah man Hoa pihanhuan jisnahue. Xehanhuan tah qui. Coriqui cobranxonnicahbo ta jahuen hahberabetibo qui. Hohchamisbo ta jahuen hahberabetibo qui hih tah man janiqui, hea yohihi.
42007035	Tsoa ponte shinanyahpa quin hihxon ta jenques jihuetihquin hihxon jisxon pari non honantihi hih ta jacanihqui. Jascatihi bi tah man hehqui yohuanresai —jato jaquin.
42007036	Jaatian sca: —Heen xobo janin pihi canoxahnhue —hah huesti fariseo jonin sca jaah, jano cahax mapetax Jesus hisquen racati, pinoxon.
42007037	Jaa jema janin rihbi huesti hahresti haibo jai. Fariseonen xobohoxon Jesusen pihi honanax jahui, pomo xecobenahi. Jahuen hahan hininjati rahoya pomo.
42007038	Mapetax Jesus cahchiqui nihrenenax jahuen tahe quiri cahcopaquetax huaohihqui. Huaohihqui bi jahuen bero jenen jahuen tahe qui toisihqui. Jahuen boon sca tasoxon, tahe qui tatsohahxon jahuen hinintinin jahuen tahe hininjaquin.
42007039	Jaa jisish, jahuen jointi chicho fariseo yohuanscai: —Papan joi chaninicaxon ta neatohon honanquehanihqui. Hoa haibo jenquetsahpa quin, jenquetsahpaton mehehiquin hihxon cahen honanquehan, hohchayahpa haibo can —hihqui jahuen jointinin.
42007040	Fariseo jascaraiton sca: —Mia ta pishca yohicatsihqui, Simoman —hahquin Jesusen. —¿Jahua hin, maestron? Hea yohiroahahue —hahscaquin.
42007041	—Coriqui jan jato hinantahni cahen rabe jonibaan jaton patoro ribinnish. Huetsan cahen rabe bari teexon copijati ribinish. Huetsan cahen rabe hoxne teexon copijati ribinnish.
42007042	Copijati hahtipahyamahiboya cahen jaton patoronen jato Jascabi sca janon, jenenahue hahcan. Jato jascajaquin hahxonah sca jahuemeha hashoan jahuen patorohon queennishquin? Yohihue —hahquin Jesusen.
42007043	—Hean shinanah ta hoa hashoan ribinpahoni hashoan rihbi sca jahuen patorohon queennishqui —hahquin Simoman. —Hihcoini. Pontejaquin tah min shinanai —hih sca Jesus jai.
42007044	Haibo jisxon sca Simon yohirihbiquin: —Nea haibo jise. Miin xoboho mapetaiton tah min hea tachoquiti hinanyamahahqui. Neatohon caya jahuen bero jenen hea tacho tachoxon jahuen boon sca hea tasohihqui. Mapetaiton tah min hea mehuetanyamahaquin.
42007045	Neatohon ta hihcoxon tahe qui hea tatsohahquin jeneyamahiqui.
42007046	Hahan boo masquiti min hea jahuabi hinanyamahah bi ta neatohon hea hahan hinintinin tasquihiqui.
42007047	Jaa copi tah hen mia yohihi, jahuen hohcha hichahi bi tah hen jatihibi sohuahi, jan hihti queenscanon. Non hichatahma sohuaxonah ta hichatahma rihbi noquehon queencaniqui —hahquin.
42007048	Haibo sca yohiquin: —Miin hohcha tah hen sohuaxonai —hahquin.
42007049	Hahbetan pihi tsahotaibo sca jaton jointi chicho yohuani. —¿Jahua hihxon hohcha sohuaxonti jaan shinanihquin? —hihcani.
42007050	Jascaraiboya bi haibo yohirihbiquin. —Hen mia hahxontihi min shinancoinai copi ta miin hohcha yama sca qui. Sirijaquin shinani sca cahue —hahquin.
42008001	Janohax cahax res sca janobo jai jemabo janin caxon joi siri Jesusen jato yohiquin. Hani jemabo, hanitahma jemabo, jatihibi janin Papan jihuemati joi jato nincamaquin. Jahuen doce haxenicabo rihbi jaa manahi bocani.
42008002	Haibobo rihbi jan rohajaho jato betan bocani. Tiroma yoshiman jispahoni haibobo rihbi jan rohajaho jato manahi bocani. Huetsa cahen María Magdalena, siete tiroma yoshiman hihbojani bi jaan rohajaha rohascai.
42008003	Huetsa cahen Juana, Cusan haibo. Jaa Cusa ta Herodesnin tininti hihpahonnishqui. Huetsa rihbi cahen Susana. Huetsa haibobo rihbi cahen hicha. Huaiyahpaxon jato pitijaxonai haibobo.
42008004	Jemabo janinhax jonibo hahqui tsinquijaqueti nocoscaax hichascaiton sca ta jaa patax queha joi jato nincamanishqui. Nescajaquin jato yohiquin:
42008005	Jahuen huai banahi cahen huesti joni canish. Jahuen huai chianxon sca bero romishin banaquin mihsahahbonaquin. Mihsahahbonahah cahen caibo bero bahinbi paqueti, jahuibaan jamabonascanon. Hihsabaan rihbi joxon topibonaquin queyoquin.
42008006	Caibo bero rihbi cahen chahoma main paqueti. Jaabo cahen joconax bi bemacanya hihquish xanahi pehuacanascai.
42008007	Caibo bero rihbi moxa bero tocan paqueti. Moxa bero betanbi joconax bi hanihiton moxan sca rishquiquin.
42008008	Caibo bero rihbi siri main paqueti. Jaabo cahen joconax, hanihax bimihi, hichahi. Huesti bero potaho joconax bimiyahpascaax cien beroyahpascai. Berotihibi jascari —hahquin. Jaa joi jato nincamaxon coshin sca yohiquin: —Hahan nincati pabinquiyahpaxon nincanahue —hahquin.
42008009	Jaatian jahuen haxenicabaan sca yocaquin: —¿Jahua noque haxemacatsihquin min jascarain, Hihbon? —hahcanquin.
42008010	—Papan jihuemati jenquetsahpa quin man honannon hihxon tah hen jaa patax queha joi yohihi, caibaan honannonma hihxon. Jisxon bi jisyamahabo hihxon. Nincaxon bi nincayamahahbo hihxon tah hen jascapa yohihi.
42008011	-
42008012	Nea tah qui. Jaa bero ta Papan joi qui. Jonibo cahen bahinxon nincacaibo. Nincascaibaan bi ta nincacoinax Papan baquebo sca jamis hihxon tiroma yoshiman jato jaa joi bichinihqui jaton jointi janin yamascanon.
42008013	Chahoma main paquetaibo ta joi siri nincacax coin coinxon bichibo qui. Bemacanya jaton tapon jai quescaxon ta basima tahni bichipixon jenebahinaibo qui.
42008014	Moxa chian paquetaibo ta nincacoinaibo qui. Nincacoinxon bi ta huetsa shinanbo rihbi sca bihcaniqui, masa shinantibo, jahuabora tsamanti shinanbo, mai mehabo costan costanti shinanbo. Jascapa shinanbo jointi qui bochohax ta shinan siri caitimahiqui, jahuama quesca sca jai.
42008015	Siri main paquetaibo ta sirijaquin bihxon nincacoinxon jeneyamahibo qui. Jascapah ta bimi hichayahpa qui.
42008016	Tsoanbi tah non johue quetejaxon quentipan sca mahpobahinyamahi. Quetejaxon tah non tapo naman rihbi tsahonyamahi. Jahuen tsahonti janin caya tah non johue tsahonai, jahuibaan sca jahuen xaba jisnon hihxon.
42008017	Man jonexon hahcai ta janibi sca Papan yohipaqueyaxihquiqui. Jan yohiyamaxihqui ta yama qui, jonexon hahcaibaan bi. Jaan honantima jonexon hahcai ta yama bi res qui. Jatihixonbi honanahbo sca ta jonexon hahcaibo jaan yohipaqueyaxihqui, jahuabi jone yamascanon.
42008018	Jaa copi nincacoinnahue. Nete queyoscaiya ta nescajayaxihquiqui: Papan hinanah min jaiya ta hashoan sca jaan mia hinanyaxihquiqui. Jaan hinanah bi min yamahiya ta min jai pishca rihbi mia bichintihiqui —hahquin.
42008019	Jaatian jahuen mama betan jahuen huetsabo nocoti jahui. Joxon bi jonibo tsamataiya Jesus yohuanquihnti hahtipahyamacanquin.
42008020	Caibo sca chanihi jahui. —Miin mama betan miin huetsabo ta jemanhihtinin nichiqui. Mia ta jiscatsihcanihqui —hahcanquin.
42008021	Jasca jaiboya sca: —Hean yohihi nincaxon hahcoinaibo ta heen mamaya heen huetsabo qui —hahquin.
42008022	Huetsa neten sca ta jahuen haxenicabo betan nontin naneti canishqui. Nanexon sca: —Hian pohquejaquenahue —jato jaquin. Pohqueti caquin hoque quexa sca chibibonacanquin.
42008023	Nihuen xotonah sca pohquecanahi cahi, pohquecanahi cahi, nontinbi sca Jesus hoxascanon. Hian naponbi sca nihuehhuan jato qui paqueti. Behchoman bochojaha nonti hihquicatsihscai.
