42019044	Maton xobobo potojaquetanxon ta maton baquebo rehteyaxihcanihqui. Hahan xobojaquin man tsamanni macan ta ni huestibi huetsa macan cahchian tsahoyamascatihiqui. Mato jascajayaxahnnon bi tah man Papan mato rahma sirijacatsihqui man honanyamahi —jato jaquin.
42019045	Jema janin hihcohax sca Papan xoboho mapeti. Mapexon janoxon maromahibo cainmabahinquin.
42019046	—Heen xobo ta jahoxon hea yocati xobo qui hih ta Papan joi janin jaiqui. Nenoxon Papa yocatihi bi tah man jano yometsohbo tsinquitijahi —hahxon jato jabamaquin.
42019047	Jatihibi neten sca ta jaa xobohoxon jonibo haxemanishqui. Jan haxemahiya cahen judiobaan hapobo betan jaton haxemanicahbaan jaa rehteti shinannish. Judio patorobo betan rihbi jascajaquin shinanxon bi jenquetsahaxon rehteti merayamacanquin.
42019048	Jan haxemahi nincacatsihqui jonibo hashoan hicha tsinquijaquetaiya cahen jenquetsahxon rehtenoxon bihtimahi.
42020001	Huetsa neten sca Papan xobohoxon jonibo haxemahanan jan joi siri yohihiya sca judiobaan hapobo mapeti jahui. Jaton hapobo, jaton haxemanicahbo, jaton yohuan hihbobo, jaabo rahsi jano mapeti jahui.
42020002	Mapexon yocacanquin: —¿Tsoan janen min jascajahin? ¿Tsoan jascajahue hahca min jascajahin? Noque yohihue —hahcanquin.
42020003	—Hean rihbi tah hen mato huesti yocatihi, maton pari hea yohinon.
42020004	¿Tsoan yohiha Juaman nashimapahonnishquin? ¿Jonibaan yohihah nan, Papan yohihah nan? —jato jaquin.
42020005	Jascajaquin yocacah jaabo rahsibi yocacahanannancani: —¿Jahua non yohitihin? Papan yohihah rahan hah non jaiya ta jahua copi sca man jaa nincayamanihquin hah noque jatihiqui.
42020006	Jonibaan res yohihah rahan hih non jaiya ta nea tsamajaquetaibaan noque macaman tsacaxon rehtetihiquin. Papan joi yohinica ta Juan janishqui hah ta jacanihqui jatihixonbi, hih ca hen jaihsen —hihcani, jaabo rahsibi yohuani.
42020007	Jascahahnanxon sca: —Tsoan yohiha jaan nashimanishquin, non tah non honanyamahi —hihcani.
42020008	—Man hea yohiyamahi quen tah hen tsoan yohihah hean nescajahin hean rihbi hen mato yohiyamahi —jato jaquin.
42020009	Jaatian sca jaa patax queha joi sca jonibo yohirihbiquin: —Huesti jonin cahen bimi huai bananish. Huaijaxon ta teexonnicahbo jahuen huai hinantahnishqui, canoxon. Hinantahbahini cahi, hocho cahi caresscai.
42020010	Basixon sca texe jahuen bimi bihxonnon hihxon hochoxon jahuen joni raanquin. Raanah nocotaiton sca hinantahnibaan rishquixon mequen sca camarihbicanquin.
42020011	Huetsa rihbi jahuen joni sca raanrihbiquin. Jaa rihbi rishqui rishquixon roaxon mequen bi res camarihbicanquin.
42020012	Huetsa rihbi sca raanquin, jahuen quimisha sca. Jaa rihbi tsehue tsehuejaxon potacanquin.
42020013	¿Jahuejascapan? Hahan hen queenai heen baque sca raanpan. Jaa rah ta nincayaxihcanihqui, hahxon raanquin.
42020014	Jaa sca nocoti jahui jisish, yohinancani jahuen hinantahnibo. Jahuen papa yama sca jaiya ta nea sca huai hihbo hihyaxihquiqui. Rehtenonhue, jahuen huai noquena sca hinon hihcani.
42020015	Jascaxon huaima qui hioxon sca rehtecanquin. ¿Huai hihbobi joxon sca jahueja jaan jato jatihiquin?
42020016	Joxon ta jahuen hinantahnibo rehtepaqueyaxihquiqui. Jato queyobahinxon sca ta huetsabo sca jahuen huai hinantihiqui —jato jaquin. —Jascajayama jacanpahinon —hihscacani, nincacax.
42020017	Jato bejispaquequin sca: —¿Nea huishani jahua hihcatsihquiquin? Jaa nahuita jihui ta tiroma qui hihxon xobojahibaan potahibaan bi ta jaabaan potahi jihui qui hean xobojacoinai hih ta jaiqui huishani joi.
42020018	Jaa nahuita jihui qui paquetaibo ta tobicahintihiqui, jatihibi. Caibo qui paquequin ta jaa jihuin jato champajabahintihiqui —jato jaquin.
42020019	Jato qui jan jaa joi yohihi honanxon ta jenquetsahaxon non jaa bihtihin hihxon jaton haxemanicahbo betan jaton hapobaan tanaxon bi bihti hahtipahyamacannishqui, jonibo qui raquexon.
42020020	Noquen Hihbo nincacoinihcamahax manahihti cahabo sca caibo copijacanquin. Jaama joi yohuanmatannahue hahxon copijacanquin. Jaama yohihiton bihxon tah non noquen hapo hinanscatihi, noquen gobernador rihbi hinanquin hahcanquin.
42020021	Nincacoinihcamaxon sca Jesus yocacanquin: —Mian tah min sirijaquin yohihi, maestron. Pontejaquin tah min haxemahi. Tsohquibi raquexonma tah min jaabijaquin jatihibi jonibo yohihi. Papa qui cahi bahi tah min honanmacoinai.
42020022	Noque yohihue: ¿Quiquin hapo Cesaronen noque cobranah non copijatihin? ¿Non copijatimahin? —hahcanquin.
42020023	Paranxon yocacaibohi honanxon:
42020024	—Coriqui huesti hea jismanahue. ¿Tsoan mapo jano jaiquin? ¿Tsoan huisha jano jaiquin? —jato jaquin. —Cesaronena rahan —hahcanquin.
42020025	—Jahuena hihquiya jaa hinannahue. Papana hihquiya tah man noquen Papa hinanrihbitihi —jato jaquin.
42020026	Tsinquitaibaan jisiya ta jenquetsahaxon yohuanquihnxon bihtima jacannishqui. Jato joi bichinah neteresscani, rahtetax.
42020027	Saduceobo sca jahui, tsoabi ta mahuatax hahquirihbi huenitimahiqui hihnicabo. Jaabaan sca tanaquin yocaquin.
42020028	—Maestron, Moisesnin ta huishanishqui, noquen bocha baquejahaxma hihxonaiya non jahuen yononma bihxon hahqui noquen huetsa yamanica non baquejaxonti.
42020029	Siete joni ta janishqui, jaa mama quiha rahsi. Bebo quihaton ta haibo bichish bi baquejahaxma mahuanishqui.
42020030	Jahuen chini jaa bichish bi jascarihbihi.
42020031	Huetsa rihbi sca jahuen chini, jascarihbihi. Jatihibi sca jascarihbihi, baquejahaxma queyocani.
42020032	Hahchon sca ta jaton haibo rihbi mahuanishqui.
42020033	Papan noque hahquirihbi huenihiya sca, ¿tsoan haibo jaa jatihiquin? Jatihibichin jaa hahuinjani —hahcanquin.
42020034	—Rahma jihuetaibo ta haibo bihmahahnaniqui.
42020035	Papan caisxon hahquirihbi jihuemahibo ta huanoyamascayaxihcanihqui. Huanomayamaribiquin.
42020036	Jaabo ta mahuayosmaboyaxihquiqui. Papan yonotibo hihqui quescarihbihi ta jayaxihcanihqui. Papan jato jihuemaha ta jahuen baquebo rahsi sca jayaxihcanihqui.
42020037	Mahuanicabo hahquirihbi hueníyosmabohi man shinanah bi ta huenínicabohi Moisesnin yohinishqui, nescajaquin: Hea tah hen Abrahanen Papa Dios qui, Isaaquena rihbi, Jacobona rihbi.
42020038	Papa Dios ta mahuanihbaan Diosma qui. Jaa ta jihuetaibaan Papa Dios qui, Jaan jisi jatihibi japarihi quen —jato jaquin.
42020039	—Hihcoini rahan —hih sca jaton haxemanica huesti jai.
42020040	Hashoan yocati qui raquescaax jascari.
42020041	Netetaiton sca: —¿Jahua jisxon Cristo ta Davidin baque hihyaxihquiqui jacanihquin?
42020042	Man jisyamahin, behua huishaquin ta jaa yohihi Davidinin yohinishqui: Xaba hihbaan ta heen hihbo yohinishqui, Hea mecayaho hihbohi tsahohihnahuea
42020043	Miin rahuibo miin hinabo sca hihnon hen jato namanjanon caman neno tsahotihue hah cahen Davidinin janish huishaquin.
42020044	Heen hihbo jan hihquiya ¿jenquetsahax res sca jahuen hihbohax bi jahuen baquetihiquin?
42020045	Jato jascajaxon jatihixonbi jonibaan nincanon sca jahuen haxenicabo yohiquin:
42020046	—Jaton haxemanicahbo hihqui quesca man jamis. Coiramenahue. Jaton chopa siribo sahuehax jano jonibo tsinquijaquetai nihti ta costancaniqui, jisibo hihquish jano nichi. Caibaan jato Hapon hahnon hihxon ta costancaniqui. Tsinquiti xoboho ta hapobaan tsahotibo janin tsahocatsihcanihqui. Pihi johue hahca ta xobo hihbo patax bi res tsahoxon picatsihcanihqui.
42020047	Yononma meraxon ta tahtijaxon jahuen jahuaborabo jatihibi bichincaniqui. Paranquin ta Papa basi yocacaniqui, jatihixonbi nincanon hihxon. Jascapa ta Papan hihti casticanyaxihquiqui —jato jaquin.
42021001	Jaatian sca coriquiyahpabo jano nichi jisquin. Papa qui hinancatsihquin coriqui naneti bohnanti janin coriqui nanehi nichibo jisquin, hicha coriqui nanehibo.
42021002	Huesti yononma sca joxon jahuen coriqui yamahi bi jahuen rabe coriqui romishin nanequin. Jaan nanehi jisxon sca Jesusen jato yohiquin:
42021003	—Hoa jahuaborajoma yononmanen ta caibo mentan hashoan hicha nanehiqui.
42021004	Hoabaan ta hicha bi res jaxon texe hinanihqui. Hoa yononmanen ta jatihibi pishinxon bi jan jai jatihibi hinanihqui —jato jaquin.
42021005	Jaatian Papan xobo yohihi caibo yohuani. —Macanbo hihti siribo tah qui. Jise. Sirijaquin ta hahcannishqui, xobo siri —hihcani.
42021006	—Nea man jisi xobo ta potojaquetanyaxihcanihqui. Ni huesti macanbi ta huetsa cahtsahotimascatihiqui. Potaquin ta ni huestibi pishinmayamayaxihcanihqui —jato jaquin.
42021007	—¿Jahuentian jascajayaxihcanihquin, maestron? ¿Jahua jisxon non min yohihi quesca sca jacatsihqui non honantihin? —hahcanquin.
42021008	—Coiramenahue, mato parancanmis. Hea tah hen qui hihqui ta heen janen hicha joyaxihquiqui. Nete ta queyocatsihscaiqui hih ta jaribiyaxihcanihqui. Jascascaibaan bi jato nincayamaxahnnahue.
42021009	Rehtenanaibo joi nincacax bi rahteyamayaxahnnahue. Mai hihbocatsihxon rehtehibo joi nincacax rahteyamarihbiyaxahnnahue. Jascapahbo pari ta jatihiqui. Jascapa jai bi ta nete queyorihyamatihiqui —jato jaquin.
42021010	Jascajaxon jato yohirihbiquin: —Huetsa jonibo ta jaton nahuabo betan rehtenanyaxihcanihqui. Quiquin hapobo ta hahbe quiquin hapobo betan rehtenantihiqui.
42021011	Mai rihbi ta coshin bi res mihuanyaxihquiqui. Nahuan pahen ta hisinyaxihcanihqui, mahuati hisini. Hicha janin ta jascayaxihquiqui. Hahqui raquetibo ta jatihiqui. Naihoh rihbi ta hahan honantibo jayaxihquiqui.
42021012	Jaabi ta jascapahbo jariyamahi bi mato tiromajanoxon mato yahtanyaxihcanihqui. Tsinquixon mato tiromajanoxon ta jaton tsinquiti xoboho mato boyaxihcanihqui. Jaton sipo xoboho rihbi ta mato tsahonyaxihcanihqui. Man heen janen yohihi copi ta jaton gobernadorbo janinxon mato demandanyaxihcanihqui. Jaton quiquin hapobo janinxon jascajaribiquin.
42021013	Hioxon ta mato Hihcoini sca yohuanhue hahxon mato tana tanayaxihcanihqui.
42021014	Mato jascajahabo bi rahtexonma maton jointinin shinanquin sirijanahue. Jahua yohipan hihyamanahue.
42021015	Jaatianbi tah hen mato shinan hinantihi, hahan yohuanti hinanquin. Man hahan yohuanaiya ta mato joi bichinti hahtipahyamayaxihcanihqui. Mato joi bichincatsihquibo rahsichin ta Jascama ta qui hahti hahtipahtimahiqui.
42021016	Hahan yohuanti shinan hen mato hinanah bi ta mato qui yohuanxon caibo maton papabaan, maton mamabaan, maton huetsabaan, maton jenabaan, maton hahbe rabetibaan maton tinintibo mato bihmayaxihcanihqui. Caibo rihbi ta mato rehteyaxihcanihqui.
42021017	Man hea nincacoinai quen ta mato jistahihmayaxihcanihqui.
42021018	Jaabi tah man manotimahi, ni huestibi ta maton boo queyocahintimahiqui.
42021019	Hea jenebahinyamahax tah man queyoyamanox manatihi.
42021020	Mato jascajayaxihquibo bi nahuan sontarobo nea Jerusalen mayahahtanbohanai jisxon, nea jema tiromajabahinti nea pishca sca jai honannahue.
42021021	Jaa jisish Judea main jihuetax mahchi janin jabacahintannahue. Jerusalen janin hihquish rihbi picocahintannahue. Jemama qui nichibo rihbi jema janin joyamascanon.
42021022	Huishani joibo jai quesca sca janon ta hihti tiromabo netebo jatihiqui.
42021023	Jascapa hahqui nocotah ta tohoyabo hohmis hohmisyaxihquiqui. Xoma hahmahibo rihbi jascarihbihi. Nea main jihuetaibo ta hihti tiromabo huinoyaxihquiqui, Papan jato casticanah.
42021024	Sontarobaan ta hicha jonibo rehteyaxihquiqui. Jato bihxon rihbi ta jatihibi nahuabaan main jato borestihiqui. Nea Jerusalen rihbi ta nahuabaan hihbojayaxihquiqui, jaton nete senennon caman.
42021025	Hahan honanti rihbi ta jayaxihquiqui, bari huetsapahi. Hoxne rihbi huetsahpacahini, huishibo jascarihbihi. Quebijistima nian coshin behchon behchonax tsahca tsahcajaquetaiya ta jatihibi janin jihuetaibaan rihbi hihti masa shinanyaxihcanihqui.
42021026	Jahua sca noque huinomatihiquin hihquish ta raqueya jihuetax jaton jointi masacahinax jonibo mahuayaxihquiqui. Naihoh queha coshibo ta Papan shacon shaconyaxihquiqui.
42021027	Jaatian ta naihoh quehax hea noquebaque botopaquetai jisyaxihcanihqui, nai cohiman hihti coshi xabaya hea jahuiya.
42021028	Hen mato yohihi quescari jacatsihscaiya yobacahinnahue. Hen mato bichi joti nea pishca sca jai honanax, bejisihnibahinquin hahcajahi jihuenahue.
42021029	Jato jascajaquin yohixon, jaa patax queha joi jato yohiquin: —Banabo jihuibo jisnahue, jatihibi jihui rihbi jisnahue.
42021030	Bochocohi jisish tah man Bari tian sca ta jatihiqui hih man jai.
42021031	Jascajaquin rihbi hen mato yohihah quescari jaresscai jisxon, mato bichi hea joti nea pishca sca jai honannahue.
42021032	Hen mato yohihah quescari jatihibi jascascaiya pari ta nete queyoyaxihquiqui.
42021033	Naiya mai queyoyaxihqui bi ta heen joibo jahuentianbi queyotimahiqui.
42021034	Coiramenahue. Pahen pahenax man jointi xehpomis. Tiroma netebo huinotax, Hahrai jahueja sca non jatihin hihquish man jointi xehpomis. Huetsa janin man maton shinan camahiya hahan hea jahui nete mato qui nocorenenmis.
42021035	Jatihibi main jihuetaibo qui ta jaa nete histon nocorenenyaxihquiqui.
42021036	Hen mato yohihah quesca jaresscacatsihquiboya mato cahnehahbo hihxon jatihibi tian hoxa tenexon jaayocanahue. Hea naihoh quehax jahuiya, hea bebon nihnicahnoxon hihxon, jaayocanahue —jato jaquin.
42021037	Jato jaa joibo yohinoxon ta bariyahpan Papan xobohoxon jonibo haxemahax yamebo sca Olivoya manan janin hoxahi capahonishqui.
42021038	Xaba paquescaiya ta Papan xoboho jonibo hahquirihbi tsinquijaquepahonishqui, jan haxemahi nincaqui jahuex tsinquicani.
42022001	Jaatian pascua fiesta hochoma sca jai, chahoma paan piti fiesta.
42022002	Jesus yohihi, Jenquetsahaxon non jaa mahuamatihin hih sca jacani, judio hapobo betan jaton haxemanicahbo. Jonibo qui raquetax jascacani.
42022003	Jaatian Judas Iscariote Satanasnen hihbojaquin. Jaa Judas ta Jesusen haxenica hihpahonishqui, jahuen doce joni huesti.
42022004	Caxon judio hapobo yohuanquihnxon jaton tinintibo rihbi jaan yohuanquihnquin. Jenquetsahaxon Jesus bihmatihin honanscaxon jato yohiscaquin.
42022005	Jan jato yohiha jenimacani. Jenimahanan: —Mia tah non copijatihi —hahcanquin.
42022006	—Mato tah hen bihmacointihi —hihquish, Jahua hora jonibo yamahiquin, Jaatianbi bihmahah ta siri qui hihscai Judas, shinamehti.
42022007	-
42022008	Fiesta hani neten sca jaton paan pinon jaton carnero baque rehteti netenbi Juanya Pedro Jesusen yohiquin: —Noquen fiesta piti hahxontannahue non pinon —hahquin.
42022009	—¿Jahuerahnoxon piti non hahtihin, Hihbon —hahcanquin.
42022010	—Jema janin caxon tah man jene bihtanax poo hiabenahi jahui joni behchinoxihqui. Jaa tah man chibantihi. Jano jaa mapetai janin rihbi tah man jaa xoboho mapetihi.
42022011	Mapexon xobo hihbo yohinahue: Jahoxon heen haxenicabo betan hen pascua piti pinon jahoxon piti chique jahuen hin hah ta maestronen jaiqui hahquin yohitannahue.
42022012	Man jascahah ta bochiquiha chique hani mato jismanoxihquiqui bexojaha siriscai bi. Janoxon pitija noque jaxontannahue —jato jaquin.
42022013	Caxon sca jan jato yohihah quescabi meracanquin. Janoxon sca pascua pitijaxoncanquin.
42022014	Ma hihresscaiya pihi tsahopaquecani, Jesus jahuen haxenicabo betan.
42022015	—Janin hea tiromajacanmis tah hen mato betan nea pascua piti hihti queenahqui.
42022016	Papan jihuetahbo janon hen jaton hohcha queyobahinnon caman tah hen pascua piti piyamascatihi —jato jaquin.
42022017	Hahqui xehati sca bihxon: —Nea bihxon hinanpaquenahue.
42022018	Nea hompa tah hen xehatimascai, mato jihuemahi jonoxon caman.
42022019	Jato jascaxon, posen sca bihxon Papa yohixon tehcaxon jato hinanrihbiquin. —Nea ta heen yora qui, man jihuenon hihxon tah hen hehrí jato rehtemahi. Mahuaquin tah hen mato hahxonai. Jaa shinanhahnan piti ta nea qui. Hen mato hahxonai shinanhahnan pinahue —jato jaquin.
42022020	Pixon xehati sca bihxon jan piti yohihah quescajaribiquin: —Nea xehati hahnahue. Hahxontijanixon mato hahxonscaxon tah hen behna sca hahquirihbi hahxontijahi. Hahxontijaxon hen jahuentianbi huetsajatimahi honanahbo tah hen heen jimi potahi. Jaa shinanhahnan xehanahue.
42022021	Jaa hen mato jascajaquin yohihi que bi ta hea bihmahi jonin hehbetanbi piti bichiqui.
42022022	Papan yohini quescabihi ta hea tiromahabo jatihiqui. Hea tiromajayaxihquibo bi ta hea jato bihmanoxihqui joni Papan hihti casticanyaxihquiqui —jato jaquin.
42022023	Jato jascahah, yohinancani. Tsoan cahra jascajatihiquin hihquish yocacahanancani, jaabo rahsibi.
42022024	Caibo sca yohinani, Tsoa non hashoan hapo hihyaxihquiquin hihquish. Jascaraibaan bi Jesusen jato yohiquin:
42022025	—Nahuabaan quiquin hapobaan ta jato hihti hihbojahiqui. Jato yono yonohah bi ta Jaa ta hapo siri qui hihcanihqui.
42022026	Mato tah man jascapahbo jatimahi. Cacannicahax bi tah man jatihibichin yonoti quesca man jatihi, jato hahxonnicah. Mato bebonica ta maton chini quesca jatihiqui, mato hahxonnicah.
42022027	Huetsan pinon ta huetsan rihbi metexoniqui. ¿Jahuemeha hashoan hapo quin? ¿Pinica hashoan hapoma quin? Maton hihbo hihxon bi tah hen mato tocan jihuexon mato hihti hahxonai.
42022028	Caibaan hea tiromajahah bi tah man jenebahinyamarahsihi.
42022029	-
42022030	Hea quiquin hapo hihnon heen Papan hea yohini quescajaribiquin tah hen hean sca mato rihbi yohihi, hapobo sca man janon, hea quiquin hapo quen man hea janin hehbetanbi pixon xehayaxahnnon. Hen mato hinanah tsahoxon tah man quiquin hapoboscaxon israelibaan doce jenabo man yonoyaxihqui.
42022031	—Simoman, nincahue, Simoman. Bimi bero rahsi bihcatsihquin tohaquin hahcajaquin mato tana tananoxon hihxon ta Satanasnen coshin yocacaxqui.
42022032	Jaabi tah hen mia yocaxonaqui, min nincacoinquin jeneyamanon. Hahquirihbi miin shinan pontexon sca miin huetsabo coshi hinanyaxahnhue.
42022033	—Sipo xoboho hea tsahonahbaan bi tah hen mia jahuentianbi jenebahintimahi, hihbon. Hea rehtehibaan bi tah hen mia jenebahintimahi —hahscaquin Simoman.
42022034	—Yohicoin tah hen mia jai, Pedron. Nea yamebi ta hatapa queori jaima quimisha coti min Hea tah hen jahuen jonima qui hih min jatihi hea yohihi.
42022035	Pedro jascajaxon jatihibi sca yohiquin: —Coriquijoma tah hen mato raannihqui, borasajoma rihbi, sapatojoma rihbi. Jascapa raanah bi ¿jahua man pishinnihquin? —Jahuabima rahan, hihbon —hahcanquin.
42022036	—Rahma tah hen mato yohihi. Borasayahpahax jaya cahue. Coriquiyahpahax jascarihbihi. Hahan rehtenanti machitojomaxon miin coton maromaxon machito marohue.
42022037	Hea yohihi, Hahbe yometsohbo betan ta hihquiqui hih ta hea yohihi jacanihqui, hehqui huishani joi jai quescajaquin ta hea janoxihcanihqui. Jaa copi tah hen yometsoh yohuanihcamaquin mato yohihahqui. Neateman huishaxon yohini quescabi sca ta jaresscatihiqui, hea yohihi joibo —jato jaquin.
42022038	—Jise, Hihbon. Neno tah non machito rabe jai —hihcani. —Jascabi sca janon jenenahue —hahquin.
42022039	Xobo janinhax cahax, jan hihcachihi quescari Olivoya manan manichi cahi. Hahchon bi jahuen haxenicabo rihbi manahi cahi.
42022040	Nocoxon: —Tiroma yoshiman mato tanayamanon Papa yocanahue —hahquin.
42022041	Jato jascajahax hori pishca non macan pishca potahi tihixon jaa huesti cahi. Cahax, raboxonen nihxon, Papa yocascaquin:
42022042	—Papan, rahma janoxihquibo hea cahnemahue, queenxon. Jaabi, hea queenai quescarihma bi mia queenai quesca janoxihnon —hahquin.
42022043	Jaatian Papan yonoti naihoh quehax hahqui botopaquexon coshi hinanai jiscanquin.
42022044	Jaatian bená benaxon Papa hihti yocascaquin. Yocahahnan niscani, jimi toisihquicamahi niscani. Mai qui toisihquiya mai mehchascai.
42022045	Yocati queyohax res sca huenicahuanax jahuen haxenicabo qui joxon benaya hoxahiton jato meraquin.
42022046	—¿Jahua jenquetsahax man hoxa hoxahin? Huenixon Papa yocanahue; tiroma yoshiman mato tanamis.
42022047	Jan jato yohihi betanbi jonibo nocoti. Jato betan jahuen haxenica Judas rihbi jato beboxoni jahui. Jesus qui joxon betsohahquin saludanquin.
42022048	—¿Betsohahquin min hea jato bihmahin, Judasen? —hahscaquin Jesusen.
42022049	Jaatian Jesus tejabohanaibohi jisxon sca: —¿Non jato rerascatihin, hihbon? —hahcanquin jahuen haxenicabaan.
42022050	Judio hapon yonoti sca huestichin reraquin. Reraquin bi jahuen pabinquin mecayaho paxtebahinquin.
42022051	—Jenenahue —hahxon jahuen pabinqui Jesusen mehexon rohajaquin.
42022052	Jaya tejacahuanaibo cahen porisiabo, sacerdotebo, mesco hapobo. Jato jatihibi yocaquin: —¿Yometsoh yahtanquin hahcajahi man machitoya jahuin? ¿Maton huinoboya man jahuin?
42022053	Nete tihibi Papan xobohoxon honanmahanan hen mato betan hihrasihi bi tah man hea bihyamahipiqui. Yame bihnicahbo tah man qui, yame baqueboxon.
42022054	Jato jascahah bi bihxon judio hapon xobon Jesus bocanquin. Hocho tahni cahen Pedronen jato chibanbonaquin.
42022055	Jesusyabi caibo mapenon, caibaan jemanhihtian chihi requenjaquin. Pehchihi tsahotaiboya sca Pedro rihbi jato tocan pehchihi tsahoti.
42022056	Pehchihi tsahotai jisxon, Pedro bejisxon huesti haibaan sca yohiquin: —Nea rihbi ta hahbetan nihrasihiqui —hahquin.
42022057	—Quesahi. Jaa tah hen honanyamahi joni qui —hihscai Pedro.
42022058	Jahuen hihbo jan hihbomayamahah basima sca huetsan rihbi bejisahnan yohiquin: —Mia rihbi tah min jahuen joni qui —hahquin. —Jaama tah hen qui —hihribiscai.
42022059	Basima huesti hora tihixonpahax huetsa rihbi yohuani: —Hihcoini ta jato betan nea nihcachihiqui, Galilea mai meha joni can —hihqui.
42022060	Jan jascarai bi: —Min yohihi tah hen honanyamabiresai —hihribihi Pedro. Jan yohuanai betan bi hatapa queoscai.
42022061	Xobohoxon sca rabejaquexon Jesusen Pedro bejisquin. Jaatianbi ta Jesusen yohihah joibo Pedronen shinanscanishqui, janin hatapa queonon tah min quimisha coti hehqui paranahxihqui jan yohihah shinanscaquin.
42022062	Shinanax, picotax huaohihscai. Hihti huaohihqui, Pedro.
42022063	Xobohoxon sca Jesus xecoxon hosanhahnan rishquicanquin.
42022064	Bebepoxon beshrishquixon yocacanquin: —Jisxonma yohihue. ¿Tsoan mia beshrishquihiquin? —hahcanquin.
42022065	Hicha jascapa join hosan hosancanquin.
42022066	Xaba paque sca jaiya sca, jaton hani hapobo tsinquiti becani. Sacerdote hapobo betan jaton huisha honanbo tsinquicani.
42022067	Bexon, jato tocan sca Jesus nihmacanquin. Nihmaxon: —¿Mia min noquen Cristo quin? Noque yohihue —hahcanquin. —Hen mato yohihah bi tah man nincatimahi.
42022068	Hen mato yocacah bi tah man yohitimarihbihi.
42022069	Rahma tah hen hea noquebaque Papa mecayaho tsahonoxihqui, janoxon sca jahuen coshiyaxon yononoxon.
42022070	Jato jascaha, joi bichincanquin: —¿Mia min Papa Diosen baque quin nan? —Jaa tah hen qui. Man yohihi quescabi rahan —hahquin.
42022071	—¿Jahua hashoan nincati non pishinain? Jan jascari yohuanai tah non noquenbi nincacai —hahscacanquin.
42023001	Canon benahue hahxon sca Pilato janin sca Jesus hiocanquin jatihixonbi.
42023002	Janoxon sca quesa cahecanquin. —Nea tah non noquen caibo hihbojacatsihquiton merahahquin. Quiquin hapo Cesaro copijayamahabo ta jato haxemahiqui. Quiquin hapo Cristo jan hihqui ta yohirihbihiqui —hahcanquin.
42023003	—¿Mia min judiobaan quiquin hapo quin? —hahscaquin Pilatonen. —Min yohihi quesca rahan —hahquin Jesusen.
42023004	—Hean jisi ta jahua copi nea joni demandanti yamahihqui —judio hapoboya jano tsamajaquetaibo Pilatonen jaquin.
42023005	Coshi coshixon sca: —Neatohon ta jonibo sinamaxon coromahiqui. Judea mai janin jatihibincon nihxon ta jato jascati haxemahiqui. Reboqui Galilea janin pehocohnish ta neno caman sca jahuiqui, jascati honanmabenahi —hahcanquin.
42023006	—¿Galilea mai meha joni hin? —Pilatonen jato yocaquin.
42023007	Herodesnin mai meha joni Jesus hihqui honanxon, Herodes janin sca jaya bohabo jato raanscaquin. Herodes rihbi Jerusalen janin jaatian jai quen hahqui sca jato raanquin.
42023008	Jaatian Jesus jisish, Herodes coin coinscai. Jaya joihibo nincanish basi sca jaa jiscatsihquish jenimascai. Jahuen coshiyaxon hahcai jiscatsihquish jenimahi.
42023009	Jahuen coshi jiscatsihxon sca yoca yocaquin. Yocacah bi jahua hihyamahi.
42023010	Jan jahua hihyamahi bi ta jano rihbi nihxon judio hapobo betan jaton haxemanicahbaan quesajaquin coshin bi res cahe cahecannishqui.
42023011	Jahuen sontarobo betan Herodesnin Jesus tiromajaquin yohixon hosan hosanscaquin. Quiquin hapon tari sahuemaxon sca Pilato janin raanrihbiquin.
42023012	Pilato betan Herodes rainyamapahonish bi jaatianbi raescai rabebi.
42023013	Pilatonen sca judio hapoboya jaton meyayahpabo quenamaxon, jaton jonibo rihbi quenamaxon jato yohiquin:
42023014	—Noquen jonibo noque bichincatsihqui joni tah qui hahxon tah man nea joni hihuehahqui. Maton nincanonbi tah hen sirijaquin jaa yocacahqui. Honanquin sirijaxon tah hen jahua copi caheti merayamahi.
42023015	Herodesnin ta merayamarihbihaxqui. Hen hahqui raanah bi ta noque qui raanrihbihaxqui. Jahua copi rehteti ta yamahihqui, jan tiromani yamahi.
42023016	Jaa copi tah hen rishqui rishquimaxon picoxihqui —jato jaquin Pilatonen.
42023017	Jaton fiesta tian cah qui huesti joni jato picoxonpahonnish, hahpahonibo quescajaquin.
42023018	Pilatonen jato yohihah bi coshin bi res sai saihihcani jatihibi. —Jaama rahan. Barrabas caya noque picoxonhue —hahcanquin.
42023019	Barrabasnen ta jaton jema janinhahbo sinamaxon rehtenanmanishqui. Jaa copi ta sipo xoboho jaa tsahoncannishqui, jan joni rehteni copi rihbi.
42023020	Sai saihihquiboya coshin sca Pilatonen jato yohirihbiquin: —Jesus tah hen mato picoxontihi.
42023021	Pilato coshin yohuanai bi sai saihihquin mahuincanquin. —Jihui qui hueonhue. Jihui qui hueonhue, mahuanon —hihcani.
42023022	Jato yohirihbiquin, quimisha coti sca: —¿Jahua tiroma hen janishquin nan? Hean jisi ta jahua copi rehteti yamahihqui. Jaa copi tah hen rishquimaxon jenebahintihi —hahquin Pilatonen.
42023023	Hashoan sca coshicahinxon coshin bi res yohicanquin. —Jihui qui hueonxon rehtehue —coshin yohiquin Pilato mahuincanquin, sai saihihxon.
42023024	Jaabaan yohihi quescajati ta jaiqui hihxon sca
42023025	hoa joni rehtenica sca jato picoxonquin, jaabo queenai quescajaquin. Rehtenanmanica joni picoxonxon bi Jesus jato hinanquin, jaabo queenai quescajahabo.
42023026	Jesus boxon sca jemama quirihax jahui joni behchixon bihxon jaa jahuen coros hiamacanquin. Simon janeya joni ta jaa janishqui, Cirene mai meha. Jesus chibanbonanon hiamacanquin.
42023027	Hicha jonibo rihbi hahchon bocani. Haibobo rihbi hahchon bocani, huini huinicanahi. Jaya huaohihcanacani.
42023028	Jato qui rabejaquexon sca Jesusen jato yohiquin: —Heya huaohihyamanahue, Jerusalen haibobon. Maton yoraya huaohihnahue, maton baqueya rihbi huaohihnahue.
42023029	Tiromabo netebo ta mato qui nocoti jahuiqui. Jaatian tah man masa shinanyaxihqui: Hea rihbi baquejoma japahinon, baquexo jahuentianbi bihyamaha cahen hashoan siripan. Jahuentianbi baquexo xoma hahmayamani cahen siripan hih tah man jayaxihqui.
42023030	Noque qui paquenahue mananbon. Noque mahpobahinnahue, mahchibon, hah tah man jatihi.
42023031	Xoo pari jihui jai bi nescajahibo jaiya ¿jihui xanascaiya jenquetsahpabo jatihiquin? —jato jaquin.
42023032	Huetsa joni rabe rihbi ta bocannishqui, tiroma rabe. Jesus hueonxon jaabo rabe rihbi jihuin hueonnoxon bocanquin.
42023033	Mapo xao janeya mahchi manixon sca janoxonbi jihuin hueoncanquin. Jesus naponbi janon, jaa patax tiroma joni huesti hueonxon nichinxon, ramiho sca huetsa joni tiroma.
42023034	—Jaton hohcha jato sohuaxonhue, Papan. Hea honanyamaxon ta hea nescajacanihqui —hihqui Jesus. Jihuin Jesus hueonxon sca tsoan jahuen chopa bihtihiquin hihxon macan bero pishca borasa qui nanexon chicohah huetsa macan pari cainaiya huetsan jahuen chopa bihnon, huetsa macan pari cainaiya huetsan sca jahuen chopa bihnon hihxon, jascajaquin jahuen chopa bihcanquin.
42023035	Jano tsinquijaquecahuani nihxon, jonibaan jis jisquin. Hosan hosancanquin, jaton hapobaan. —Caibo ta rohajapahonishqui. Papan Cristohax hahrí sca rohajahanon, Papan caisah jonihax hahri rohajahanon —hihcani jaton hapobo.
42023036	Sontarobaan rihbi sca jano nihxon hosan hosanquin. Mae cachani bexon, hinanquin.
42023037	—Judiobaan quiquin hapohax mihri rohajahahue —hahcanquin.
42023038	Jahuen mapo bochiqui quirica rihbi hueoncanquin. Nea ta judiobaan quiquin hapo qui hihqui jaa quirica.
42023039	Jaa patax hueonahbo huesti sca yohuani, yometsoh huesti: —¿Mia min Cristo quin? Mihri rohajahatax botoxon noque rihbi hahxonhue —hihqui hosani.
42023040	Ramiho quehaton sca joi bichinxon jahuen hahbe tiroma joni qui rainyamascai: —¿Mia min Dios qui raqueyamahin? Mia rihbi tah min mahuanoxihqui.
42023041	Noque rabe non tiromajani copi tah non rahma mahuatai. Non caibo hahni quescaja ta noque jacanihqui. Noque quescayamahi ta nea jahua tiromayamanishqui —hahxon, Jesus sca yohiquin:
42023042	—Quiquin haposcaxon, hehon shinanyaxahnhue, Jesusen —hahquin.
42023043	—Nea netenbi tah min hehbetanbi heen jihue janin jacoinnoxihqui —hahscaquin Jesusen.
42023044	Barin manan tsacahiya sca, jatihibi janin bahquishihcahini, bari mahpohah yamecahini, bari racapaquescanon caman bahquishihcahini.
42023045	Papa yocati xoboho rihbi chopa chique naponbi huaxacahini, quexe rabe sca janon.
42023046	Coshin bi res sca Jesus yohuani: —Hea bihhue, Papan. Mihqui tah hen hinamehtai —hihquish mahuascai.
42023047	Jatihibi jisish jano nichi sontaro capitan sca yohuani: —Papa Diosen ta jisiqui. Nea joni ta siri joni hihquishqui —hihqui.
42023048	Jisi jahuibo rihbi hen mia yohihibo jisish rahte rahteti. Masa shinanax xohpatsihtax sca boribicani.
42023049	Hahbetan nihpahonibaan rihbi hocho nihxon jatihibi jisquin. Galilea mai janinhax jaa manahi jahuipi haibobaan rihbi jatihibi jisquin, hochoxon.
42023050	-
42023051	Jaatian ta Jerusalen janin José janeya joni japahonishqui, Arimatea jema janinha joni. Arimatea ta judiobaan jema rihbi qui. Jaa José ta jaton cacannica rihbi janishqui, hihcax bi siri joni, pontejaquin shinanai joni. Noque jihuemanica Papan raanpahinon hihnicah. Jaan jisí cahen jahuen hahbe hapobaan tiromajaquin shinanrahsihi. Jesus rehtecatsihquibo quescayamahi ta jaa janishqui, jaabaan hahcachihi quescajayamaquin.
42023052	Jaa José sca Pilato janin caxon Jesusen yora yocaquin.
42023053	Jesusen yora bihpaxon sca, sabananen rahcoquin sirijaxon, mai xanqueman poquin quiniho sca mihinquin, jano tsoabi tsahonnihma.
42023054	Tantiti neten piyanoxon ta jaton pitijati neten jaa tsahonnishqui, tantiti nete nea pishca sca jaiya.
42023055	Galilea mai mehax Jesus betan jahuipi haibobo ta José chibanbonahi canishqui, jan tsahoni cahiya. Tsahon honanxon, jan jascajaquin racanai jisish, boresscacani.
42023056	Hahan yora hininjati mescohi bocani. Mirra janeya hahan hininjati rihbi bichi bocani. Tantiti neten sca tanticani, Moisesnin yohini quescari.
42024001	Tantiti nete huinoscaipish xaba honanax sca tsahon janin boribicani. Jaton hininjatibo rahojahipixon papibahini bocani.
42024002	Nocoxon, hahan xehpohipibo macan taranbohana sca meracanquin.
42024003	Tsahon janin hihcoxon bi noquen Hihbo Jesusen yora merayamacanquin.
42024004	Jahuen hea bohancanaxquin hihquiboya sca rabe joni jano sanareneni. Jaton chopa cahen bahri bahrichi.
42024005	Hihti raquetax, jato qui betihihpaquecani haibobo. Betihihpaquetaiton: —Mohitahpa joni tah man benahi. ¿Jahuajanoxon man neno tsahonnihbo janin man benahi jahui nan?
42024006	Nenoma ta qui. Ma ta hueniscaaxqui. Galilea mainxon jan mato yohiho shinannahue.
42024007	Hohchayahpabo qui tah hen hea noquebaque hinamehti jai, jihuin hueonxon rehtescaabo. Jaa pecaho tah hen jahuen quimisha neten sca hahquirihbi teehihtihi hah ta mato jahoxqui —hahcanquin, sanareneni jahuibaan.
42024008	Yohihah, Hihcoini, jasca ta jahoxqui hihcani.
42024009	Jacahini sca tsahon janinhax boribicani. Jahuen once haxenicabo yohitannon benahue, jato jatihibi yohinon benahue. Texe rihbi jano jaibo yohinon benahue hihcahini bocani.
42024010	Jaa ta María Magdalena qui, Juana, Jacobon mama María rihbi. Caibo haibobo rihbi jato betan bocani. Nocoxon jahuen haxenicabo yohicanquin.
42024011	Yohihah bi yohuanresaibo shinanxon jato nincayamacanquin.
42024012	Pedro sca picotax bishquihihcanahax tsahon janin nocotax cahcopaquexon jisi bi jano jahuen sabana jano huesti tsamati. Jahua jenquetsaxquin hihquish, rahtetax, xobon sca caribihi.
42024013	Jaa neten bi sca jato quiha rabe joni cahi, huetsa jema janin cahi bocani. Emaus janeya jema janin cahi bocani, Jerusalen janinhax tahen cahá cahen rabe hora.
42024014	Yohuan yohuancanahi bocani. Jisipiboya rahma nincabehnanaibo rahsi shinanax yohuan yohuancanahi cahi.
42024015	Yohinancanahi bohiboya sca, jato chibanbonahi caxon jato huinonquin bi jato manahi sca Jesus nichi.
42024016	Jaa hihqui bi bebepohah quescaxon jaa honanyamacanquin.
42024017	—¿Jahua yohuan man jain, man yohinani nihcanahin? —jato jaah, nihrenencani jaton bemanan huetsapahcahini.
42024018	Cleopas janeya sca yohuani: —¿Jerusalen janin jihuetahxon bi min mia huestichin jano jaipibo joi min honanyamahin? —hahquin.
42024019	—¿Jahua jaipishqui nan? —hahquin. —Jesus nazareno jaipibo rahan. Jaa ta Papan joi yohinica hihpahonishqui. Jatihibichin jisnon bi ta Papan coshiyaxon hahpahonishqui. Papan shinanyaxon ta noque haxemapahonishqui.
42024020	Noquen hapobo betan noquen cacannicabaan rehtenon ta hinanipicanaxqui, jihuin hueonxon rehtehahbo.
42024021	Noque israelibo jihuemanicah tah qui hih non jarasihi que bi ta rehtehipicanaxqui. Neayanish ta quimisha netescaiqui, rehtepibo.
42024022	Rahma rihbi ta noquen chocabaan noque rahtehaxqui. Hihari tsahon janin caxon roqui jahuen yora xahbanjacanax.
42024023	Merayamahax qui joquin sca Papan yonotibo jato qui cainai qui jiscanquin. Jihue ta jaiqui qui jaa yonotibo jai, yohuani.
42024024	Jaatian ta noque janinhax caibo rihbi sca jahuen tsahon janin bocanaxqui. Haibobo yohuanah quescabi roqui meracanax, jahuen yora yamascai —hihcani.
42024025	—Honanyamahibon. ¿Yotiho chahoma maton jointi quin? Papan joi yohinicabaan yohini joibo jatihibi man nincapanan.
42024026	¿Jascapa tiromabo huinoti Criston jai yohiyamacannishquin? ¿Jaa pecaho sca naihoh queha quiquin hihbo jaa jatihi yohiyamacannishquin? —jato jaquin.
42024027	Jato jascajaxon, Moisesnin huishani joibo jato honanmaquin sirijaxon, texe Papan joi yohinicabaan huishani joibo sca jato honanmapaquequin, Cristo yohihi joi rahsi.
42024028	Jano jaabo cahi jema qui sca nococani. Hojno caparihi quesca jaa jai bi hihti yocacanquin:
42024029	—Noque qui banetahhue. Bepi sca ta jaiqui. Bari ta hihquicatsihscaiqui. Jeenhihquish mapeti.
42024030	Jaabaan Pihue hahcá piti bihxon Papa yocaxon tehcaxon jato hinanquin.
42024031	Jaatian pari jaton bero quehpemehxon quescaxon jisxon jaa hihqui honanscacanquin. Jaatian jaabaan jisi bi jaa yamacahin sca jai.
42024032	—Bahinxon noque yohixon huishani joibo noque honanmaxon ¿noquen jointibo xecahihnimayamahaxquin? —hihcani.
42024033	Jaatianbi cahax, Jerusalen janin boribicani. Nocoxon jahuen once haxenicabo tsinquitaiton meracanquin. Texe rihbi jato betan tsinquiti.
42024034	—Noquen Hihbo ta teehihrihbihiqui. Hueni coin ta jaaxqui. Pedronen ta jisishqui —hihqui tsinquitaibo.
42024035	Jaatian jaabo rabechin bahinxon jisxon nincatanah yohixon, jan paan tehcaxonaiya jaa hihqui honanaibo yohicanquin.
42024036	Jato yohiparihiya bi jato tocan jaa sanareneni jahui.
42024037	Rahte rahtetax, yoshin tah qui hihquish, raquepahhuancani.
42024038	¿Jahua jenquetsain man rahtetain? ¿Jahuejahi man maton jointi janin raqueya yohuanain?
42024039	Heen mequen jisnahue. Heen tahe jisnahue. Hea tah hen qui. Mehexon jisnahue. Yoshinma tah hen qui: yoshin ta nami yamahihqui, xaobo yamarihbihi. Hea ta jascapahma qui.
42024040	Jato jascajaxon, jahuen mequen jato jismaquin. Jahuen tahe jato jismaquin.
42024041	Hihti jenimaya rahte rahtexon jaa hihqui shinanyamaparihiboya sca jato yocaquin: —¿Man piti yamahin? —jato jaquin.
42024042	Yapa xohi teque pishca hinancanquin.
42024043	Bihxon jaton jisnon bi sca piquin.
42024044	Pixon jato yohiquin: —Mato betan jihueparixon tah hen mato yohinihqui, hea yohihi Moisesnin huishani jatihibi jai quesca ta jatihiqui. Huetsa Papan joi yohinicabaan huishani joibo, Davidinin behua janin rihbi jaibo quesca sca ta jatihibi jatihiqui.
42024045	Jascajaquin yohixon jaton jointi quehpenxonquin Papan huishani joibo honancoinahbo jato yohiquin.
42024046	—Tiromahabo bi Cristo mahuatihi, jan hihquipish bi quimisha neten hihquish hahquirihbi teehihti ta huishacannishqui.
42024047	Maton shinan pontenahue jan maton hohcha sohuaxonnon hahquin Jerusalen janin yohimenohax janohax jatihibi jonibo janin sca jahuen janen jascajaquin yohiyaxihcani, jaa jatihibi ta huishaxon yohicannishqui.
42024048	Yohinihbo jai quesca sca jai jisxon tah man honanquin sirijahi.
42024049	Papan mato hinantijani tah hen mato qui raanyaxihqui. Nea jema janin banetahnahue, heen naihoh queha coshi mato qui noconon caman —jato jaquin.
42024050	Jato jascajaxon Betania jema janin caman jato hioquin. Janoxon sca jahuen mequen sanahihnixon siri shinanya janoxihquibo sca jato yohiquin.
42024051	Jato yohihahnan sca caresscai, naihoh hinahihnati.
42024052	Jaabo sca hihti jenimahanan Jerusalen janin boribicani.
42024053	Papa yocati xoboho res mapexon Papa yocacanquin, Hahxon tah min noque jai, Papan, hahquin.
43001001	Jahuabi jaríyamanon ta Papan joi hihbo janishqui. Papa Dios betan jihueti. Papan joi hihbo ta Papan shinanyahpa qui. Dios bi res ta jaa joi qui.
43001002	Naiyahpa mai jaríyamanon ta Papa Dios betan jaa joi hihbo janishqui. Jahuen jane cahen Jesus.
43001003	Jaan ta jatihibi janishqui. Jaan hahyamani quen ta jahuabi yamaquehanihqui.
43001004	Jaan ta jatihibi yoshinyahpabojaquin jihuemanishqui. Jaa noquen jihuemanicah ta noquen xaba qui.
43001005	Bahquish chian xabatai bi cahen yamepan bahquishjayamaquin.
43001006	Noquen xaba hihbo ta jahuiqui hihqui jonon ta Juan janeya joni Papan raannishqui.
43001007	Jaa ta xaba hihbo qui hihxon yohicoini jonon. Joxon, jatihixonbi nincacoinahbo hihxon jato yohicoinquin.
43001008	Jaa Juan cahen xaba hihquishma bi xaba hihbo qui yohicoini jahui.
43001009	Jaa xaba hihbo ta jatihibi joni xabajanicah qui. Xaba hihbo hihquish bi cahen noque janin jaa jahui.
43001010	Jan hahni nete janin jaabi jahue que bi cahen jano jihuetaibaan huetsapahascaquin, jaabi que bi.
43001011	Jaton caibo que bi Johue hahyamacanquin, jaanbi hahni nete janin nocotai bi.
43001012	Caibaan res Johue hahquin. Jaa Johue hahcaibo cahen: Diosen baquebo sca janahue, mato rahsibi, hea nincacoinaibo rahsi, xabapan jato jaquin.
43001013	Jaa Johue hahcaibo Papa Diosen baquebo hihnon, jimiyahpa papa janonma bi queeyahpa papajomabo hihnon, bebaan baquejaha hihnonma bi: Papan baquebo janahue xabapan jato jaquin.
43001014	Yorayahpahax ta noque betan jaa Papan joi hihbo jihuenishqui. Jan hihti coshin hahcai tah non jisniqui. Jaa huesti jahuen papa xohtahi, nete hihbohi. Yohuani hihcoinai. Shinanyahpa siri.
43001015	Hahqui chanicoini cahen Juan coshin yohuani, nescari: —Hoa ta hen mato yohipi noque qui, hea pari jomenoni que bi ta hehchon jahui noquen hea mahuinihqui, jaa pari jihue hihbonixon —hihqui.
43001016	Jahuen shinan hihti caibohi tah non jatihixonbi bihniqui, jaan hinanresah.
43001017	Xabapan shinan non bihnon hihxon ta Papan Moises yononishqui, noquen nincati joi Moisesnin huishanon. Jaa pecaho ta Jesucriston sca jahuen shinan noque hinanresiqui, hihcoinai joi non honannon, noquehon Papan shinanai non honannon.
43001018	Tsoanbi ta noquen Papa Dios jisyamanishqui, jahuentianbi. Non jisyamani bi ta hahan jan shinanai jahuen baquen noque yohiha, jenquetsahpa noquen Papa Dios quin non honanscai.
43001019	Yocacahbo hihxon ta Jerusalen janinha judiobaan jaton sacerdoteboya levitobo Juan qui raannishqui. —¿Mia min tsoa quin? —Juan yocacahbo. Yocacahbo ta jato yohicoinnishqui.
43001020	Paranxonma jato yohicoinquin: —Hea ta hen Cristoma qui —hahquin.
43001021	Jasca jan jaiya, yocarihbicanquin: —¿Tsoa min quin? ¿Mia min Elías yamanica quin? —hahcanquin. Jascahahbo bi: —Hea ta jaama qui —hahquin. —¿Hoa Dios joi yohinica nan? —hahscacanquin. —Hea ta jaama rihbi qui —hahquin.
43001022	Jaatian yocarihbicanquin: —¿Tsoa min quin? Noque Yocatannahue hahcaibo non yohihi sca canon, Jaa ta hen qui noque jahue, mianbi —hahcanquin.
43001023	—Cahchihoxon quenahi ta hea qui, Hihbo hahan jonon bahi najisti chai jaxonnahue hahnicah. Papan joi yohinica hihxon Isaiasnen noque yohini quescabijaquin tah hean jai —jato jaquin.
43001024	Yohihahbaan bi fariseobaan sca hahquirihbi raanah, yocarihbicanquin:
43001025	—¿Jahua copi min Cristo hihxonma bi min jato nashimahin, Elías rihbi hihxonma bi, hoa Dios joi yohinica rihbi hihxonma bi min nashimahi nan? —hahcanquin Juan yocaquin.
43001026	—Hean ta hen jenen res nashimahi. Mato tocan ta man honanyamahi joni nichiqui.
43001027	Hehchon jahui que bi tah hen jahuen sapato risbi pecaxonti senenyamahi, jaa hihti siri copi —Juaman jato jaquin.
43001028	Jordan huean hoque quexaxon, janoxon Juaman jato nashimahi janinxon bi ta jascajaquin yocacannishqui, Betania jema janinxon.
43001029	Huetsa bahquish sca jari Jesus jahui qui jisxon, Juaman jato yohiquin: —Jisnahue. Hoa ta Papan carnero joni qui, main jihuetaibaan hohcha copi mahuayaxihqui joni.
43001030	Hen mato yohihipi tah qui, Hehchon jahui jonin ta hea mahuinihqui, jaa pari jihue hihbonixon hahquin.
43001031	Hean rihbi jaa honannixonma bi tah hen israelibaan jaa jisxon honannon hihxon hean jenen nashimahi joníqui —Juaman jato jaquin.
43001032	Jato jascajaxon yohirihbicoinquin: —Naihoh quehax Dios Yoshin botopaquetax, nobex quescapa hahqui bototi manahi jahui tah hen hean jisoqui.
43001033	Jaa tsoa quin tah hen hean rihbi honanyamanihqui. Hen honanyamahi bi ta Papan hea yononishqui, jenen nashimahi hea jonon. Botopaquetax heen yoshin siri jaa manahi jahui min jisyaxihqui ta heen yoshin siri bichibo nashimaquin hahcajanicah qui, heen yoshin siri jato hinanquin, hih ta Papa jahoxqui.
43001034	Jan jascajahi jisoxon ta hen mato yohicoinai: Papa Diosen baque tah qui —Juaman jato jaquin.
43001035	Huetsa bahquish sca, jahuen haxenica rabe betan nihribixon,
43001036	Jesus nichi jisxon: —Jisnahue. Jaa ta Papa Diosen carnero qui —jato jaquin.
43001037	Jan jascarai nincacax rabebi jahuen haxenica cahi, Jesus chibani sca.
43001038	Rabejaquexon, chibanai jato meraxon Jesusen jato yocaquin: —¿Jahuejahi man behin? —jato jaquin. Yocacah: —¿Jahuen min jihuetain, Rabin? —hahcanquin. Rabin ta maestron hihcatsihquiqui.
43001039	—Jisi benahue —hahscaquin. Jaatian boresscaxon, jan jano jihuetai jisish, bepiscaiya jaa netenbi jahuen xoboho banecani.
43001040	Huesti ta Andres janishqui, Simon Pedro huetsa. Huetsa joni betan nihxon, Juan yohuanai nincaxon, Jesus res sca chibanquin.
43001041	Jahuen huetsa Simon benaxon meraxon: —Mesías tah non merascai —hahquin. Mesías cahen Papan raanah joni hihcatsihqui, Cristo, jaton join.
43001042	Jascajaxon, Jesus janin Simon hioquin. Nocotaiya bejisxon Jesusen yohiquin: —Mia tah min Simon qui, Juaman baque. Cefas janeya sca tah min jayaxihqui —hahquin. Cefas ta macan hihcatsihquiqui.
43001043	Huetsa bahquish sca Galilea main cacatsihquin Felipe meraxon: —Hehbe cahue —hahquin Jesusen.
43001044	Betsaida jema janin ta Felipe jihuepahonishqui, Andres betan Pedro jano jihuepahoni janin.
43001045	Natanael meraxon, Felipenin yohiquin: —Papan joi huishaquin Moisesnin yohini joni tah non meratanai. Papan joi yohinicabaan rihbi hahqui huishaxon yohini. Josepan baque Jesus tah qui, Nazaret janinhah —hahquin.
43001046	—¿Nazaret janinha jahua siri jatihiquin? —hihqui Natanael. —Jisihue —hahscaquin Felipenin.
43001047	Natanael hahqui nocoti jahui jisish Jesus yohuani: —Jisnahue. Jaa ta israeli baque coin qui, paranyosma joni —hihqui.
43001048	—¿Jenquetsahaxon min hea honanain? —hahquin Natanaelnin. —Higo jihui naman tsahotai ta hen mia jisiqui, Felipenin mia quenarihyamanon —hahquin Jesusen.
43001049	—Mia tah min Papa Diosen baque qui, Maestron. Mia tah min israelibaan quiquin hapo qui —hihscai Natanael.
43001050	Jesusen sca Natanael yohiquin: —¿Higo jihui naman tsahotai ta hen mia jisiqui hen mia jaiya min nincacoinain? Heen coshiyaxon hahcai tah qui. Hashoan rihbi heen coshiyaxon hen hahcai tah min jisyaxihqui.
43001051	Yohicoin ta hen mato jai: nai huiso quehpemehtaiya hea janinhax hinahihnatax hea noquebaque qui nocoti botopaquetai tah man Papan yonotibo man jisyaxihqui —jato jaquin.
43002001	Jan jascahipi quimisha neten sca Galilea main huanomahibo jai, Caná jema janin. Quenamaha jano rihbi Jesusen mama cahi.
43002002	Jahuen haxenicaboyabi canon Jesus rihbi quenamacanquin, huanohihbo jisi canon.
43002003	Jaton xehati queyoscaiya: —Hompa ta yamascaiqui, baquen —hihqui jahuen mama.
43002004	—¿Min jascaraiya bi jahueja hen jatihin, maman? Heen coshiya teeti nete ta nocorihyamahiqui —hahquin Jesusen.
43002005	Xehamanicahbo sca: —Jaan mato yohihi quescabijanahue —jahuen maman jaquin.
43002006	Janobi rihbi cahen seis macan poo tsahoti jene paxa hahqui bexojatibo. Hanibo poo can, huesti cuñete hihyamahax rabe cuñete betan senenai tihopabo, hahan judiobo mechoquiti, tachoquiti, jaton hihti quescari.
43002007	—Poo qui jene bohasaxonnahue —jato jaquin Jesusen. Jaatian bohasabahincanquin.
43002008	—Huehaxon, fiesta hihbo nomimatannahue —Jesusen jaah sca, huehaxon nomimacanquin.
43002009	Jaa jene hompacahinscai bi fiesta hihbaan tanaquin. Tanaxon bi jahuerahnohah hin honanyamaquin. Jene bihtanaibaan honanai bi fiesta hihbaan honanyamaquin. Tanaxon jahuen huanoni quenaxon sca fiesta hihbaan yohiquin:
43002010	—Pahenscaiton jato tiroma xehati xehamanoxon tah non siri pari jato hahmanica qui. Mian tah min rahma pari hompa siri cainmahi —hahquin.
43002011	Galilea mai janinhah Caná jema janinxon ta Jesusen jascajamenoquin hahan honantijanishqui. Jahuen coshi jato jismahah cahen jahuen haxenicabaan nincacoinscaquin, Papan caisai joni hihqui honancoincanquin.
43002012	Jaa pecaho jahuen mama, jahuen jochicabo rihbi, jahuen haxenicabo rihbi Capernaum janin hahbetan cahax nocotax jahuentihi ra netebo jano baneti, basima tahni.
43002013	Judiobaan pascua fiesta nea pishcascaiya Jerusalen janin Jesus cahi.
43002014	Nocoxon Papan xobohoxon jaton ganadoya carnero maromahiton jascapa maromanicahbo meraquin. Nobex maromanica joniboya coriqui mahnenannica jonibo rihbi jano tsahotai merarihbiquin.
43002015	Jascajahiton meraxon risbipan hahan rishquitijaxon jeman jato potaquin. Jatihibi potaquin, jaton ganadaboya jaton carneroboya bi. Jaton coriqui napabohanxon coriqui misa rihbi behonjanquin.
43002016	Nobex maromanicahbo sca yohiquin: —Nescapahbo botannahue. Heen papan xobohoxon jascajayamanahue. Janoxon marotima tah qui —jato jaquin.
43002017	Jato potahi jisxon, Hea tah hen miin xobo hihti jenipahichai jaa jiscatsihqui, hihqui neateman huishani joi jahuen haxenicabaan shinanscaquin.
43002018	Jahuen haxenicabaan sirijaquin shinanai bi judiobaan sca joi bichinquin: —¿Jahua hahan honanti min noque jismahin, nescajanoxon? —hahcanquin.
43002019	—Nea xobo potojaquetannahue, quimisha nete huinoxon hen jaa xahnenenbi hahribinon —Jesusen jato jaquin.
43002020	—¿Cuarenta y seis bari teexon janquenjanibo xobo min quimisha neten xobojaquin queyotihin? —hahcanquin.
43002021	Jahuen yora yohihi jan hihqui bi janoxon Papa Dios yocati xobo yohihi shinancanquin.
43002022	Hihquipish bi teehihrihbihiya pari ta jan jascajaquin jato yohiho jahuen haxenicabaan shinanscanishqui. Shinanax, Hihcoini Papan huishamani joi ta jaa yohihi jaiqui, noquen Hihbo Jesusen rihbi ta noque jascajaquin yohinishqui, hihcani.
43002023	Pascua fiesta tian Jerusalen janinxon hahan honantibo Jesusen hahcai jisxon: —Papan caisai noque tah qui —hahcanquin hicha jonibaan.
43002024	Jascaraibaan bi jato jatihibi honanax jato tocan Jesus nihresyamahi.
43002025	Jatihibi jonibaan shinanai jaanbi jahuen jointinin honanscai copi, Jasca ta shinancaniqui hihnica pishinyamahi.
43003001	Huesti fariseo joni ta judiobaan cacannica hihpahonishqui, Nicodemo janeya joni.
43003002	Jesus qui yame caxon yohiquin: —Noque honanmahi mia jonon ta mia Papan raannishqui, Maestron. Non tah non honanai. Mian tah min hahan honantibojahi. Mihbetan Papa Dios hihyamahiya cahen min jascajati hahtipahyamahan —hahquin.
43003003	Jaatian: —Mia tah hen yohicoinai. Behnajaquin jonijahama jonin ta Papan jihue jistimabiresiqui —Jesusen jaa jaquin.
43003004	—¿Yosibohax non jenquetsahax hahquirihbi jonitihin? Noquen maman xahquin janin non hahquirihbi hihquitihin, jonirihbinoxon? —Nicodemonen Jesus jaquin.
43003005	—Mia tah hen yohicoinai: Dios Yoshiman jonijahama joni ta Papan jihue janin hihcotimabiresihqui. Jenen rihbi jonijahama joni ta jano hihcotimabiresihqui.
43003006	Namin jonijaha ta yorayahpa qui. Dios Yoshiman jonijaha ta yoshin rihbi qui.
43003007	Hahquirihbi joniti tah min jai hen mia jaah bi rahteyamahue.
43003008	Jano jan queenaiton ta nihue cahiqui. Jahuerahnohax cainax jahuen cahiquin tah min honanyamahi, xoo hihqui nincaxon bi. Dios Yoshiman jonijaha jatihibi ta jascarihbi qui —Jesusen jaquin.
43003009	—¿Jaa min yohihi jenquetsahatihiquin nan? —hihqui Nicodemo.
43003010	Jesusen sca yohiquin: —¿Israelibaan honanmanicahxon bi min hean mia yohihah min honanyamahin?
43003011	Yohicoin tah hen mia jai: Honanxon non mato yohihah bi tah man nincayamahi. Jisxon non yohihah bi tah man nincayamahi non hihcoinai bi.
43003012	Nea mai meha joi yohihah bi nincacoinyamaxon tah man jenquetsahaxon bi naihoh queha hen mato yohihi joi nincacointimahi.
43003013	Tsoabi naihoh catanni que ma bi tah hen janohax botopaquetai hea huesti jano canicah qui, hea noquebaque.
43003014	Nincacoinaibo queyoyamanox mananon ta cahchihoxon Moisesnin rono nichinhihninoxon jihuin hueonni quescajaquin hea noquebaque nichinhihninoxon hueonyaxihcanihqui.
43003015	Hea noquebaque qui hinamehxon nincacoinaibo jatihibi ta queyoyamanox manatihiqui.
43003016	Nai nequebihabo hihti queenxon ta jahuen baque hea huesti Papan raannishqui, hinamehxon nincacoinaibo jatihibi queyoyamanox mananon, tsoabi mehtexehtaxma jihuenon.
43003017	Main jihuetaibo casticani jonon hihxonma bi hen jato jihuemahi jonon hihxon ta Papan hea raannishqui.
43003018	Nincacoinai jonibo ta jahua copi casticantimabo qui. Nincayosma jonibo ta casticanscatihiqui, Papan baquen yohihah bi jahua nincayamahibo.
43003019	Mai janin xaba jahue que bi ta xaba jenipahiyamacaniqui. Yame caya ta jenipahicaniqui tiromabohax. Jaa copi ta jato casticanyaxihquiqui.
43003020	Nenoxon tiromajahibo rahsi ta johue jiscatsihyamahax xaba quiri cayosmabo qui, tiromajahibo caibaan jismis hihquish xaba quiri cayamahi.
43003021	Hihcoinaibo ta xaba quiri canicah qui. Papan jisi hah ta jaan jaiqui caibo hihnon hihquish —Jesusen Nicodemo jaquin.
43003022	Jaa pecaho ta jahuen haxenicabo betan Jesus canishqui Judea mai janin. Jano jato betan banexon nincacoinaibo hihquimatanquin nashimaquin.
43003023	Enon jema janinxon Juaman rihbi nashimaquin Salim hochoma jano noayahpa huean jaiton. Juaman jato nashimanon caibo jano cahi.
43003024	Sipo xoboho Juan tsahonrihyamahiboya jano jonibo bocani.
43003025	Jascascahiya Juaman haxenicabo betan judiobo yohinani: —¿Jenquetsahaxon non noquen hohcha potatihin? —hihqui yohinani rainyamahi.
43003026	Juan qui caxon sca yohicanquin: —Jordan hoque quexa mia manatipi jonin rihbi ta nashimahiqui, maestron. Min noque yohicoinipi joni tah qui. Jise. Hahqui sca ta jatihibi bocanihqui —hahcanquin.
43003027	Jascahahbo jato yohiquin: —Papan noque hinanyamahah tah non tsoanbi jenquetsahpabi bihti hahtipahtimahi.
43003028	Hea ta hen Cristoma qui. Hean pari yohixoni jonon hihxon res ta Papan hea yononishqui. Hen jascahipi tah man matonbi honancoinai.
43003029	Nesca tah qui, jisnahue. Jahuen haibo hihnon cahen bebo huanocatsihqui. Jan yohuanai ta jano rihbi nihxon jahuen hahberabetinin nincatihiqui. Jan yohuanai nincacax coincoini. Jascarihbi ta hen hea coin coini jai.
43003030	Caiti ta jaa jaiqui. Jahua hihtima ta hea jai —jato jaquin.
43003031	Bochiquihax jahui jonin ta jatihibi joni hihbojahiqui. Mainxon jonijahabo ta mainxon jisish jan jisiboya yohuanihqui. Naihoh quehax jahui joni ta jatihibi jonibaan hihbo qui.
43003032	Naihohxon jisnibo yohuancoin jan jai bi ta tsoanbi nincacoinyamahihqui. Jan nincanihbo yohuancoin rihbi jan jai bi ta tsoanbi nincacoinyamarihbihihqui.
43003033	Jan yohicoinah nincacoinaibo ta Papa Dios ta hihcoinnicah qui hihquiqui.
43003034	Papan raannica joni hihxon ta Papan joibo yohihiqui. Hahqui ta jahuen yoshin siri Papa Dios yohuashihyamahiqui.
43003035	Jaa jahuen baquehon queenxon ta Papan jatihibi jaa hinannishqui, jaan sca hihbojanon.
43003036	Jaa Papan baque qui hinamehxon nincacoinai joni ta queyoyamanox manatihiqui. Jahuen baquen yohihah bi nincayamahi joni ta jihuetimahiqui. Jascapa ta Papan hihti jistahihmahiqui, hahquin.
43004001	Juaman honanmaxon nashimahi mentan hashoan hihti caibo Jesusen honanmaxon nashimahi cahen fariseobaan nincascaquin.
43004002	Jaanbi Jesusen nashimayamahi bi ta jahuen haxenicabaan res nashimanishqui.
43004003	Jahuen nashimatibo caichai fariseobaan joi nincacai honanxon Judea mai Jesusen potabahinquin, Galilea main caribinoxon.
43004004	Galilea main canoxon cahen Samaria mai nabebacahinti jai.
43004005	Cahi, Samaria mai meha jema janin nocoti, Sicar janeya jeman. Jacobonen jahuen baque José hinanni mai hochomahi.
43004006	Jene bihnoxon ta janobi Jacobonen mai poquinnishqui. Poquinxon chiquerihbiquin. Jano sca ta Jesus noconishqui. Bahin nihnichi paxquinax, barin manan tsacahiya jaa mai poquin quexa Jesus tsahopaqueti.
43004007	-
43004008	Jahuen haxenicabo jema janin piti benahi canon cahen jano manati. Manahahnan, samaritano haibo jene bichi jahuiton, yocaquin: —Hen nominon jene pishca hea bihxonhue, haibon —hahquin Jesusen.
43004009	Jaatian: —¿Jenquetsahaxon min mia judio hihxon bi hea samaritano haibo jene yocacain? —samaritano haibaan Jesus yocaquin. Judiobaan samaritanobo jistahihmahi copi haibaan jascajaquin.
43004010	—Tsoan mia jene yocacai honanxon cah min mianbi jaa yocacan. Papan mia hinanai rihbi honanxon cah min yocacan. Jaatian ta mia jene mohini hinanquehanihqui —Jesusen jaquin.
43004011	—Mai poquin ta nemin qui, bebon. Hahan tsecati rihbi tah min yamahi. ¿Jahuen min jascapa jene mohini bihtihin?
43004012	Noquen xeni Jacobonen ta nea noa xehanishqui. Jahuen baqueboyaxonbi jahuen yohinabaan rihbi nea jene xehaquin. Nea noa noque jaan hinannih que bi cahran min jaa mentan hashoan coshi quin? —hahquin haibaan.
43004013	Jaatian Jesusen sca: —Nea jene hahcaibo ta hahquirihbi nomicatsihnoxihquiqui.
43004014	Hean jene hinanah xehahax ta jahuentianbi jiricatsihyamascatihiqui. Jaa chicho quehax ta hen hinanai jene mohini jahuentianbi taraxaxma jabascatihiqui —haibo jaquin.
43004015	—Jaa jene hea hinanhue, bebon, jiricatsihyamascaax hen neno jene bichi jori joriyamascanon —haibaan Jesus jaquin.
43004016	Jesusen sca: —Miin bene quenatanhue, joribinoxon —jaa haibo jaquin.
43004017	Jascahah: —Heen bene ta yamahihqui —hahquin haibaan. —Yohiquin sirija tah min jai, miin bene yamahi.
43004018	Pichca miin bene janish bi cah min rahma huetsa betan hihrihbihi, miin benema rihbi. Hihcoin tah min jai —hahquin Jesusen.
43004019	—Papan joi yohinica mia quin hen ta hen honanscai, bebon.
43004020	Nea machinxon ta noquen xenibaan betihihpaquexon Papahon shinanpahonishqui, Jerusalen janinxon non Papahon shinanti jai man maton jai bi —hihqui haibo.
43004021	Jesusen sca: —Hen mia yohihah nincacoinhue, haibon. Papahon shinanaibaan ta nea mahchinxonma bi Jerusalen janinxonma rihbi noquen Papahon man shinanyaxihqui.
43004022	Man honanyamahi naman tah man betihihpaquetai, Papahon shinancatsihqui. Non honanai naman betihihpaquexon tah non noquen shinanai. Jihuemanicah ta judio xohta qui.
43004023	Hahan Papahon shinanti nete jahuex bi ta nocoscaiqui, Papa qui betihihpaquexon shinancoinaibaan jahuen yoshin siriyaxonbi Papahon shinanbiresnon, hahan shinancoinquin. Jascapa shinanaibohon ta noquen Papa queenihqui.
43004024	Noquen Papa ta yoshin qui. Jahan shinanai noquebo ta jahuen yoshinyaxonbi shinancointi jaiqui —haibo Jesusen jaquin.
43004025	—Papa Diosen caisai joni, Cristo hahcaibo, joyaxihqui ta hen honanai. Joxon ta jatihibi joi noque yohiyaxihquiqui —hihqui haibo.
43004026	—Hea tah hen jaa qui, mia yohihi joni —hahquin Jesusen.
43004027	Jasca jan jaiya bi jahuen haxenicabo nocoti. Haibo betan yohuanaiton merahax rahtecani. Rahtexon bi ¿Jahuejahi min hahbe yohuanahquin, jahua yohuan min jain, hahbetan? Jesus yocacatsihquin bi yocayamacanquin.
43004028	Jaatian jahuen poo tsahonbahini jema janin haibo cahi cahi. Cahi nocoxon jonibo yohiquin:
43004029	—Jatihibi hean janíbo hea yohihi joni jistannahue. ¿Jaa Cristoma hin? —jato jaquin.
43004030	Jaatian jema janinhax cainax Jesus jisi bocani.
43004031	Jasca sca jaiboya: —Pihue, maestron —jahuen haxenicabaan Jesus jaquin.
43004032	Pihue jaibaan bi: —Man honanyamahi piti ta hea jai —Jesusen jaquin.
43004033	Jasca jan jaiya jahuen haxenicabo jaabo rahsibi yohuani: —¿Tsoan cahra piti bexonaxquin? —hihcani yohuani.
43004034	Jascahibo bi: —Hea yononi queenai quescajaxonti ta heen piti qui. Jahuen tee queyoxonti rihbi ta heen piti qui.
43004035	¿Chosco hoxne hihquish pari ta banabo tsinquiti siri sca jatihiqui hih man jayamahin? Man jascarai bi ta hen mato yohihi. Huai chian bana johuescai jisnahue. Tsinquiti siri sca ta jaiqui hah ta hen mato jai.
43004036	Cananhahnan ta tsinquinicaton jascabi jihuetai bimi tsinquihihqui. Bananica betan tsinquinica jenimascanon ta jaton tsinquitibo queyoyamanox manatihqui.
43004037	Huetsan tsinquixonyaxahnon ta huetsan banahihqui hih ta jacanihqui. Hihcoini.
43004038	Man bananixonma bi tsinquitannon tah hen mato yononihqui. Caibaan hahni tee tah man tsinquitihi —jato Jesusen jaquin.
43004039	Jaa jema janinha samaritanobaan ta hichaxon Jesus nincacoinnishqui. Jatihibi hean janíbo ta hea yohihaxqui hahquin haibaan jato yohicoinai copi nincacoincanquin.
43004040	Jesus qui caxon yocaquin: —Noque qui banehue. Cayama sca jahue —hahcanquin. Jascahahbo jato betan rabe neten baneti.
43004041	Jaanbi jato yohihiya nincacoincanquin hashoan tsamaxon sca.
43004042	Nincacoinxon haibo yohicanquin: —Mian noque yohihah nincacoinipixon bi tah non jaa yohuanai noquenbi nincaxon non hashoan sca nincacoinscai. Jaa coin ta nai nequebihabo jihuemanicah qui, honancoin sca tah non jai —hahcanquin.
43004043	Rabe neten jato betan banetax janohax Galilea main sca cahi caresscai.
43004044	Caquin sca ta jato yohinishqui: —Jahuen main jihuetai bi ta jahuen caibaan Papan joi yohinica nincacatsihyamahihqui —hahquin.
43004045	Jascahi bi jatihibi jan Jerusalen janinha fiesta janinxon hahcai jistanipixon Galilea main jihuetaibaan Johue hahquin jaton main nocotaiton.
43004046	Janoxon jan jato jene hompajaxonni jema janin nocorihbihi, Caná janeya jema, Galilea main. Capernaum jema janin cahen huesti tinintinin baque hisini jai.
43004047	Judea mai mehax Galilea mai janin Jesus joresscai chanihah jaa yocaqui tininti jahui. —Heen baque hea rahonxoni cahue. Hihcatsih sca ta jaiqui —hahquin.
43004048	—Hahan honanti jisyamaxon tah man nincacoinyamahi, hahqui rahtetibo rihbi jisyamaxon —tininti Jesusen jaquin.
43004049	Jan jascarai bi: —Jani heen baque mahuanon carihue, hihbon —hahquin tinintinin.
43004050	—Careshue. Miin baque ta jihuetihiqui —tininti Jesusen jaquin. Min yohihi quescabi ta jacointihiqui hihquish tininti cahi caresscai.
43004051	Cahipish cabahinahi bi jahuen jonibaan behchibenaquin. —Miin baque ta rohscaipishqui —hihcani.
43004052	Jascaraiton jato yocaquin: —¿Jahuerahnon bari racataiya jahuen yona tantihipishquin? —Bahquish bari hihpaquescaiya ta yona tantihipishqui —hihcani.
43004053	Jano bari racatai bi Miin baque ta jihuetihiqui Jesusen jaipi jahuen papan honanscaquin. Jaatian sca jahuen xobo janinhahbo betan jatihixonbi Jesus nincacoinscaquin.
43004054	Jaa ta Judea mai mehax Galilea janin joribixon sca jahuen rabe sca jahuen hahan honanti Jesusen jato hahxonnishqui.
43005001	Jaa pecaho judiobaan fiesta jaiya Jerusalen janin Jesus caribihi.
43005002	Jerusalen janin ta jema xehpoti jaiqui, carnero janeya xehpoti. Jema xehpoti hochoma cahen noa pishca racatah Betesda hahcaibo, judiobaan join. Jaa hian quexa ta pichca xobo tsahotihqui.
43005003	Jaa xoboho cahen hicha hisinaibo racati, benchebo, tobi pishcabo, yora honanyamajaquetaibo. Noa pishca bahinon jaabo manati.
43005004	Jaa noa janin roqui Papan yonoti paquepahonish. Paquexon qui jene bahimaquin. Bahihiya qui jenenencanya paquemenohi joni rohahi siripi. Jahuen hisin jatihibi rohacahini.
43005005	Jano cahen huesti joni racati, treinta y ocho bari jascabi hisini.
43005006	Racataiton jisxon hicha bari sca hisinai honanscaxon: —¿Min rohacatsihyamahin? —hahquin Jesusen.
43005007	—Jene bahihiya hea jenenencanya potanica ta yama qui, hihbon. Hea cahiya bi huetsa pari hihquihi —hihqui hisinai.
43005008	—Huenihue. Huenixon miin cacajati bichish caresscatanhue —Jesusen jaquin.
43005009	Jaatianbi rohacahinxon jahuen cacajati bichish caresscai. Jaton tantiti neten ta Jesusen jascajanishqui.
43005010	Jaa copi ta jan rohajahi joni judiobaan yohinishqui: —Rahma ta tantiti nete qui. Tantiti neten tah min miin cacajati botimahi —hahcanquin.
43005011	Jascahahbo bi: —Miin cacajati bichish caresscatanhue hah ta hea rohajahi jonin jaaxqui —jato jaquin.
43005012	—¿Jahua joni jaa quin, mia Miin cacajati bichish jaya catanhue hahcai? —hahcanquin.
43005013	Yocacahbo bi Jesusen jane honanyamaquin, jano jonibo hicha nichiton Jesus rebesohtai copi.
43005014	Jaa pecaho Papan xobohoxon jaa merarihbixon: —Jise. Mia tah min siriscai. Hohchayamascahue hashoan tiromamis —Jesusen jaquin.
43005015	Jaatian caresscaxon judiobo yohiquin: —Hea rohajahi joni ta Jesus qui —hahquin.
43005016	Tantiti neten jan rohajahi copi judiobo Jesus qui rainyamahiton jaan jato joi bichinquin:
43005017	—Heen papa ta rahma caman teetihqui. Hea rihbi ta hen teetai —Jesusen jato jaquin.
43005018	Jascajaha hashoan sca Jesus rehtecatsihquibohi. Jan tantiti neten tantiyamahi copi rehtecatsihquibo. Papa Dios betan jasca rabe hihquish, Papa Dios ta heen papa qui jan jaiton.
43005019	Jesusen jato yohirihbiquin: —Yohicoin ta hen mato jai: Papan baquexon bi tah hen hehmebi jahuejati hahtipahyamahi. Heen papan hahcai jisxon pari tah hen hahcai, jatihibi heen papan hahcai quescabijaquin hean rihbi hahquin.
43005020	Hea jahuen baquehon shinanxon ta heen papan jatihibi jan hahcai rihbi hea jahuen baque jismahihqui. Jahuen coshiyaxon hen hahcai bi ta nea mentan hashoan coshin hen hahcai rihbi hen mato jismayaxihqui, man rahtenon.
43005021	Mahuanihbo huenixon heen papan jihuemahi quescajaribiquin tah hen jahuen baque hihxon hea hen queenaibo hean jihuemahi.
43005022	Tsoabi casticanxonma ta Papan hea yonohihqui hean sca jatihibi jointi honanxon casticanyaxahnon.
43005023	Papa Dios Nete Hihbohi man honanai quescajaribiquin man jahuen baque Nete Hihbohi man jatihixonbi honannon ta jascajahiqui. Jahuen baque ta nete hihboma qui hihquibo ta Jaa raanni jahuen papa rihbi ta nete hihboma qui hihnicahbo qui.
43005024	Yohicoin tah hen mato jai: heen joi nincaxon bi hea raanni heen papa rihbi nincacoinai joni ta queyoyamanox manatihqui. Jaa casticanxonma ta Papan mahnescaiqui, mahuataibo janinhax jihuetaibo qui mahnenon.
43005025	Yohicoin ta hen mato jaribihi: mahuanihbaan ta Papan baquen yohihi nincascaiqui, nincacaibo jihuescanon.
43005026	Jahuen papa teehihmanicahi quescarihbihi tah hen hea jahuen baque jaa xohtahi, Mia rihbi jato teehihmanicahue, Papan hea janí.
43005027	Mia tah min noquebaque qui. Mian sca jato casticanhue hah ta heen papan janishqui.
43005028	Hen mato yohihah bi rahteyamanahue. Hean quenahah ta tsahon janinhahbaan jatihixonbi nincayaxihquiqui.
43005029	Sirijanibo ta cainax huenicahintihiqui, jascabi sca queyoyamanox manati jihuenoxon. Tiromajanibo rihbi ta cainax huenitihiqui, jascabijaquin casticanahbo janoxon.
43005030	Hehmebi tah hen jahuejati hahtipahyamahi. Papa nincaxon res tah hen jato casticantihi. Jaa copi tah hen pontejaquin shinanxon casticanyaxihqui. Jaan hea yononixon shinanai quescajaquin tah hen jascajatihi. Heabi hen queenaijah ta hen jayamahi.
43005031	Hehqui heabi yohuanax cahen heen yohuan jahuabi hihyamahan.
43005032	Hea jahua quin honanahbo ta huetsa yohuancoinihqui. Hea yohihi jan hihcoini yohuanai tah hen honanai.
43005033	Honancatsihquin man Juan qui raanah ta hihcoini jaa yohuancoinnishqui.
43005034	Jonibo res yohuanai joi ta hean nincayamahi. Papan mato teehihmanon hihxon res ta hen mato yohihi.
43005035	Johue quetejaha xabatai janin quescari tah man Juan qui caniqui, jahuen xaba chian sca basima jenimanoxon quescapi.
43005036	Heen papan ta hea teebo yohinishqui hean queyoxonnon. Jaa ta hen hahcai, hea papan raanni man honancoinnon hihxon. Hean hahcaibo ta hea yohihi joi quesca qui, hahan hea honanti. Juaman yohini nincaxon hahan hea honantihi bi hean hahcai jisxon hashoan sirijaquin honanti.
43005037	Hea raanni heen papan ta hehqui yohicoinihqui. Jan yohuanai tah man jahuentianbi nincayamanihqui. Beron rihbi tah man jaa jisyamaniqui jahuentianbi.
43005038	Jaan raanni joni man nincacoinyamahiya ta maton jointi janin Papan joi yamahihqui.
43005039	Papan huishani joi jisquin sirijanahue. Hea yohihi joi ta jaa qui, hahan hea honantihi bi tah man hahan mahuataxma jihueti man shinanai.
43005040	Hean mato teehihmanon hehqui jotihi bi tah man jocatsihyamahi.
43005041	Jonibaan res hea Yotiho coshi mia quin hahti tah hen queenyamahi.
43005042	Mato tah hen honanai. Noquen Papahon tah man queenyamahi.
43005043	Heen papan hea raanah hen jahui bi tah man hea Johue hahyamahi. Jaabaanbi shinanax jahuibo tah man Johue hahtihi.
43005044	¿Jenquetsahaxon man mato qui siripi yohuanaibo benaxon man noquen Papan joi nincacointihin? Papa huesti noquen Dios hihqui bi tah man jaa siripi mato qui yohuanti man queenyamahi.
43005045	Heanbi noquen Papa maton hohcha yohipaqueyaxihqui shinanyamanahue. Mato cahenica ta Moisesnin huisha qui, hahan jihueti man shinanai que bi.
43005046	Moisesnin huishani joi nincacoinxon cah man hea rihbi nincaquehanai. Hehqui ta jaan huishanishqui.
43005047	¿Jenquetsahaxon man heen joi nincacointihin, Moisesnin huisha rihbi nincacoinxonma bi? —jato Jesusen jaquin.
43006001	Jaa pecaho sca ta Galilea mai meha hian pohquejaqueti Jesus canishqui. Tiberias cahen jaa hiaman jane huetsa.
43006002	Papan coshiyaxon hisinaibo Jesusen rohajahi jisxon hichaxon Jesus chibancanquin.
43006003	Mahchi manichish jano jahuen haxenicabo betan Jesus tsahopaqueti.
43006004	Judiobaan pascua fiesta nea pishca sca jai.
43006005	Jari jisxon hihti caibo hahqui jahui meraxon Felipe yocaquin: —¿Jahuerahnon non piti marotihin jaabaan pinon?
43006006	Felipe tananoxon ta jascajanishqui, jaanbi piti caijanoxon bi yocaquin.
43006007	Jaatian: —Doscientos libras non jai bi ta hahan paan marohah jato jatihixonbi piti senentimahiqui, hexti pishca cohren huesti hinanah bi —Jesus Felipenin jaquin.
43006008	Huetsa rihbi jahuen haxenica jahui, Andres, Simon Pedron huetsa.
43006009	—Neno ta beronan jaiqui. ¿Pichca cebada paanya rabe tsatsa rihbi jan jai bi hen neatihi noquebo janon bi jaa jahuejatiquin? —Jesus jaquin Andresnin.
43006010	—Jato tsahopaquemanahue —Jesusen jaquin. Hani pasto jano jaiya, jano tsahopaquecani. Bebobo rahsi toponah ta cinco mil joni janishqui.
43006011	Jaatian jaa paan pishca bihxon Papa yocaxon tehcaxon tsahotaibo Jesusen hinanpaquequin. Tsatsa sca jascajaribiquin jaabo queenai tihi.
43006012	Yaniscaiboya: —Texejaha teque romishin tsinquitannahue, jahuabi yohyocohyamanon —jahuen haxenicabo Jesusen jaquin.
43006013	Jascajaha tsinquicanquin. Pichca cebada paan pihibaan texejahi tequebo tsinquixon, doce tasa bohasacanquin.
43006014	Jascajaquin Papan coshiyaxon jan hahcai jisish: —Nea coin ta Papan joi yohinica main joyaxihqui yohicanpahonishqui —hihqui pihi tsahotaibo.
43006015	Jaton quiquin hapo sca hihnon jaa bichi jocatsihquibaan bi honanscaax mahchi janin jaa huesti Jesus caribihi.
43006016	Bepiscaiya jaton nonti janin jahuen haxenicabo nihpaqueti cahi.
43006017	-
43006018	Nontin nanetax Capernaum quiri pohquejahqueti cahi. Yamescaiya jato qui Jesus joriyamahi bi nihuen coshin behchonjaquin.
43006019	Basi huina huinaxon yame jisíbaan bi hahchon hian benichi Jesus jahui, nonti hochoma sca. Hian benichai merahax rahtecani.
43006020	Rahtetaibaan bi: —Hea ta hen qui, raqueyamanahue —hihqui Jesus.
43006021	Jaatian nontin nanemacatsihquibo bi nococahinscacani, jano jan cahi hoque quexa.
43006022	Xaba paquescaiya cahen hoque quexa banetipibaan benahah bi Jesus yamascai. Jahuen haxenicabo betan ta Jesus naneyamahipishqui. Jaabo rahsibi nontin cahi tah non jisipiqui. Jaa huesti nonti res ta jaipishqui, huesta yamahi. ¿Jahuenrahnon Jesus cahipishquin? hihxon benahahbo bi yamahi.
43006023	Janoxon jan Papa yocaxon jato paan pimahipi hochoma sca Tiberias janinhax jahui nontibo nocoti.
43006024	Jahuen haxenicaboyabi Jesus xahbanjahax, hahan behibo nontin sca nanetax, Capernaum janin jahui becani, Jesus benahi.
43006025	Pohquequihrani joxon Jesus meraxon yocacanquin: —¿Jahuentian min neno jahuequin, maestron? —hahcanquin.
43006026	—Yohicoin ta hen mato jai: Papan coshiyaxon hen mato hahxonai jisipixon bi tah man jaa copima hea benahi. Paan pihi yanitipixon copi tah man hea benahi.
43006027	Queyonica piti copi teeyamanahue. Jahuentianbi queyoyamanox manatai piti copi teenahue. Noquebaque hihxon hen hinanyaxihqui piti ta jascapah qui. Hea jascapa hinannica man honannon hihxon ta jahuen shinanyaxon hen hahnon Papan hea hinanihqui —Jesusen jato jaquin.
43006028	Jan jascahiya: —¿Jahueja non jatihin, Papan tee hahnoxon? —hahcanquin.
43006029	—Papan raanai joni nincacointi ta jaa tee qui —Jesusen jato jaquin.
43006030	—¿Jahua hahan honanti min hahcain, jisxon non nincacoinnon hihxon? ¿Jahueja min jain, Papan shinanyaxon?
43006031	Cahchihoxon ta noquen xenibaan maná piti pipahonishqui. Jaa yohihi ta Naihoh queha piti ta jato hinannishqui, pihabo, hih Papan huisha janin jaiqui —Jesus jacanquin.
43006032	—Mato tah hen yohicoinai: naihoh queha piti ta Moisesnin mato hinanyamanishqui. Heen papan caya ta mato naihoh queha piti coin hinanihqui.
43006033	Jaan hinanai piti ta naihoh quehax botopaquetihqui, jaa pihax jihuetahbo —Jesusen jato jaquin.
43006034	—Jascapa piti noque hinanquin jeneyamaxahnhue, Hihbon —hahcanquin.
43006035	—Hea ta hen hahan jihueti piti qui. Hehqui jahuibo ta picatsihyamascatihiqui. Hea nincacoinaibo ta jiricatsihyamascatihiqui, jahuentianbi.
43006036	Hea jisxon bi tah man nincacoinyamahi hah cah hen mato jai.
43006037	Heen papan hea hinanai tihibi ta hehqui joti qui. Hehqui jahuibo tah hen potatimahi, ni huestibi.
43006038	Hea queenai quescajahi tah hen joyamaniqui. Hea raanni queenaijahi tah hen naihoh quehax botopaquetax joníqui.
43006039	Ni huestibi manomaxonma tah hen jan hea hinanai jatihibi hean hueniyaxihqui nete queyoscanon. Hean jascajati ta hea raanni queenihqui.
43006040	Jahuen baque jisxon jaa nincacoinaibo queyoyamanox manati ta heen papa queenihqui. Nete queyoscanon tah hen jato hueniyaxihqui —jato jaquin.
43006041	Jan jascahiya judiobo hahqui renren renreni. Naihoh quehax botopaqueni piti ta hea qui jan jaiya hahqui rainyamacani.
43006042	—¿Nea Jesus janeya joni Josepan baquema hin? ¿Jahuen papa, jahuen mama non honanyamahin? ¿Jenquetsahaquin sca Hea tah hen naihoh quehax paquenihqui hah noque jaiquin? —hihcani.
43006043	Jaatian: —Mato rahsibi yohuani renren renrenyamanahue.
43006044	Heen Papan Johue hahca ta hehqui jahuibo jahuiqui. Jan Johue hahyamaha cahen joti hahtipahyamahan. Hehqui jahuibo tah hen hueniyaxihqui, nete queyoscanon.
43006045	Papan honanmahibo rahsi ta jatihiqui; jascajaquin ta Papan joi yohinicabaan huishanishqui. Heen papa yohuanai nincaxon honanaibo jatihibi ta hehqui jotihiqui.
43006046	Tsoanbi noquen Papa jisyamani que bi ta Papa janinha huestichin jaa jisnicah qui.
43006047	Hihcoinja ta hen mato jai: nincacoinaibo ta jahuentianbi queyoyamanox manatihqui.
43006048	Hahan jihueti piti ta hea qui.
43006049	Cahchihoxon maná piti pihax bi ta maton xenibo mahuanishqui.
43006050	Naihoh queha piti pihax tah man mahuayamascatihi. Jascapa piti ta naihoh quehax botopaquetihqui.
43006051	Naihoh quehax botopaqueni piti mohitahpa ta hea qui. Jascapa piti pihax tah man queyoyamanox manascatihi. Hean hinanai piti ta heen yora qui. Mai mehabo jihueyaxahnon tah hen jato hinanai —jato jaquin.
43006052	—¿Jenquetsahaxon noque jahuen yora hinantihiquin, non pinon? —hihquish jaabo rahsibi judiobo join bahchinnanscai.
43006053	Join rehtenanaiboya Jesusen jato yohiquin: —Yohicoin tah hen mato jai. Noquebaquen yora piyamaxon jahuen jimi rihbi xehayamahax tah man jihueyamahi.
43006054	Heen yora pixon heen jimi rihbi xehahi noque ta queyoyamanox manatihqui. Jaabi rihbi tah hen hueniyaxihqui, nete queyoscanon.
43006055	Heen yora ta piti coin qui. Heen jimi rihbi ta xehati coin qui.
43006056	Heen yora pixon heen jimi rihbi xehahi tah man heen hahberabetibo qui, hea rihbi maton hahberabeti.
43006057	Heen papa ta jihuetihqui. Hea ta raannishqui. Hea jaa copi jihuetai quescarihbi ta hea pihibo jihuetihiqui, hea copi.
43006058	Jascapah ta naihoh quehax botopaquetai piti qui. Noquen xenibaan piti pihax bi mahuanih quescayamahi. Nea piti pihax queyoyamanox manati, jascabi sca jihuenox manati, —jato jaquin.
43006059	Capernaum janin haho tsinquiti xobohoxon ta Jesusen jato jascajaquin yohinishqui honanmaquin.
43006060	Jan yohuanai nincaxon: —Honantima tah qui, jan yohuanai. ¿Tsoan nincatihiquin? —hihqui hicha jahuen haxenicabo.
43006061	Jahuen haxenicabo hahqui renren renrenai jahuen jointinin honanxon jato yocaquin: —¿Hen yohuanai nincacax man rahtetain?
43006062	¿Janohax hen joníton hen hahquirihbi hinahihnatai jisish cahran man hihti rahtetimahin?
43006063	Dios Yoshiman ta mato jihuematihiqui. Maton yora betan res tah man jahua bihtimahi. Hen mato yohihi joi ta yoshinyahpa qui, hahan jihueti.
43006064	Hahan jihueti joi hen mato yohihah bi tah man caibaan nincacoinyamahi —jato jaquin. Jato jismenoxon ta tsoabo nincayosmabohin Jesusen honannishqui. Paranxon jaa bihmayaxihqui joni rihbi honanquin.
43006065	—Jaa copi ta hen mato jascajahipiqui. Papan shinanyamahiya ta tsoabi hehqui jotimahiqui —hahquin.
43006066	Jan jascaraiya ta hicha jahuen haxenicabaan jaa potabahinnishqui. Haxehi hahbetan nihyamascacani.
43006067	—¿Maton rihbi man hea potabahincatsihquin? —jahuen doce haxenicabo Jesusen yocaquin.
43006068	—¿Tsohqui non catihin nan, Hihbon? Mian tah min noque hahan queyoyamati joi nincamahi.
43006069	Mia Papan raanai jahuen caisti joni tah non mia honancoinai. Shinanquin sirijaquin tah non honanscai —hahquin Simoman.
43006070	—¿Mato doce hen caisyamanihquin? Mato quiha huesti ta tiroma yoshin qui —Jesusen jato jaquin.
43006071	Jan yohihi ta Judas qui, Simon Iscariotenin baque. Jahuen doce quiha hihxon bi Jesus bihmati shinanai joni.
43007001	Jascahipish Galilea mai janin res Jesus nichi. Judea main nihcatsihyamascai, judiobaan rehtecatsihquiya.
43007002	-
43007003	Judiobaan tapasohoxon fiestajati nete nea pishcascaiya, jahuen huetsabaan Jesus yohiquin: —Nenohax Judea main carestanhue, janoxon min hahcaibo miin haxenicabaan rihbi jisnon.
43007004	Sirijaquin jisíbo hihxon ta jonexon tsoanbi jahuejayamahiqui. Papan coshiyaxon hahan honanti hahcatsihquin janibixon hahhue, jatihixonbi jisquin sirijahabo —hahcanquin.
43007005	Nincacoinyamaxon copi ta jahuen huetsabaanbi jascajanishqui.
43007006	Jesusen sca jato yohiquin: —Caritima pari tah hen jai. Mato caya botannahue. Jahua copi hea manatima tah man jai.
43007007	Mato jistahihmajati ta mai mehabaan hahtipahyamahiqui. Jaabaan tiromajahi hean hihcoinjaquin yohihiya ta hea jistahihmajacanihqui.
43007008	Fiesta janin botannahue, mato. Caritima ta hea jai. Queenax ta hea catihi.
43007009	Jato jascajaquin yohihax, Galilea main banetahbi.
43007010	Jahuen huetsabo fiesta janin cahipi sca jaa rihbi cahi, caibaan jisnonma sca, janibima.
43007011	Jonetax cahi bi fiesta janinxon judiobaan jaa benaquin: —¿Jahuen jaa quin? —hahcanquin.
43007012	Hihti caibo jaya baxex baxexi. —Siri joni tah qui —hihqui caibo. —Sirima ta qui. Jonibo ta paranihqui —hihqui caibo rihbi.
43007013	Judiobo qui raquetax tsoabi coshin jaya yohuanyamahi, honahaxbi yohuancani.
43007014	Fiesta naexbi sca Papan xoboho mapexon Papan joi Jesusen haxemaquin.
43007015	Jan jascahiya rahtetax judiobo yohuani: —¿Jenquetsahaxon neatohon huisha joi honanishquin tsoanbi quirica honanmanima bi? —hihcani.
43007016	Jascahiton Jesusen yohiquin: —Hen jato honanmahi ta heen joima qui. Hea yononihton joi tah qui.
43007017	Papan shinanaijati hahcatsihquibaan ta honantihiqui. ¿Papan shinanaiya honanma hen jain? ¿Heanbi shinanxon honanma hen jain? Jaabaan ta hen yohuanai honantihiqui.
43007018	Coshi joni hihqui shinanahbo hihquish ta jaabaanbi shinanax yohuanaibo jaiqui. Hea raanai heen Papa coshi hihqui honanahbo hihquish tah hen hea yohuanai. Jascapa yohuannica ta hihcoini yohuannica qui. Jahuabi tiroma yohuanyamahi.
43007019	¿Maton nincati joi Moisesnin hinanyamanishquin? Ni huestichinbi tah man jaa joi nincayamahi, jaan hinanni que bi. ¿Hean mato jahua hahca man hea rehtecatsihquin? —Jesusen jato jaquin.
43007020	—Mia rah ta yoshiman hihbojahiqui. ¿Tsoan mia rehtecatsihquiquin? —hihcani.
43007021	Jesusen jato yohirihbiquin: —Hen hahcai huesti jisish tah man jatihibi rahtetai.
43007022	Jaanbi shinanxonma bi noquen xenibaan pari yohihah ta Moisesnin mato honantiyahpati yohinishqui. Tantiti netenbi tah man baquexo honantijahi.
43007023	Moisesnin yohini quescajacatsihquin tantiti netenbi joni huetsa honantijanicaboxon ¿jahua copi sca man tantiti neten hean huetsa joni rohajahiya man hehqui rainyamahin?
43007024	Beron jisxon res huetsa jonin shinan honanti shinanyamanahue. Shinanquin sirijaxon pari joni huetsa honannahue —jato jaquin.
43007025	Jasca jan jaiya caibo Jerusalen janinhahbo yohuanscai: —¿Neama hin, rehtecatsihquibo joni?
43007026	Jistan. Janibi nichish yohuanai bi ta jahua hihyamacanihqui. ¿Cristo hihqui noquen cacannicabaan honancoinscaiquin?
43007027	Janobihax nea joni jahui tah non honanai. Cristo joni jahuiya roqui tsoanbi jahuerahnohax jaa jahuiquin hihxon honanyamayaxihcanihqui —hihcani.
43007028	Jaa copi cahen Papan xobohoxon jato haxemahi sca Jesus coshin yohuani: —¿Hea man honanain nan? Janobihax hea joní man honanrihbihi nan? Hehme mehax ta hen joyamaniqui. Hihcoinnicahton ta hea raannishqui. Jaa tah man honanyamahi.
43007029	Hean tah hen jaa honanai. Jaan hea raanah ta hen jaa janinhax joniqui —hahquin Jesusen.
43007030	Jasca jan jaiya xecotancatsihxon bi jaa bihxon rehteti siriyamaparihiya tsoanbi meheyamaquin.
43007031	Rehteti shinan caibaan jai bi hicha noquebaan Jesus nincacoinquin. —Neatohon ta hahan honanti hahquiqui, hicha. ¿Cristo joxon, neatohon hahcai quescajaxon bi hashoan hicha rihbi hahan honanti hahtihiquin? —hahcanquin
43007032	Jascari baxexaibaan bi fariseobaan nincaquin. Nincaxon, sacerdote hapobo betan fariseobaan sca jaton porisiabo raanquin, Jesus bihtannahue hahxon.
43007033	Bihcatsihscaibo copi cahen jato yohiquin: —Basima tahni sca tah hen mato betan hihtihi. Hea raanni janin sca hea cati ta hochoma sca qui.
43007034	Hea benaxon bi tah man hea meratimahi. Hea cahi janin tah man cati hahtipahyamatihi —jato jaquin Jesusen.
43007035	Jaabo rahsibi sca judiobo yohuani: —¿Jahuenbi cacatsihquiquin, non jaa merayamascanon? ¿Nahuabo qui caníbo janin cacatsihquiquin, nahuabo sca honanmahi?
43007036	¿Benaxon bi tah man hea meratimahi jan hihqui bi jahua hihcatsihquiquin? Hea cahi janin tah man cati hahtipahyamahi. ¿Jan jascari yohuani hen jahua hihcatsihquiquin? —hihcani.
43007037	Hahan fiesta queyotai neten, jaton hani netenbi, nichish Jesus coshin yohuani: —Jiricatsihquish hehqui benahue, xehahi.
43007038	Hea nincacoinai joni janinhax ta jene mohini huean bahihihcamaxihquiqui, jahuen jointi janinhaxbi, Papan huisha joi jai quescari —hahquin.
43007039	Jan jene yohihi ta Dios Yoshin qui, nincacoinaibaan bihyaxihqui Dios Yoshin. Jesus huenihihniriyamaxon ta jahuen yoshin Papan hinanyamaparinishqui.
43007040	Jan jascari yohuanai nincacax tsinquijaquetaibo yohuanrihbihi: —Nea coin ta Papan joi yohinica qui —hihcani.
43007041	—Noquen hapo hihnon Papan caisai joni tah qui —hihqui caibo rihbi. —¿Galilea mai janinhax Papan caisai joni jotihiquin?
43007042	David xohtahax ta David jihuepahoni janinhax Papan caisai joni picotihiqui, Belen jema janinhaxbi. ¿Jascayamahin, Papan huisha joi janin? —hahcanquin caibaan rihbi.
43007043	Jascapa mesco shinanyahpabohax join bahchinnanscacani.
43007044	Caibaan Jesus xecotancatsihquin bi tsoanbi meheyamaquin.
43007045	Jano sacerdote hapobo betan fariseobo manatai janin jaton porisiabo nocorihbihiton yocacanquin: —¿Jenquetsahpa hin man hihueyamahahquin? —hahcanquin.
43007046	—Tsoabi ta jan yohuanai quesca jayamanishqui, jahuentianbi —hihqui jaton porisiabo sca.
